item.text: (tsa) @#/ ! /gsang sngags rgyud 'bum gyi skor bzhugs so/ /
(黃) 秘密經第十七部

@##// //yig mkhan gyis sdeb sbyar ji lta bzhin ma thon pa dang / bar skabs su zhus dag bas grags tshod dang mi mthun pa mang po bcos nas 'dug cing / khyad par ut+ba la dang / gur gul dang / zhabs 'bring zhabs 'brid dang rgyu'i dkyil 'khor

gyi brkyang nul zhes pa zhabs rdzogs ka na 'ga' yar dang po yig mkhan gyis dris 'dug pa ma gtogs/ bskyang nul du bzhag nas ma bcos pa mang po 'dug pa rnams ni kho bos brkyang nul bar bzhugs shing 'di'i thog nas gsubs shul du

ma 'dri/ dag pa rnams ma bsgyur bar zhog cing yi ge 'dri ba/ ri mo 'dri ba rnams thams cad 'bri ru bsgyur ba rnams ni 'drir ru bcos yod bas 'bri ru ma ni re re la lung rnam dag gi zin so dang / skad gsar bcad kyis gtan la phab pa'i brda chad dang /

mdo rgyud kyi don grags tshod la 'thob pa'i dbus gtsang gi chos du ma bzhugs pa rnams dang brda chad gcig par bzhugs kyi bde skyid dang phan bde rab 'byams tshad med pa'i rtsa ba sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa la rag lus/ sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa yang

thos bsam bsgom gsum dri ma med par byed pa dang / sems can gyi 'gro don rnams yin pa la sogs pa du ma la bltos dgos pa rnams ni/ tha snyad la ni ma brten par/ dam pa'i don ni mi 'gyur zhes pas kun rdzob gyi chos rnams la blangs

dor phyin ci ma log par shes na don dam pa'i chos byed de/ de ni sangs rgyas so/ rgyu mtshan des na kho bos dka' dgu la ma bsams par bstan pa'i zhabs tog sems can gyi 'gro don khyad par du drung rin po che chos rgyal byang chub sems dpa' khrims

gnyis kyi rgyu rin po che las grub pa be+e dUr+ya'i mthing shog la 'dzam bu chu bo'i gser bzhun mas 'dri ba'i bka' 'gyur ro cog bzhings pa'i phyi mo byed pa la dmigs nas shin tu dag par bcos pa po ti re re'i dbur gsal ba gsal bar
yod cing 'dir yang zur tsam smos pa ni de dag rnams kyi don la bsams nas dgas kyis mthon pa'i zhus dag bgyis pas chos 'di rnams dbus gtsang gis cha na shin tu dag par bzhugs pa yin no// //
This is a blank page without image
@##/ /rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya a wa lo ki te shwa ra te s+ya ko ShA gu h+ya pra ti ha ta
tsit+ta tsakra hri dA ya nA ma d+hA ra NI/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang
phyug gi gsang ba'i mdzod thogs pa med pa'i yid bzhin gyi 'khor lo'i snying po zhes bya ba'i
gzungs/ sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /
'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das drang srong gi ri la byang chub
sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i tshogs mang po dang thabs gcig tu bzhugs te/ de nas
byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug stan las langs te/
gos tshags bcos nas pus mo sa la btsugs te/ thal mo sbyar nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /com ldan 'das bdag la pad+ma du ma chen po'i tsan dan gyi snying po'i 'khor lo
zhes bgyi ba'i gzungs chen mo smon cing bgyi ba thams cad mngon par 'grub par bgyi ba mchis te/ gal te de bzhin gshegs pa'i thugs rje chen pos bdag gis bshad par gnang na/ bdag bcom ldan 'das

kyi byin gyi brlabs kyi mthus sems can thams cad la sman par bgyi ba'i slad du bshad par 'tshal lags so/ /de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das gzungs 'di ni gzi byin chen po'i mthu dang ldan pas yid
bzhin gyi nor bu rin po che chen po dang / yid bzhin gyi ljon shing bzhin du smon pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par bgyid pas so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang
phyug la legs so legs so zhes sngags pa brjod nas/ khyod kyis snying brtse ba'i phyir sems can gyi ched du 'di ltar zhugs pas na khyod thogs pa med pa'i gzungs 'di bshad par gnang bar bya'o/ /
byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug de ltar bkas gnang ba dang / langs nas thal mo sbyar te phyag byas nas slar stan la 'dug ste/ sems rtse gcig tu 'khor 'dus pa dag la rnam par

bltas nas snying rje chen po dang ldan pa'i sems kyis sngags 'di smras so/ /na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ na ma Ar+yA ba lo ki te shwa rA ya bo d+hi satwA ya/ ma hA satwA ya/ ma hA kA ru Ni kA ya/ tad+ya thA/ oM tsakra

pa ti tsin+tA ma Ni/ ma hA pa du me/ ru ru tiSh+Tha ta/ badzra b+ha ra A kar me hU~M swA hA/ 'di ni lus kyi sngags lags so/ /oM pa du me/ tsan+d+ra ma Ni/ ma hA badzra b+ha ra hU~M/ 'di ni snying po'i sngags lags so/ /

oM b+ha ra ta pa du me hU~M / 'di ni snying gi snying po'i sngags lags so/ /de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis yid bzhin 'khor lo'i gzungs 'di smras pa dang / sa chen po yang rnam pa drug tu

rab tu g.yos par gyur/ lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po la sogs pa'i khang khyim rnams kyang rab tu g.yos par gyur

bdud kyi rgyal po dang / bdud kyi 'khor rnams kyang shin du skrag cing 'jigs pa chen po skyes par gyur/ bdud kyi rgyal po'i gzhal med khang yang rab tu 'bar bar gyur/ gnod sbyin dang / 'dre srin ma rungs pa gzhan rnam
pa sna tshogs kyang dngang zhing skrag pas gdong bkab ste/ sa la 'gyel bar gyur/ sems can dmyal ba'i sgo thams cad kyang phye nas sdug bsngal ba'i sems can rnams thar te/ lha'i bde ba mchog myong bar

gyur to/ /de'i tshe lha rnams kyis kyang rin po che'i me tog dang / rin po che'i rgyan gyi yo byad rnam pa sna tshogs kyi char mngon par phab par gyur/ lha'i rol mo rnams kyang bar snang la sgra sna tshogs phyung ste/ de bzhin
gshegs pa la mchod pa byas par gyur to/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshangs pa'i dbyangs kyis tshigs su bcad de/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la/ rigs kyi

bu khyod sems can la snying rtse ba'i phyir gzungs 'di bshad pa nyid kyis sems can rnams kyi phan yon chen po thob par 'gyur ba legs so legs so zhes bsngags pa brjod do/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis yang

byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /rigs kyi bu sems can rnams kyi phyir rdzu 'phrul gyi rgyal po chen po'i gzungs 'di'i cho ga shod cig /de nas bcom ldan 'das
la byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis 'di skad ces gsol to/ /rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo'am dge slong ngam dge slong ma'am/ dge bsnyen nam/ dge bsnyen ma'am/

khye'u'am/ bu mo gzhon nu gang la la zhig gis tshe 'di nyid la rnam par smin pa mngon du myong bar 'tshal na/ gdugs mtshan sems rtsi gcig tu nan tan brtson 'grus kyis gzungs 'di mi bskyud par bgyis te/

gdugs dang dus mi 'dam par gtsang yang rung / mi gtsang yang rung ste/ g.yar ston du bzlas par gyur na bgyi ba rnams don dang ldan par 'gyur lags so/ /ci yang rung ste/ don du bgyi zhing gnyer ba zhig mchis

na lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bgyis na don brgya stong du ma 'grub par 'gyur bas/ rig sngags gzhan gang yid bzhin gyi 'khor lo'i gzungs 'di dang bsgrun par bzod pa gang yang ma mchis lags so/ /de ci'i
slad du zhe na/ 'das pa dang / da ltar gyi las ngan pa dang / sgrib pa lci ba rnams rab tu 'joms pas so/ /gang la la zhig gzungs 'di bzlas brjod bgyis na mnar ma mchis pa'i dmyal bar ltung bar 'gyur
ba'i rigs dag kyang thar bar 'gyur la/ mtshams ma mchis pa lnga la sogs pa'i sdig pa rnams kyang 'byang bar 'gyur na/ las ngan pa dang / gdon bgegs dang / bro nad gzhan thams cad lta smos kyang
ci 'tshal lags/ gang dag rims nad nyin gcig pa dang / nyin gnyis pa dang / nyin gsum pa dang / nyin bzhi pa dang / nyin mtshan du bro 'tshal ba'am/ rlung dang / mkhris pa'am/ bad kan la sogs

pas bro 'tshal ba dag la r-ig sngags 'di bzlas brjod bgyis par gyur na thams cad 'byang zhing sos par 'gyur lags so/ /gang zhig dug dang byad stems kyis phog par gyur tam/ lhog pa dang / g.yan pa dang /

mdze nad dam/ phol mig gam/ rlung nad dam/ smyos pa'am/ klad pa bro 'tshal ba'am/ rna ba dang / sna dang / mchu dang / lce dang / mid pa dang / kha dang / gdong dang / gtsug dang / klad rgyas dang / brang dang / rtsib

logs dang / snying dang / lto ba dang / rked pa dang / rgyab dang / rkang pa dang / lag pa la sogs pa thams cad bro 'tshal bar gyur na yang thams cad sos par bgyid/ ji tsam du lus kyi bro nad ci mchis pa thams cad
kyang sos par bgyid lags so/ /gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / bi na ya ka dang / bdud sdig can dang / 'dre gdon dag gis kyang gnod par bgyid par mi 'gyur lags so/ /mtshon cha dang / dmag tshogs

dang / chab dang / zhugs dang / rlung dang / char pa dang / ser ba ma rungs pa dag gis kyang 'jigs par mi 'gyur ro/ /dgra dang / chom rkun dang / rgyal po ma rungs pa dang / rkun po ma rungs pa dag gis kyang gnod par bgyid

par mi 'gyur ro/ /glo bur du 'chi ba'i dus byed par mi 'gyur/ rmi lam ngan pa rmi bar mi 'gyur/ rtsangs pa dang / sbrul dang / sdig pa dang / srin bu gyi med dang / rkang mang dang / gcan zan gdug pa ma rungs pa dang / seng ge dang / stag

dang / spyang ki dag gis kyang gnod pa bgyid par mi 'gyur lags so/ /g.yul ngor 'thab pa'i tshe thams cad du rgyal bar 'gyur lags so/ /gal te bla'i bgyi ba dag gis rtsod par gyur na yang 'dum par 'gyur te/ gzungs

'di lan cig bzlas na gong du bstan pa de dag thams cad yid bzhin du 'grub par 'gyur lags so/ /gang la la zhig gis gdugs re gzungs 'di lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bgyis na/ byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras

gzigs dbang phyug gis 'di skad du/ rigs kyi bu khyod ma 'jigs shig /ci zhig smon cing ci zhig yongs su gnyer bar byed/ thams cad khyod la sbyin no zhes bsgo bar 'gyur/ de bzhin gshegs pa tshe dpag med kyang sku

mngon du ston par 'gyur/ mdo las gsungs pa bzhin du 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can gyi bkod pa'i dngos po dag kyang mthong bar 'gyur/ 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can gy-i byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs rnams kyang mthong

bar 'gyur/ phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas thams cad kyang mthong bar 'gyur/ byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi gnas ri bo po ta la yang mthong bar 'gyur/ bdag nyid kyi lus kyang yongs su dag par

'gyur bas rtag par rgyal po dang / blon po rnams kyis bkur zhing rim gro bgyid par 'gyur/ skye bo mang pos byams shing bkur bar 'gyur/ skye ba thams cad du ma'i mngal du mi skye zhing pad ma'i steng du skye bar 'gyur bkod pa

mchog dang ldan par 'gyur/ skye ba thams cad du sngon gyi gnas rjes su dran par 'gyur/ 'di nas mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba'i bar du nam yang ngan 'gro rnams su mi lhung zhing rtag par sangs rgyas kyi spyan sngar skye bar
'gyur lags te/ 'di ni sdig pa'i las thams cad rnam par 'joms pa'i gzungs zhes bgyi ba lags so/ /sdig pa thams cad rnam par 'joms pa'i gzungs kyi le'u ste dang po'o// // de nas byang chub

sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug sems can la snying brtse ba'i phyir yang yid bzhin gyi 'khor lo'i snying po'i gzungs gsang ba'i cho ga bstan pa su yang rung ba gces pa'i don grub pa zhig mchis na/ thams cad rang

zhi bar 'gyur lags so/ /de yang rnam pa gnyis te/ 'di lta ste/ 'jig rten gyi nor dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa'i nor gang lags so/ /de la 'jig rten pa'i nor ni gser dang / dngul la sogs pa'i rin po che

rnams so/ /'jig rten las 'das pa'i nor ni bsod nams dang / ye shes kyi bkod pa rnam pa gnyis dang ldan zhing lus dang sems rab tu bde ba dang / skye bo mang pos byams shing bkur ba dang / sdug bsngal ba'i sems

can thams cad yongs su skyob pa dang / byams pa'i sems rgyas nas blo dang ldan pa rnams bde ba stsol ba dang / 'tsho ba'i yo byad 'phel zhing mthu stobs rtag pa gang lags pa'o/ /gsang ba'i mdzod kyi spyod yul 'di ni gzhan dag

la brjod par mi bgyi'o/ /gang la la zhig bdag gi yid bzhin gyi 'khor lo'i gzungs kyi dngos grub mchog thob par 'tshal na/ sems rtse gcig tu dus thams cad dang / gnas thams cad du gtsang yang rung / mi gtsang yang
rung ste/ rtag par bzlas brjod bgyis na nongs pa ci yang ma mchis pas bzlas brjod bgyi ba'i grangs tshang bar bgyis nas/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi ming dang /
yid bzhin gyi 'khor lo'i gzungs kyi ming dang / gang zag de'i ming nas brjod de/ gal te rgyal po'am/ rgyal bu 'am/ btsun mo 'am/ sras sam/ rgyal po'i bu mo 'am/ bram ze 'am/ rgyal rigs sam/
dmangs rigs sam/ gdol pa 'am/ skyes pa 'am/ bud med dam/ khye'u 'am/ bu mo gzhon nu ma 'am/ mu stegs sna tshogs dag la brten cing / mdza' bar 'tshal na de dag gi ming nas brjod de rtag par

tho rangs kyi tshe/ bzlas pa'i grangs tshang bar bgyi'o/ /gal te dngos grub mchog gnyer zhing rgyal po la brten par 'tshal na/ dgung zhag bdun gyi bar du rtag par tho rangs kyi tshe lan stong rtsa brgyad
bzlas na mjal bar 'gyur lags so/ /gal te btsun mo la brten par 'tshal na lan dgu brgya bzlas par bgyi'o/ /rgyal bu la brten par 'tshal na lan brgyad brgya bzlas par bgyi'o/ /sras dag
mthong bar 'tshal na lan bdun brgya bzla bar bgyi'o/ /rgyal po'i bu mo la brten par 'tshal na lan drug brgya bzla bar bgyi'o/ /bram ze la brten par 'tshal na lan lnga brgya bzla bar bgyi'o/ /
rgyal rigs la brten par 'tshal na lan bzhi brgya bzla bar bgyi'o/ /dmangs rigs la ni sum brgya'o/ /gdol pa la ni nyis brgya'o/ /dge slong dang / dge slong ma la ni lan brgya'o/ /

dge bsnyen dang / dge bsnyen ma la ni lan dgu bcu'o/ /khye'u gzhon nu dang / bu mo gzhon nu ma la ni lan drug bcu'o/ /'di ni brten cing mdza' bar bgyi ba'i cho ga zhes bgyi ste/ nor dang / bran dang / rta dang /
bde ba'i yo byad thams cad 'byor par bgyid lags so/ /gang la la zhig snying du sdug cing mdza' ba dag ring po na mchi ba dang mjal bar 'tshal na yid la bsams pa bzhin du rlung bzhin du mchi bar 'gyur
lags so/ /ci bgyi'o 'tshal bzlas brjod bgyi ba'i grangs tshang bar gyur na don de dag 'grub par 'gyur lags so/ /gal te byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug mthong bar 'tshal
na lan stong rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bgyis na de'i lus yang dag pa nyid mthong zhing bsam pa thams cad rdzogs par bgyid lags so/ /gal te lag na rdo rje mthong bar 'tshal na bzlas brjod lan khri
bgyis na lus mngon sum du bstan nas/ de la brtse zhing phas bu la byams pa bzhin du sems kyi smon pa rnams stsol bar 'gyur lags so/ /gal te sangs rgyas dang / 'khor 'dus pa mang po mthong
bar 'tshal na lan khri sum stong bzlas brjod bgyis na de bzhin du mthong bar 'gyur lags so/ /gal te gdugs mtshan bdun gyi bar du rgyun chad pa ma mchis par bzlas brjod bgyis na rig sngags 'chang

rnams mngon sum du ston cing / so so nas rang rang gi sngags kyi mthu ci mchis pa gang zag de la stsal nas yongs su bsrung bar bgyid de/ zhag bdun pa la ni stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi

khams kyi dbang po dang / brgya byin lha'i dbang po rnams 'khor dang bcas te mchis nas de'i smon pa rnams stsol bar bgyid do/ /bzlas brjod kyi cho ga gong du bstan pa bzhin du bgyis na smon pa rnams yongs su rdzogs
par bgyid de/ 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi gsang ba'i mdzod las thams cad byams shing mos par 'gyur ba'i cho ga zhes bgyi ba lags so/ /byang chub sems dpa' spyan
ras gzigs dbang phyug gi gsang ba'i mdzod las thams cad byams shing mos par 'gyur ba'i cho ga'i le'u ste/ gnyis pa'o// // de nas byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs
dbang phyug gzhan yang sems can rnams la snying brtse ba'i phyir/ gang gis mthong ba dag byams shing dga' bar 'gyur ba'i sman sbyar nas lus la thogs te 'gro na mchog tu mngon par 'grub cing bsam

pa thams cad yid bzhin du 'grub pa'i cho ga bstan pa/ 'gi'u wang dang / tsan dan dkar po dang / gur gum dang / ga pur dang / gla rtsi dang / 'dza' ti pa la dang / li shi dang / ka ko la dang / pad ma dang / ut+pal
sngon po dang / gser gyi gyim bag rnams cha mnyam par bgyis te/ brdungs nas sbrang rtsi dkar pos sbrus te/ snga ma'i sngags stong rtsa brgyad bzlas nas lus la gdugs sam/ gos la bdugs sam/
mig la bskus sam/ dpral ba la thig le bgyis sam/ lus la byugs na rgyal po dang / btsun mo dang / blon po rnams dang / gra ma rnams dang / skyes pa dang / bud med la sogs pa byams shing dga'
ba dang / lam gyi chos la bkur zhing byang chub tu sems bskyed nas/ lus kyi zho sha dang / nor rdzas dag phangs pa ma mchis par gtong zhing rim gro bgyid par 'gyur te/ brjod kyis mi lang lags so/ /
ji ltar nyi zla thams cad kyis mthong bar mos pa bzhin du sgrub pa'i don rnams 'byor cing 'grub par 'gyur lags so/ /gang la la zhig sman 'di thogs par 'gyur na kha na ma tho ba'i sgrib pa rnams zhu

byang nas bgegs thams cad las thar bar 'gyur lags so/ /rgyal po'i mthus nan gyis 'phrog pa dang / chab kyis ded pa dang / zhugs kyis tshig pa dang / mtshon cha rnam pa sna tshogs dang / dug dang / 'ching ba'i
nyon mongs pa thams cad las thar bar 'gyur lags so/ /bsam pa thag pa nas sman a ka ta sbyor ba'i cho ga 'di bgyis na thams cad kyis byams shing dga' bar 'gyur lags so/ /sman 'dis bdugs pas bab
chol du g.yar khar stsal bar bgyi ste/ 'di ni spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis gzhan dag la byams shing dga' bar 'gyur ba'i sman gyi cho ga zhes bgyi lags so/ /byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs
dbang phyug gi yid bzhin gyi 'khor lo'i gzungs las gzhan dag la byams shing dga' bar 'gyur ba'i sman a ka ta sbyor ba'i cho ga'i le'u ste gsum pa'o// // byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras

gzigs dbang phyug gis/ gzhan yang sems can rnams la snying brtse ba'i phyir thams cad kyi yid du 'ong zhing dga' bar 'gyur ba'i sman khar mur ba'i cho ga bstan pa/ ga pur dang / gla rtsi dang / gur kum zhib mor

btags te/ 'gi'u wang dang bsres na gong du bstan pa'i sngags rnam pa gsum re re yang lan stong rtsa brgyad bzlas te/ chab gtsang mas sbyar nas ri lu che chung shing mgo stong gi 'bras bu tsam du bgyis te/
yang sngags gong ma gsum lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas nas grib ma la skams te/ gdugs dang / rlung gis ma phog par bgyis nas ri lu re re la yang gong ma'i sngags rnam pa gsum lan bdun bdun gyis

btab ste/ ri lu gcig khar mur nas rgyal po 'am/ blon po nye phan nam/ skye bo'i tshogs mang po dag la gtam bgyis par gyur na bkur sti bgyis nas/ nor dang / rin po che dag phangs pa ma mchis par ci dang
ci 'tshal ba thams cad stsol bar 'gyur/ tshig tu smras so 'tshal thams cad kyis yid ches shing nyan par 'gyur/ bsgo ba zhig mchis na yang thams cad nyan cing bgyid par 'gyur lags so/ /khar sman
mur ba'i tshe rtag par sngags bzla 'tshal te/ spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis smon pa rnams 'grub par bgyid lags so/ /byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi gzugs kyi mdun du

spos chab kyis dkyil 'khor gru bzhi chu zheng khru bzhis 'khor ba gcig bgyis te/ dkyil 'khor gyi nang du rtsi shing gi me tog rnam pa sna tshogs ci 'byor pa bkram shing tsan dan dkar po bsregs nas sman gyi ri lu

snga ma blangs te dkyil 'khor gyi nang du gzhag nas/ rgyal mtshan bzhi gzugs shing / yol ba dang / bla re dkar po bres te dkyil 'khor gyi steng du pad ma dkar po bzhi yang bris te/ byang chub sems dpa'

spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la mchod pa bgyis lags pa'i rjes la snying po'i sngags dang / snying gi snying po'i sngags lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzla bar bgyi'o/ /lus kyi sngags kyang lan brgya rtsa brgyad
bzlas nas tsan dan dkar po bsregs te/ me tog gtor na de'i tshe smon pa thams cad kyang 'grub par 'gyur la/ dkyil 'khor gyi nang na mchis pa'i sman blangs te lus la btags na phyogs gang du mchi yang
rung ste/ ci dang ci gnyer ba thams cad 'grub par 'gyur/ tshig du smras pa thams cad kyis yid ches shing nyan par 'gyur/ don du sgrub pa thams cad 'grub par 'gyur lags so/ /sems rtse gcig tu
ma bgyis pa ni ma gtogs te/ 'di ni yid bzhin gyi 'khor lo las sman mur ba'i cho ga zhes bgyi lags so/ /byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi yid bzhin gyi 'khor
lo las sman mur ba'i cho ga'i le'u ste bzhi pa'o// // de nas byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis gzhan yang sems can rnams la snying brtse ba'i phyir skye bo mang po

thams cad kyis mthong na byams shing dga' bar 'gyur ba'i cho ga bstan pa/ man shi ri ka ku shu dang / pad ma leb rgan dang / pad ma sngon po dang / rgya mtsho'i chab kyi dbu ba dang / nya rkun ma nag po'i rus pa dang /

ba blas dang / ka kun pan s+ya dang / 'gi'u wang dang / gur kum dang / rgya'i gur gum dang / pi pi ling dang / na le sham dang / bca' lga rnams cha mnyam par bgyis te/ brdungs nas zhib mor btsags te sman snga ma

srang cig mchis na gla rtsi dang / ga phur srang phyed stsal nas zhib tu bdar te/ spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi gzugs kyi mdun du sbyar ba bgyis lags pas/ snga ma'i sngags rnam pa gsum re re yang lan

stong rtsa brgyad bzlas te/ sems can thams cad la byams pa dang / snying brtse ba'i sems bskyed nas sman de dag byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi rkang pa'i drung du gzhag par bgyi'o/ /

de'i rjes la reg par bgyis nas/ khar ba'i thur mas blangs te mig tu stsal na mig dang / glad pa bro 'tshal ba dang / ling tog gis bsgribs pa thams cad dang / sprin dkar dang / mchi ma 'dzag pa dang / sprin
dmar dang / long nad dang / klad pa bro 'tshal ba thams cad sos par 'gyur lags so/ /rtag par gdugs re bzhin du sman 'di mig tu stsal na mig nad thams cad 'byang bar 'gyur lags so/ /

gdugs gnyis stsal na lus kyi bro nad thams cad 'byang bar 'gyur ro/ /gdugs gsum stsal na smyo ba'i bro nad rnam pa brgyad bcu rtsa bzhi 'byang bar 'gyur lags so/ /gdugs bzhi stsal na phyi nang gi sgrib pa

thams cad kyis sgrib par mi 'gyur ro/ /gdugs lnga stsal na dgra dang 'thab pa na thams cad du rgyal bar 'gyur ro/ /gdugs drug stsal na sdig pa'i las dang / nyon mongs pa dang / lci ba bzhi dang / mtshams ma

mchis pa lnga dang / rmi lam ngan pa dang / byad stem thams cad rnam par 'jom shing / ngan 'gro rnams su nam yang ltung bar mi 'gyur lags so/ /gdugs bdun stsal na rgyal po dang / blon po chen po dang / skye bo mang po thams

cad rjes su 'brang zhing bkur sti bgyis nas yid ches shing byams par 'gyur ro/ /zhag bdun phrag gnyis kyi bar du stsal na rang dbang chen po thob par 'gyur ro/ /zhag bdun phrag gsum gyi bar du stsal na rgyal po dang /

blon po chen po dag dang mdza' bar 'gyur ro/ /zhag bdun phrag bzhi'i bar du stsal na gnod sbyin 'khor dang bcas pa rnams rim gro bgyid par 'gyur ro/ /zhag bdun phrag lnga'i bar du stsal na lha ma yin dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin rnams

dang / srin po rnams g.yog bgyid par 'gyur ro/ /zhag bdun phrag drug gi bar du stsal na nam mkha' lding dang / srin po mthu chen po dang ldan pa rnams kyis mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba'i bar du yongs su bsrung

bar bgyid pas/ byad stems dang / 'dre gdon rnams kyis tshugs par mi 'gyur ro/ /zhag bdun phrag bdun gyi bar du stsal na lha nag po chen po dang / 'dre srin brgyad rnams nye bar lhags nas rjes su 'brang zhing g.yog

bgyid par 'gyur ro/ /zhag bdun phrag brgyad kyi bar du stsal na an+t+ra da nar 'gyur ro/ /zhag bdun phrag dgu'i bar du stsal na gter thams cad mthong bar 'gyur ro/ /zhag bdun phrag bcu'i bar du stsal na lha ma yin

gyi khang khyim gyi sgo rang bye nas/ de na ci mchis pa thams cad mthong bar 'gyur/ 'byung zhing 'jug pa la thogs pa ma mchis par 'gyur ro/ /zhag bdun phrag bcu gcig gi bar du stsal na sman zhugs ltar 'bar ba

ji snyed pa thams cad mngon sum du dga' bar 'gyur bas tshe ring bar 'gyur 'tshal lam/ mthu chen po dang ldan par 'tshal na de bzhin du 'grub par 'gyur ro/ /zhag bdun phrag bcu gnyis kyi bar du stsal na drang srong mang po rnams kyis

rin po che'i gter rnams phye ste/ nye bar bstan nas yid bzhin du longs spyod par 'gyur ro/ /zhag bdun phrag bcu gsum gyi bar du stsal na/ klu'i gzhal med khang rnams sgo rang bye nas lta ba dag la thogs pa ma mchis par

'gyur ro/ /zhag bdun phrag bcu bzhi'i bar du stsal na 'dod pa'i khams kyi lha rnams kyi gzhal med khang dag sgo rang bye bar 'gyur bas thams cad mthong bar 'gyur ro/ /zhag bdun phrag bcwa lnga'i bar du stsal

na mtshan mo mun nag gi nang du yang gdugs bzhin du gsal bar 'gyur ro/ /zhag bdun phrag bcu drug gi bar du stsal na sa'i 'og gi rdo rje'i sa gzhi dang / rlung gi dkyil 'khor yang mthong bar 'gyur ro/ /zhag bdun
phrag bcu bdun gyi bar du stsal na gling bzhi po rnams su sems can dmyal ba'i sems can ji snyed mchis pa yang thams cad mthong bar 'gyur la/ de'i mthu'i dbang gis sdug bsngal myong ba'i sems can

de dag thams cad kyang thar bar 'gyur ro/ /zhag bdun phrag bcwa brgyad kyi bar du stsal na gang zag de nyi ma lta bu'i mthu thob par 'gyur ro/ /zhag bdun phrag bcu dgu'i bar du stsal na lag na rdo rje'i lus yang dag

pa nyid mthong bar 'gyur bas smon pa rnams yongs su rdzogs par bgyid do/ /zhag bdun phrag nyi shu'i bar du stsal na spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug snying rje chen po dang ldan pa mthong bar 'gyur bas smon pa

thams cad yongs su rdzogs par bgyid do/ /zhag bdun phrag nyi shu rtsa gcig gi bar du stsal na rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa thob par 'gyur/ gzugs kyi khams kyi lha rnams kyi gzhal med khang gi sgo rnams rang bye nas

thams cad mthong bar 'gyur ro/ /phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnams dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa rnams kyang mthong bar 'gyur ro/ /lo gcig gi bar du stsal na yongs
su dag pa'i mig lnga 'thob par 'gyur lags so/ /gang la la zhig spyod pa'i cho ga 'di mngon par 'grub par 'tshal ba gang lags pa des bstan pa 'di la shin tu mngon par yid ches par bgyi
zhing / sems can la snying brtse bar bgyi ste/ the tshom ma mchis na gong du bstan pa bzhin du thams cad 'grub par 'gyur lags so/ /gal te the tshom 'tshal bar 'gyur na cho ga rnams grub par dka' ste/
'di ni spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi tsan dan de'i nor bu'i 'khor lo las mig sman gyi cho ga zhes bgyi ba lags so/ /byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi sems kyi 'khor
lo las/ mig gi sman gyi le'u ste/ lnga pa'o// // de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis gzhan yang sems can rnams la snying brtse ba'i phyir/ sgrub pa'i don thams

cad grub par byed pa/ nyon mongs pa dang / kha na ma tho ba'i sgrib pa dang las ngan pa thams cad rnam par 'jom pa/ dgra thams cad 'dul ba/ bi nA ya ka khro ba'i sems nye bar zhi nas skye bo mang po la gnod pa mi

byed cing / byams pa'i sems skye bar 'gyur ba/ sbyin sreg hoM bkra shis kyi cho ga bstan pa/ dog sa brkos te zhugs thab khru gang gru bzhi pa cig bgyis nas me tog ma len tsa su dang / yungs kar dang / zho dang /
sbrang rtsi dang / chab mar cha mnyam par bsres te/ a ga ru dang / tsan dan dang / shing dri can so so nas srid du sor bcu gnyis zheng du sor gcig mchis pa gtubs te/ thab tu bsreg par bgyi zhing

sman nyung zad cig blangs nas lan cig sngags kyis btab ste/ zhugs kyi nang du dor ba lan stong rtsa brgyad tshang bar bgyis na las kyi bsgrib pa thams cad rnam par 'jom zhing / tshe lo brgya nyi shu thub par 'gyur

lags so/ /zhag bdun gyi bar du rgyun chad pa ma mchis par hoM gyi cho ga bzhin bgyis na tshe lo stong thub cing lus kyang yongs su dag par 'gyur ro/ /zhag bdun phrag gnyis kyi bar du cho ga bgyis na rgyal po dang /

rgyal bu dang / blon po chen po nye phan dang / skye bo phal pa rnams kyang skyabs su mchis nas bsnyen bkur bgyid par 'gyur ro/ /zhag bdun phrag gsum gyi bar du cho ga bzhin du bgyis na sum bcu rtsa gsum

gyi lha rnams 'khor dang bcas pa dang / nyi zla'i lha dang / rgyal po chen po bzhi 'khor dang bcas pa yang nye bar lhags nas yongs su srung bar 'gyur/ lag na rdo rjes kyang dngos grub chen po stsol bar 'gyur/
byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis kyang smon pa chen po rnams yongs su skong bar 'gyur lags so/ /gal te yul khams su char dkon par gyur na yungs kar dang / chab mar la sngags
'dis btab ste/ gdugs gsum gyi bar du zhugs kyi nang du bsregs na char pa 'bab par 'gyur/ gal te char ches te mi khums na thab de'i thal ba blangs nas sngags lan brgya rtsa brgyad kyis btab
ste/ gnam du gtor na char pa khums par 'gyur ro/ /gal te ser ba ma rungs pa babs sam/ rlung drag po glo bur du langs par gyur na yang thal ba de blangs nas lan brgya rtsa brgyad sngags kyis btab ste/
sprin mchis pa'i phyogs su gtor na zhi bar 'gyur lags so/ /sngags 'di rtag par bzlas brjod bgyis na mthu stobs mthu bo che dang 'dra bar 'gyur bas/ lus 'di spangs nas 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can

du skye bar 'gyur/ mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba'i bar du skye ba thams cad du sngon gyi gnas rjes su dran pa thob par 'gyur lags so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang

phyug gis 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das tsan dan gyi snying po'i 'khor lo'i gzungs 'di bdag gis bstan pa bzhin du dge slong ngam/ dge slong ma'am dge bsnyen nam/ dge bsnyen ma 'am/ skyes pa 'am/

bud med gang la la zhig gis lan cig 'chang bar bgyid na gdon mi za bar 'grub par 'gyur bas the tshom gyi bsam pa bskyed par mi bgyi'o/ /yid la bsams pa'i don thams cad thob par 'gyur bas shin tu mngon

par yid ches par bgyi zhing the tshom bskyed par mi bgyi'o/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la khyod snying rje chen pos yid bzhin gyi 'khor lo'i gzungs kyi cho
ga gya nom pa 'di yang dag par bshad de/ 'dzam bu'i gling gi sems can thams cad la phan pa dang / bde bar byas pa legs so legs so zhes bsngags pa brjod do/ /gang la la zhig gis sems bskyed de

kha nas bzlas brjod byas na dngos grub thob par 'gyur ro/ /de ltar yin mod kyi ngas bstan pa bzhin du sems can rnams la yang nas yang du nan tan brtson 'grus kyis rjes su bstan nas dngos grub thob par

bya ba'i ched du lus nye bar ston la/ nga'i tshig dag 'gal bar ma byed cig dang / nga yang rjes su yi rang ngo / /de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis 'di skad
ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das bdag ni bskal pa dpag tu ma mchis pa nas byams pa dang brtse ba'i sems kyis sems can la rjes su ston cing / rtag par yongs su bsrungs nas dngos grub stsal

bar ni bcom ldan 'das nyid mkhyen cing dbang du gyur pa lags so/ /sems can rnams kyi slad du yid bzhin gyi 'khor lo'i gzungs 'di bshad pa lags pas/ gang la la zhig gis len cing 'chang ba dang rtag par

bdag nyid bzlas brjod bgyi ba'i grangs tshang bar bgyis na smon pa rnams grub par 'gyur te/ bdag ni de ltar bcom ldan 'das kyi byin gyi rlabs kyi mthus sems can thams cad sdug bsngal ba rnams yongs su bskyab
par bgyid pa lags so/ /de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis yid bzhin gyi 'khor lo'i gzungs 'di smras pa dang / 'khor 'dus pa chen po thams cad rab tu

dga' nas mngon par yid ches pas yang dag par blangs te spyod par gyur to/ /byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi yid bzhin gyi 'khor lo'i gzungs las/ sbyin sreg hom gyi cho ga sman sbyor ba'i
le'u ste drug pa'o/ /'phags pa byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi gsang ba'i mdzod thogs pa med pa'i yid bzhin gyi 'khor lo'i snying po zhes bya ba'i gzungs rdzogs s+ho// //

zhu chen gyi mkhan po dang lo ts+tsha ba bcom ldan 'das kyi ring lugs pa ban de chos grub kyis rgya'i dpe las bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o/ /zhus dag /yang zhus te dag par thang rgyal ring mos bgyis/ /

@/ /rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya a ba lo ki te shwa ra nA ma d+hA ra NI/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi gzungs zhes bya ba/ 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs thugs rje chen po dang ldan pa la phyag

'tshal lo/ /'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug byams pa'i ngang las snying rje'i shugs kyis byang chub kyi sems rab tu bskyed nas/ pad ma dang / nyi ma dang / zla ba'i gdan la hrIH'i 'phro 'du las zhal gcig pa

la phyag bzhi pa/ dang po gnyis thal mo sbyar ba/ g.yas 'og ma na bgrang phreng mu tig dkar po/ g.yon 'og ma na pad ma dkar po bsnams pa/ sku mdog dkar po zhabs rdzogs pa'i skyil dkrung bcas pa/ rin po che'i rgyan

sna tshogs dang / rin po che'i dbu rgyan gyis mdzes pa/ ma lha mo drug ma dang / yab nor bu rin po ches brten pa/ byang chub sems dpa' dang / sems ma rab tu mang pos bskor te 'di skad ces gsungs so/ /rigs kyi bu'am
rigs kyi bu mos sngags 'di lan cig tsam brjod dam dran zhing yid la byas sam/ bris nas lus la bcangs sam/ mos shing gus par byas na mtshams med pa lnga dang / de dang nye ba'i sdig pa'i las thams cad

byang zhing / ngan song gsum dang / mi khom pa brgyad dang / sdug bsngal dang bcas par mi skye'o/ /mi dang mi ma yin pa dang / gcan zan gyis 'jigs pa thams cad las grol bar 'gyur ro/ /nad dang / gdon thams cad

las thar bar 'gyur ro/ /oM ma Ni pad me hU~M zhes brjod pas 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs kyi zhal mthong bar 'gyur zhing / tshe 'phos nas kyang bde ba can du skye ste/ 'di la the tshom 'am som nyi 'am/ yid
gnyis ma za cig /'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi gzungs rdzogs s+ho// // sangs rgyas la phyag 'tshal lo/ /chos la phyag 'tshal lo/ /dge 'dun la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'phags pa spyan ras
gzigs kyi dbang po byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de rnams la phyag 'tshal nas rig pa 'di brjod kyis rig pa 'di bdag la grub par gyur cig /tad+ya thA ha ha ha sa ne

ne pa sa ne/ ta pa ta pa ni/ dz+wA la dz+wA la ne/ tsa la tsa la ne/ pUrba yo ga sma ra pad ma hastA ya swA hA/ gang gis rig pa 'di bklags pa de tshe rabs brgya stong du skye ba dran par 'gyur te/ 'di nas shi 'phos nas kyang bde ba can

gyi 'jig rten du skye bar 'gyur ro/ /'phags pa spyan ras gzigs kyi snying po rdzogs s+ho// //dag yang zhus/ / @#/ /rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya a ba lo ki te shwa ra e ka da sha mu kha nA ma d+hA ra NI/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang
phyug zhal bcu gcig pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug rig sngags
'chang du mas yongs su bskor te/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ bcom ltan 'das kyi zhabs la lan gsum bskor ba byas nas phyogs gcig tu
'dug ste/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das snying po gdong bcu gcig pa zhes bgyi ba 'di ni/ sangs rgyas bye ba phrag bcu gcig gis gsungs pa lags te/ de sems can thams cad

la sman pa dang bro nad thams cad rab tu zhi bar bgyid pa dang sdig pa dang bkra mi shis pa dang / rmi lam ngan pa thams cad zlog par bgyid pa dang / dus ma lags par 'gum pa thams cad zlog par bgyid pa dang ma

zhugs pa rnams dad par bgyi ba dang / bgegs dang log 'dren rnams rab tu zhi bar bgyi ba'i slad du bshad par bgyi'o/ /bcom ldan 'das snying po 'dis bsrung ba bgyis pa dang / yongs su bskyab pa dang / yongs su

gzung ba bgyis pa dang / zhi ba dang bde legs su 'gyur ba bgyis pa dang chad pa spangs pa dang / mtshon cha spangs pa dang / dug gzhil ba bgyis pa dang / gang la la zhig 'gal ba bgyid pa de ma mchis te/ de ni 'jig rten

lha dang bcas pa/ bdud dang bcas pa/ tshangs pa dang bcas pa/ dge sbyong dang bram zer bcas pa na bdag gis ma mthong ste/ sngon gyi las kyi rnam par smin pa ni ma gtogs lags so/ /snying po 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan
'das thams cad kyis bstod cing dgongs pa lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das bdag gi snying po 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis rjes su thugs rung bar mdzad pa lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das bdag gis dran

lags te/ bskal pa gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi snga rol na de bzhin gshegs pa pad ma brgya'i spyan gtsug gis chags pa'i dus 'joms pa'i 'od zer gyi rgyal po zhes bgyi ba byung ste/ bdag drang srong du gyur

pas de bzhin gshegs pa de las 'di mnos lags te/ thos ma thag tu phyogs bcu'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mngon du gyur/ mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa yang thob ste/ de ltar bdag gi snying po 'di ni gces
spras bgyid pa lags so/ /de ltar lags pas rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo dad pa dang ldan pas gus par bgyis la snying po 'di brjod par bya'o/ /gzhan yid la mi bgyid par rtag tu brjod par bgyi'o/ /

nang par langs nas brgya rtsa brgyad bton na tshe 'di la yon tan bcu yongs su 'dzin par 'gyur te/ bcu gang zhe na/ bro nad ma mchis par 'gyur ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis yongs su gzung bar

'gyur ba dang / des bsgrim mi 'tshal bar nor dang 'bru dang dbyig rnams rnyed par 'gyur ba dang / dgra thams cad khugs shing thul bar 'gyur ba dang / rgyal po'i tshogs rnams gsong por smra bar sems par 'gyur ba dang /
lus la dug gis mi tshugs pa dang / dbyig dug gis mi tshugs pa dang / rims kyis mi tshugs pa dang / mtshon gyis mi tshugs par 'gyur ba dang / chab kyis 'gum pa'i dus bgyid par mi 'gyur ba dang /
zhugs kyis 'gum pa'i dus bgyid par mi 'gyur ba dang / dus ma lags par 'gum pas 'gum pa'i dus bgyid par mi 'gyur ba lags so/ /gzhan yang yon tan bzhi yongs su 'dzin par 'gyur te/

'gum pa'i dus kyi tshe de bzhin gshegs pa mthong bar 'gyur ba dang / ngan song rnams su skye bar mi 'gyur ba dang / ya nga ba ma spangs pas 'gum pa'i dus bgyid par mi 'gyur ba dang / 'di nas shi 'phos nas kyang 'jig

rten gyi khams bde ba can du skye bar 'gyur ba lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das bdag gis dran lags te/ 'di nas bskal pa gang gA'i klung bcu'i bye ma snyed dag gi snga rol gyi yang ches snga rol na de bzhin gshegs

pa man dA ra ba'i bsung zhes bgyi ba byung ste/ de na bdag khyim par gyur pas 'di gzung nas bskal pa bzhi khri'i 'khor ba phyir bsnyil lags so/ /bdag gis snying po 'di bton pas byang chub sems dpa'i rnam

par thar pa/ rgyal ba thams cad kyi snying rje 'jug pa ye shes kyi snying po zhes bgyi ba thob lags so/ /gang dag bcing bas bcings pa rnams dang / gang dag bcing ba la thug pa rnams dang / chab dang / zhugs dang / sdug

bsngal rnam pa sna tshogs kyis nyen pa'i sems can thams cad la bdag gi snying po 'dis gnas dang bskyab pa dang skyabs dang dpung gnyen bgyi'o/ /gnod sbyin dang / srin po sdang ba rnams kyang snying po 'dis bkug la

byams pa'i sems dang snying rje'i sems su bgyi ste/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la dgod par bgyi'o/ /bcom ldan 'das bdag gi snying po 'di ni de ltar rdzu 'phrul che ba lags so/ /

lan cig brjod pas rtsa ba'i ltung ba bzhi po dag kyang byang bar 'gyur/ mtshams ma mchis pa lnga po dag kyang ma lus par 'byang bar 'gyur na/ ji skad bshad pa bzhin du nan tan bgyid pa lta smos kyang ci 'tshal/

de dag ni sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag du ma la dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed par 'gyur ba lags na/ bzlas brjod bgyid pa dang / sgrub pa lta smos kyang ci 'tshal te bsam pa thams cad yid bzhin du yongs su
rdzogs par bgyi'o/ /su zhig bdag gi slad du tshes bcu bzhi'am bcwa lnga la smyung ba bgyis na/ de bskal pa bzhi khri'i 'khor ba bsnyil bar 'gyur ba lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das bdag gi ming 'dzin pa
ni don mchis te sangs rgyas bye ba phrag 'bum gyi bas lhag lags so/ /bdag gi ming 'dzin pa'i sems can thams cad ni phyir mi ldog pa nyid la gnas par 'gyur/ bro nad thams cad las yongs su thar

bar 'gyur/ sgrib pa thams cad dang / lus dang ngag dang yid kyi nyes par spyod pa thams cad las yongs su thar bar 'gyur ba lags so/ /gang la la zhig cho ga bzhin du sbyor ba bgyid na de dag gi sug par sangs
rgyas kyi byang chub thob pa lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu khyod sems can thams cad la de ltar snying rje che ba legs so legs so/ /rigs kyi bu thabs 'dis sems can thams

cad bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la dgod par nus te/ ngas kyang snying po 'di gzung zhing rjes su yi rang ba byas kyis rigs kyi bu khyod smros shig /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug stan las langs te bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te snying po 'di smras so/ /na mo rat+na tra yA ya/

na ma Ar+ya dz+nyA na swa ga ra bai ro tsa na byu ha rA dzA ya/ ta thA ga tA ya/ na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH /ar hata b+h+yaH samyak+sa m+bu b+h+yaH /na ma Ar+ya a ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/ bo d+hi satwA ya/ ma hA satwA ya/ ma hA kA ru Ni kA ya/

tad+ya thA/ oM d+ha ra d+ha ra/ d+hi ri d+hi ri/ d+hu ru d+hu ru/ iT+Te baT+Te/ tsa le tsa le/ pra tsa le pra tsa le/ ku su me/ ku su ma/ ba re/ i li mi li/ tsi ti dz+wa la ma pa na ya swA hA/ 'di yi cho ga ni bsgrub mi dgos par las thams

cad byed de/ rims nyin gcig pa dang / nyin gnyis pa dang / nyin gsum pa dang / nyin bzhi pa dang / 'byung po dang / mkha' 'gro ma dang / 'dre dang lus srul po dang / brjed byed dang / lba ba dang / 'bras kyi phreng ba dang / bas lngags

la sogs pa dang / dug dang / phol mig dang / g.yan pa la sogs pa la 'jim pa la bsngags te bsku'o/ /lan bdun bzlas brjod bgyis na las kyi sgrib pa sbyong bar bgyi'o/ /byis pa gdon gyis zin pa la ni 'bru

mar ro/ /rna ba bro 'tshal ba la ni ru sta dang 'bru mar ro/ /rna ba bro 'tshal ba (zhes snar thang pa'i dpe ya )la blo la btags na des zhi bar 'gyur ro/ /bro nad thams cad la yang sbyar bar bgyis te bklags pas 'grub bo/ /'phags pa spyan ras

gzigs dbang phyug gi zhal bcu gcig pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs rdzogs s+ho// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po shI len tra bo d+hi dang / zhu chen gyi lo ts+tsha ba ban de ye shes sdes bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa/ rdzogs s+ho/ /

// | // rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya mu kha da shai ka bid+yA man+t+ra hr-i da ya nA ma d+hA ra NI/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa zhal bcu gcig pa'i rig sngags kyi snying po zhes bya ba'i gzungs/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems
dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na 'od ma'i myu gu'i dkyil 'khor na dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po stong nyis brgya lnga bcu dang
byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshad med grangs med pa dang thabs gcig tu bzhugs te/ byang chub sems dpa' byams pa ni gtso bor gyur to/ /gzhan yang de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das dge slong dang /

dge slong ma dang / dge bsnyen dang / dge bsnyen ma tshad med pa snyed dang / lha dang klu dang / gnod sbyin dang dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / grul bum dang sha za dang mi dang / mi ma yin

pa la sogs pa'i 'khor mang po dag gis yongs su bskor nas mchod cing rim gror byas/ bkur stir byas/ bla mar byas te gsang sngags brjod pa la chos ston par mdzad do/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'

chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug drang srong rig sngags 'chang bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong tshad med pa dag gis yongs su bskor te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar lhags nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la
mgo bos phyag byas te g.yas phyogs su lan gsum bskor ba byas nas/ phyogs gcig tu 'khod de/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das bdag la rig sngags kyi snying po gdong

bcu gcig pa zhes bgyi ba mthu chen po dang ldan pa/ sangs rgyas bye ba phrag bcu gcig gis gsungs pa mchis te/ deng bdag gis sems can thams cad la sman cing bde bar bgyid pa dang / bro nad thams cad zhi

bar bgyid pa dang / sdig pa thams cad sbyang ba dang / bkra mi shis pa thams cad bzlog par bgyi ba dang / rmi lam ngan pa thams cad dgag pa dang / dus ma lags par 'gum pa thams cad bzlog pa dang / ngan sems can

rnams gdul zhing dang ba thob par bgyi ba dang / mya ngan gyi sdug bsngal dang ldan pa dag bde ba thob par bgyi ba dang / 'khon dang bcas pa rnams 'dum par bgyi ba dang / bdud dang gdon bgegs rnams zhi bar bgyi ba dang

sems kyi smon pa rnams mngon par 'grub par bgyi ba'i slad du bshad par bgyi'o/ /bcom ldan 'das bdag gis ni 'jig rten lha dang bcas pa/ bdud dang bcas pa/ tshangs pa dang bcas pa/ dge sbyong dang bram zer bcas

pa la sogs pa la gang gis kyang rig sngags 'dis bsrung bar bgyis pa dang / 'di len pa dang / 'dzin pa dang / klog pa dang / 'don pa dang / yi ger bris nas spel bar bgyid pa de dag la bgegs bgyid pa dang /

bdud kyi bar chad dang / mtshon cha dang dbyig pa dang dug dang / byad stems thams cad kyis gnod pa bgyid par 'gyur ba ma lags so/ /bdag gis rig sngags 'di gnas pa'i phyogs su ring yang rung nye yang rung ste/ ci tsam du
mtshams bkum pa las 'das nas gnod pa bgyid du mchi ba ma mthong lags te/ sdig pa'i las nges par rnam par smin par gyur pa ni ma gtogs lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das des dngos po 'di nges par de lta bu
lags par rig par bgyis nas mngon par yid ches pas blang bar bgyi'o/ /rnam par rtog pa ni mi bgyi'o/ /de ltar bgyis na gdon bgegs thams cad thag ring du spong bas nye bar mchi zhing glags rnyed par mi
'gyur lags so/ /rig sngags kyi snying po 'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyis mtshungs par bsngags pa brjod cing mtshungs par rjes su thugs rangs par mdzad pa lags so/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis
dgongs shing yongs su bsrung ba mdzad pa lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das bdag gis mngon par dran lags te/ bskal pa gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi sngon rol na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag

par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas pad ma brgya'i spyan thogs pa mi mnga' ba'i gtsug tor yon tan rab tu rgyas pa'i 'od zer gyi rgyal po zhes bgyi ba 'jig rten du byung ste/ bdag de'i tshe drang srong du gyur pas bcom ldan 'das
de las rig sngags 'di mnos lags te/ rig sngags 'di thob pa'i tshe phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas rnams kyang mthong bar 'gyur/ mi skye ba'i chos kyi bzod pa yang thob par gyur pas rig sngags 'di mthu chen

po dang ldan par rig par bgyi lags so/ /de lta bas na yongs su dang ba dang ldan pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo la sogs pa dag gis rig sngags 'di len pa dang / 'dzin pa dang / klog pa dang / 'don par

'tshal na/ gus pas sems rtse gcig tu dran pas bcangs te/ rtag par nang par langs nas chos bzhin du yongs su dag par bgyis te/ rig sngags 'di lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bgyis na tshe 'di nyid la
phan yon rnam pa bcu thob par 'gyur ba lags so/ /bcu gang zhe na/ rtag par lus la bro nad ma mchis par 'gyur ba dang / rtag par phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis yongs su gzung bar 'gyur ba dang /

nor dang / rin po che dang gos dang / zas bas pa ma mchis pa dag la longs spyod par 'gyur ba dang / dgra thams cad thul cing 'jigs pa ma mchis par 'gyur ba dang / ya rabs btsun pa rnams kyis bkur zhing gsong

por smra bar 'gyur ba dang / dug dang 'dre gdon gyis mi tshugs shing gnod pa bgyid par mi 'gyur ba dang / mtshon cha dang / dbyig pa thams cad kyis gnod pa bgyid par mi 'gyur ba dang / chab kyis 'gum pa'i dus
bgyid par mi 'gyur ba dang / zhugs kyis 'gum pa'i dus bgyid par mi 'gyur ba dang / dus ma lags par 'gum pa'i dus bgyid par mi 'gyur ba dag lags so/ /gzhan yang yon tan gyi sman yon rnam pa bzhi

thob par 'gyur te/ 'gum pa'i dus kyi tshe sangs rgyas rnams mthong bar 'gyur ba dang / nam yang ngan 'gro rnams su lhung bar mi 'gyur ba dang / ya nga ba ma spangs pas 'gum pa'i dus bgyid par mi 'gyur ba

dang / 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can du skye bar 'gyur ba dag lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das bdag gis mngon par dran lags te/ 'di nas bskal pa gang gA'i klung bcu'i bye ma snyed dag gi snga rol gyi yang ches snga

rol na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas man dA ra ba'i dri bsung zhes bgyi ba 'jig rten du byung ste/ de'i tshe bdag khyim bdag chen po zhig tu gyur pas/ sangs rgyas
de la rig sngags 'di mnos lags te/ rig sngags 'di thob ma thag tu bskal pa bzhi khri'i 'khor ba bsnyil lags so/ /rig sngags 'di klog pa dang / 'dzin pa dag gis gzhan yang sangs rgyas rnams kyi thugs

rje chen po'i ye shes kyi snying po dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi rnam par thar pa'i chos kyi sgo thob par 'gyur te/ de'i mthu stobs kyi dbang gis gang dag btson ra dam por chud pa dang / btson rar stsal ba dang /

dgum pa la thug pa dang / chab dang / zhugs dang / rlung dang chom rkun dang / dug dang byad stems dang mi dang / mi ma lags pa la sogs pa'i sdug bsngal rnam pa sna tshogs kyi bgegs thams cad las yongs su skyob par

bgyid pa lags so/ /bdag ni 'di'i dbang gis sems can thams cad kyi gnas dang skyabs dang / yongs su skyob pa dang / yongs su bsrung ba dang / dbugs 'byin pa dang / gling dang khang khyim du gyur pa lags so/ /

rig sngags 'di'i mthus gnod sbyin dang / srin po ma rungs pa la sogs pa thams cad yongs su bsdus shing gzung nas sngar byams pa'i sems dang snying rje'i sems bskyed du stsal nas/ de'i rjes la bla na ma mchis
pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la dgod par bgyi lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das bdag gi rig sngags 'di gzi byin chen po'i mthu dang ldan pas/ gang la la zhig gis lan cig tsam bzlas brjod bgyis pa na

yang rtsa ba'i ltung ba bzhi dang / mtshams ma mchis pa lnga ma lus par yongs su 'byang bar 'gyur na/ ji skad bstan pa bzhin du sgrub pa lta smos kyang ci 'tshal lags/ gang dag sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong

du ma las dge ba'i rtsa ba skrun pa rnams kyis deng gdod rig sngags 'di thos par gyur pa lags na/ len pa dang 'dzin pa dang / ji skad bstan pa bzhin du sgrub pa lta smos kyang ci 'tshal lags/ gang la la zhig gis gdugs

mtshan du rig sngags 'di/ klog pa dang / 'don pa dang / 'dzin par bgyid na/ bdag gis de dag gi smon pa ci mchis pa yid bzhin du 'grub par bgyid lags so/ /gang la la zhig gis zla ba phyed cing tshes bcu bzhi'am

bcwa lnga la smyung ba bgyis te/ sdom pa yang dag par blangs nas chos bzhin du yongs su dag par bgyis te/ sems rtse gcig tu bdag rjes su dran par bgyis nas rig sngags 'di bzlas brjod bgyis na bskal pa
bzhi khri'i 'khor ba bsnyil bar 'gyur lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das bdag ni rig sngags 'di'i dbang gis ming btsun zhing thos par dka' bar 'gyur lags te/ gang la la zhig gis sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig

brgya stong du ma'i mtshan nas brjod cing yid la bsam pa dang / gzhan yang 'ga' zhig gis skad cig gcig tsam du bsam pa thag pa nas/ bdag gi ming nas brjod cing rjes su dran par gyur na de gnyis kyi yon tan mnyam

zhing mtshungs lags so/ /bdag gi ming nas brjod pa de dag thams cad kyang phyir mi ldog pa'i sa 'thob par 'gyur/ bro nad thams cad dang bral bar 'gyur/ sgrib pa thams cad dang 'jigs pa thams cad las thar bar

'gyur/ lus dang ngag dang yid kyi nongs pa zhu byang bar 'gyur na bdag gis bstan pa'i rig sngags 'di len pa dang / 'dzin pa dang / klog pa dang / 'don pa dang / ci skad bstan pa bzhin du sgrub pa lta smos kyang ci 'tshal
lags te/ gang zag de dag ni bla na ma mchis pa'i byang chub lag mthil na mchis pa bzhin du khong du chud cing legs par 'gyur bar rig par bgyi lags so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa'
spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la legs so legs so zhes bsngags pa brjod nas/ rigs kyi bu khyod kyis sems can thams cad la de lta bu'i byams pa dang snying rje'i bsam pa skyed nas/ rig sngags

chen po 'di rnam par phye ste bstan pa yin pas khyod thabs 'di'i dbang gis sems can thams cad kyi nad kyi sdug bsngal dang / sgrib pa dang bgegs dang 'jigs pa dang lus dang ngag dang / yid kyi nyes pa las yongs

su skyob cing thar bar byas nas sems can thams cad bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi bar la rnam par 'jog pa yin te/ rigs kyi bu nga yang rjes su yi rangs nas khyod kyi rig sngags yongs su
gzung nas khyod kyis smros shig /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug stan las langs te/ bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la
btsugs te/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /rig sngags 'di 'don pa gang lags pa des 'di skad du dkon mchog gsum la gus par phyag 'tshal lo/ /'phags pa de bzhin gshegs pa ye

shes rgya mtsho rnam par snang mdzad bkod pa'i rgyal po la gus par phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas thams cad la gus par phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub

sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug thugs rje chen po dang ldan pa la gus par phyag 'tshal lo zhes brjod par bgyi lags so/ /tad+ya thA/ oM d+ha ra d+ha ra/ d+hi ri d+hi ri/

d+hu ru d+hu ru/ i T+Te/ ba T+Te/ tsa le tsa le/ pra tsa le pra tsa le/ ku su me/ ku su me/ ba re i li mi li/ tsi ti tsi ti/ dz+wa la ma hA pa na ya/ shud+d+ha ta swA hA/ ma hA kA ru Ni kA ya swA hA/ bcom ldan 'das 'di rtsa ba'i rig sngags lags te/
gang la la zhig gis rjes su dran zhing bzlas brjod bgyis na gong du bstan pa lta bu'i yon tan khyad par du 'phags pa dag 'thob par 'gyur lags so/ /dkon mchog gsum la gus par phyag 'tshal lo/ /'phags
pa de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes rgya mtsho rnam par snang mdzad bkod pa'i rgyal po la gus par phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas thams cad la gus par

phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug thugs rje chen po dang ldan pa la gus par phyag 'tshal lo/ /tad+ya thA/ ha ha ha ha/ i li mi li/ tsi li pi li/
khi li hi li swA hA/ bcom ldan 'das 'di ni chab dang gos la gdab pa'i sngags lags te/ gang la la zhig dkyil 'khor du 'jug par 'tshal na sngar khrus bgyis te de'i rjes la sngags 'dis chab la lan bdun
btab ste lus la gtor nas bsang bar bgyi'o/ /gzhan yang sngags 'dis lan bdun btab ste bzod bgo bar bgyi lags so/ /dkon mchog gsum la gus par phyag 'tshal lo/ /'phags pa de bzhin gshegs
pa ye shes rgya mtsho rnam par snang mdzad bkod pa'i rgyal po la gus par phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas thams cad la gus par phyag 'tshal lo/ /

byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug thugs rje chen po dang ldan pa la gus par phyag 'tshal lo/ /tad+ya thA/ d+hu ru d+hu ru/ ha ha ha ha swA hA/ bcom ldan 'das 'di ni
pog spos dang / mar me la gdab pa'i sngags lags te/ dkyil 'khor du zhugs nas pog bsregs te mchod par bgyid pa'i tshe sngar sngags 'di pog spos la lan bdun btab ste/ gdod bsreg par bgyi'o/ /
mar me spar bar 'tshal na yang sngar sngags 'dis 'bru mar la lan bdun btab ste gdod mar me spar bar bgyi lags so/ /dkon mchog gsum la gus par phyag 'tshal lo/ /'phags pa de bzhin

gshegs pa ye shes rgya mtsho rnam par snang mdzad bkod pa'i rgyal po la gus par phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas thams cad la gus par phyag 'tshal

lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug thugs rje chen po dang ldan pa la gus par phyag 'tshal lo/ /tad+ya thA/ si ri si ri/ d+hi ri d+hi ri/ si ri d+hi ri swA hA/ bcom ldan

'das 'di ni me tog dang / byug spos dang / phreng ba la gdab pa'i sngags lags te/ dkyil 'khor du zhugs nas/ me tog dang / byug spos dang / phreng ba dag gis mchod pa bgyid pa'i tshe sngar sngags 'dis me tog la
lan bdun btab ste/ sku gzugs la gtor bar bgyi'o/ /gzhan yang sngags 'dis byug spos la lan bdun btab ste sku gzugs la byug par bgyi'o/ /gzhan yang sngags 'dis phreng ba la lan bdun btab
ste sku gzugs la brgyan par bgyi lags so/ /dkon mchog gsum la gus par phyag 'tshal lo/ /'phags pa de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes rgya mtsho rnam par snang mdzad bkod pa'i rgyal po la gus
par phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas thams cad la gus par phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan

ras gzigs dbang phyug thugs rje chen po dang ldan pa la gus par phyag 'tshal lo/ /tad+ya thA/ sa te sa te/ si ti si ti/ su d+hu su d+hu swA hA/ bcom ldan 'das 'di ni sangs rgyas la mchod cing dbul ba'i zhal zas
la gdab pa'i sngags lags te gang la la zhig zhal zas dang / me tog dang 'bras bu la sogs pas sangs rgyas la mchod pa'i tshe sngar sngags 'di lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas te btab nas de'i rjes la
gdod mchod par bgyid lags so/ /dkon mchog gsum la gus par phyag 'tshal lo/ /'phags pa de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes rgya mtsho rnam par snang mdzad bkod pa'i rgyal po la gus par phyag
'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas thams cad la gus par phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs

dbang phyug thugs rje chen po dang ldan pa la gus par phyag 'tshal lo/ / ('di snar thang pa'i dpe la mi 'dug)tad+ya thA/ ma si ta si/ tsa le tsa le/ hu ru hu ru/ tsu ru tsu ru/ su ru su ru/ mu ru mu ru/ swA hA/ bcom ldan 'das 'di ni yam shing la gdab pa'i
sngags lags te gal te la la zhig gong du bstan pa'i rtsa ba'i rig sngags kyis bgyi ba mchis te sngar sngags 'di me tog sha ta'i shing la lan cig gdab par bgyi'o/ /zhugs 'bud par 'tshal na logs

shig du me tog sha ta'i shing blangs nas dum bu sum bcur gtubs te/ zho dang mar dang sbrang rtsi'i nang du sbangs nas/ zhag lon par bgyis te gdugs re dum bu re re blangs nas sngags lan re btab ste zhugs kyi
nang du dor bar bgyi'o/ /de dag thams cad bas par bsregs nas de'i rjes la gdod bgyi ba ci mchis pa bgyi lags so/ /dkon mchog gsum la gus par phyag 'tshal lo/ /'phags pa de bzhin gshegs
pa ye shes rgya mtsho rnam par snang mdzad bkod pa'i rgyal po la gus par phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas thams cad la gus par phyag 'tshal lo/ /
byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug thugs rje chen po dang ldan pa la gus par phyag 'tshal lo/ /tad+ya thA/ i li mi li/ bi li ti li/ tsi li hi li/ swA hA/

bcom ldan 'das 'di ni mtshams dgum pa'i sngags lags te mtshams dgum par 'tshal na sngar sngags 'di chab la lan bdun btab ste phyogs bzhir gtor bar bgyi'o/ /yang na yungs kar ram thal ba gtsang ma la lan
bdun sngags kyis btab ste phyogs bzhir gtor na sems kyis nye ring ci tsam dgum pa mtshams su gyur na yongs su bsrung bar 'gyur lags so/ /dkon mchog gsum la gus par phyag 'tshal lo/ /'phags pa de
bzhin gshegs pa ye shes rgya mtsho rnam par snang mdzad bkod pa'i rgyal po la gus par phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas thams cad la gus par phyag

'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug thugs rje chen po dang ldan pa la gus par phyag 'tshal lo/ /tad+ya thA/ bi Te bi Te/ ti Te ti Te/ tsi Te tsi Te/ bid te bid te

ka tsa ka tsa/ b+ha ga ban/ Ar+yA ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/ sa b+ha sa b+ha na~M swA hA/ bcom ldan 'das 'di ni bdag slar rang gi gnas su mchi bar bskul ba'i sngags lags te/ bgyi ba ci mchis pa bgyis lags nas bdag slar
rang gi gnas su mchi bar bskul ba'i tshe sngags 'dis chab la lan bdun sngags kyis btab ste phyogs bzhir gtor na bdag slar mchi bar 'gyur lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das rig sngags 'di ni dngos grub mngon
du ma gyur lags kyis kyang las su bgyi pa rnam pa sna tshogs bgyid pas sems rtse gcig tu bzlas brjod bgyis na smon pa rnams mi 'grub pa gang yang ma mchis lags so/ /gang zhig myos nad gdugs
re re lan re ldang ba'am gdugs gnyis shing lan re ldang ba 'am/ gdugs gsum zhing lan re ldang ba 'am/ gdugs bzhi zhing lan re ldang ba 'am/ gdon 'byung pos bgyis pa 'am/ mkha' 'gro mas bgyis
pa 'am/ sha zas bgyis pa 'am/ lus srul pos bgyis pa 'am/ smyo byed kyis bgyis pa 'am/ brjed byed kyis bgyis pa 'am/ 'dre gdon ma rungs pa rnam pa sna tshogs kyis bgyis pa yang rung ste/ nad pa

de dag la sngags 'dis lan brgya rtsa brgyad btab na 'tsho bar 'gyur lags so/ /gal te sgrib pa lci ba zhig lags na/ tshon sna lnga'i skud pa la sngags lan re bzla zhing re re mdud de brgya rtsa brgyad tshang bar bgyis nas

nad pa'i mgul pa 'am/ dpung pa la btags na kha na ma tho ba'i sgrib pa zhu byang zhing bro nad kyang sos par 'gyur lags so/ /gal te skrangs pa dang / 'bras kyi phreng ba dang / shu ba dang phol mig dang / rma 'dzag pa dang /

g.yan pa la sogs pa'i nad ma rungs pa rnam pa sna tshogs kyis bro 'tshal bar gyur tam ral gri dang / mda' dang / mdung la sogs pa phog ste smyos par gyur tam/ sbrul dang / sdig pa dang / rtsangs pa dang /
bung ba dang / gdug pa la sogs pas zin par gyur na/ sngags 'dis lan bdun bzlas te btab nas sos par 'gyur lags so/ /gal te sgrib pa lci ba zhig lags na/ dog sa ser po'i 'jim pa la
lan bdun sngags kyis btab ste bro 'tshal ba'i dmigs su byugs na sel bar 'gyur lags so/ /gal te rlung nad na ba 'am phyogs gcig pa langs par gyur tam rna ba 'on pa 'am sna 'tshubs pa 'am rlung
gis zin pa'i nad la sogs pas bro 'tshal bar gyur na/ sems rtse gcig tu sngags 'di bzlas brjod bgyis nas nad pa de dag la lan brgya rtsa brgyad sngags kyis btab na nad sos par 'gyur lags so/ /

gal te sgrib pa lci ba zhig lags na 'bru mar dang / chab mar dang gro dang / ru sta rnams bskol te sngags lan bdun btab nas lus la bkus sam rna ba dang snar blugs sam 'tshal du stsal na bro nad sos par

'gyur lags so/ /gzhan yang bro nad gzhan rnam pa sna tshogs kyis bro 'tshal bar gyur na/ sems rtse gcig tu sngags 'di gdab par bgyi'o/ /yang na bdag nyid kyis bzlas brjod bgyis na 'tsho bar 'gyur lags so/ /gal te

rig sngags 'di bsgrub par 'tshal na/ sngar sra zhing 'phan skyon ma mchis pa'i tsan dan dkar po las byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi gzugs srid du mtho phyed dang do mchis pa/ sug pa lag pa

g.yon pa na pad ma leb rgan dang ril ba thogs pa lag pa g.yas pa brkyang nas bgrang phreng thogs shing / 'jigs pa ma mchis pa stsol ba'i lag du ston pa gdong bcu gcig par bgyis te mdun gyi gdong gsum ni

byams pa dang snying rje dang bcas pa'i mtshan dang ldan par bgyi'o/ /g.yon phyogs kyi gdong gsum ni khro bo'i mtshan can du bgyi'o/ /g.yas phyogs kyi gdong gsum ni mche ba dkar po gyen du 'byung ba'i mtshan can du

bgyi'o/ /rgyab kyi gdong gcig ni khro gtum che zhing rab tu dkon pa'i mtshan can du bgyi'o/ /spyi bo'i gdong gcig ni sangs rgyas kyi zhal gyi gzugs can du bgyi'o/ /mgo rgyan de dag thams cad kyi nang na yang sangs rgyas
kyi sku bzhugs par bgyi'o/ /byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug de'i lus ni do shal la sogs pa/ rgyan rnam pa sna tshogs dang ldan par bgyi'o/ /gzugs bgyis lags nas smon pa rnams
grub par 'tshal ba gang lags pa des gos sar pa gtsang ma bgos te smyung ba bgyis nas sdom pa yang dag par blangs te zla ba dkar po yar gyi ngo tshes gcig nas tshes brgyad kyi bar du gdugs gcig la dus

gsum du sngags 'di lan brgya rtsa brgyad dam yang na dpag tu ma mchis par bzlas brjod bgyi'o/ /de slan chad gnas dben pa zhig tu stan gtsang ma gting ste byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi gzugs

bgyis pa gzhag nas kha nub phyogs su bstan te nyams kyis ci 'byor pa'i bza' ba dang btung ba dag gis mchod nas a ka ru dang du ru ka 'ba' shig gis bsreg par bgyi'o/ /rnal 'byor pa de 'bru phye dang 'o ma'i

zas 'tshal nas snga ma bzhin du bzlas brjod bgyis te gdugs gsum pa la thug pa'i bar du bgyi'o/ /de slan chad mchod pa'i yo byad bshams pa yang snga ma bas ches khyad par du 'phags par bgyi'o/ /rnal 'byor

pa de zas dkar gsum po 'di lta ste/ 'o ma dang zho dang / 'bras can 'ba' zhig 'tshal bar bgyi'o/ /byang chub kyi shing blangs nas gzugs de'i mdun du zhugs spar bar bya'o/ /gzhan yang shing de blangs nas dum bu stong rtsa

brgyad tu gtubs te du ru ka'i nang du sbangs (blangs) zhes snar thang pa'i dpe la 'dug)nas gdugs gcig la dum bu gcig blangs te/ sngags lan re bzlas nas zhugs kyi nang du dor bar bgyi zhing thams cad bas par 'gyur na de'i tshe sa chen po rnams rab tu

g.yo bar 'gyur la de'i dbang gis sku gzugs bgyis pa de yang rab tu g.yo zhing nang gi gong na mchis pa'i gdong gi kha nas sgra byung nas rnal 'byor pa de la 'di skad du rigs kyi bu legs so legs so/ /khyod kyis

'di ltar nan tan brtson 'grus kyis smon pa rnams yongs su gnyer bas bdag gis khyod kyi smon pa yongs su rdzogs par bgyi'o/ /khyod 'di nas nam mkha' la 'phur te 'gro ba 'am/ yang na khyod rgyu zhing 'gro la

thogs pa med pa 'am/ yang na drang srong rig 'dzin gyi rgyal po byed par 'gyur ba 'am/ yang na bdag ci lta ba bzhin du rang dbang thogs pa med pa nyid du bya'o zhes bsngags pa brjod par 'gyur lags so/ /

gzhan yang rnal 'byor pas zla ba dkar po yar gyi ngo tshes bcwa lnga la byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi gzugs gdong bcu gcig pa de sangs rgyas kyi ring bsrel dang bcas pa'i mchod rten

gyi nang du gzhag ste/ gos sar pa gtsang ma bgos la gso sbyong dang sdom pa yang dag par blangs te gdugs mtshan gcig la rab tu smyung bar bgyis nas/ su ma na'i me tog stong rtsa brgyad blangs te/ me tog re re blangs nas

sngags lan re btab ste/ thams cad bas pa'i bar du bgyis na de'i tshe gzugs bgyis pa de'i mdun du gdong gcig gi kha nas 'brug sgra lta bu'i sgra byung bar gyur la/ de'i dbang gis sa chen po yang rab tu g.yo bar

gyur pas rnal 'byor pas de'i tshe rang gi sems bde bar gzhag nas skrag cing 'jigs pa mi bskyed par rig sngags dang / smon cing sgrub pa gang lags pa 'ba' zhig rjes su dran par bgyis te/ 'di skad du byang chub
sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug thugs rje chen po dang ldan pa la gus par phyag 'tshal lo/ /bdag nam zhig na sems can thams cad kyi mgon dang skyabs su gyur nas

sems can thams cad kyi sems kyi smon pa rnams yongs su bskong bar 'gyur zhes brjod par gyur na/ de'i tshe spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis ci ltar smon pa rnams stsol bar 'gyur te/ smon pa rnams stsol ba'i tshe
lha dang klu la sogs pa gang gis kyang bar chad dang bgegs bgyid par mi 'gyur lags so/ /gzhan yang rnal 'byor pas zla ba la gza' zhugs pa'i tshe chab mar srang gcig blangs te/ dngul gyi snod kyi nang
du stsal nas gzugs bgyis pa'i mdun du gzhag ste/ sngags 'dis bzlas brjod bgyis na zla ba yang snga ma kho na bzhin du skyabs 'og du gyur pas de nas blangs te 'tshal na lus kyi bro nad rnams mi 'byang

ba gang yang ma mchis lags so/ /gzhan yang rnal 'byor pas ldong ros dang gi wang cha mnyam par bgyis te/ gzugs bgyis pa de'i mdun du gzhag nas sngags 'di lan stong rtsa brgyad bzlas te chab kyis sbrus
nas dpral ba la thig le bgyis na/ don rnam pa gsum 'grub par 'gyur lags so/ /sngar bstan pa bzhin du chab dron po dang sbyar te khrus bgyis na bgegs thams cad dang bro nad ma rungs pa thams cad bsal
zhing 'byang bar 'gyur lags so/ /gzhan yang gal te pha rol gyi dmag tshogs kyis g.yul 'phrog par gyur na/ a+yan ci dmar rtsi 'bras bu cig blangs te sngags 'di lan brgya rtsa brgyad kyis btab nas/
gzugs bgyis pa de'i g.yon phyogs kyi khro bo'i gdong la byugs te dgra'i phyogs su kha bstan na dgra'i dmag tshogs rnams drung du mchi bar mi 'gyur lags so/ /gzhan yang gal te yul phyogs su mi
dang phyugs la rims nad byung bar gyur na/ gzugs bgyis pa de'i mdun du shing shug pa'i zhugs bus la gzhan yang shing de blangs nas dum bu stong rtsa brgyad du gtubs te dum bu gcig blangs nas yungs
'bru'i mar gyis bskus te/ sngags lan re bzlas nas zhugs kyi nang du dor bar bgyi zhing thams cad bas pa'i bar du bgyi'o/ /gzhan yang skud pa dmar po las mdud pa bdun mdud de mdud pa lan re mdud cing
sngags lan re bzlas nas nang gi gong na mchis pa'i gdong gi spyi bo la btags na rims nad thams cad rab tu zhi bar 'gyur te/ rims nad zhi nas sngags thag kyang dgrol bar 'gyur lags so/ /gzhan

yang blo bur du mkha' 'gro ma dang / 'byung po la sogs pa'i gdon gyis zin te bro 'tshal bar gyur na/ skud pa dkar po la sngags mdud nyi shu rtsa gcig mdud de sngags lan re bzla zhing mdud pa re re mdud
nas mdun gyi byams pa dang snying rje dang ldan pa'i gdong gi spyi bo la btags nas zhag lon te slar bkrol nas nad pa'i mgul du btags na bro nad sos par 'gyur lags so/ /gal te las kyi sgrib pa lci ba

zhig lags te sos par ma gyur na sngags thag de blangs nas yang lan brgya rtsa brgyad sngags kyis btab ste snga ma'i gzugs kyi spyi bo la btags nas/ zhag lon te slar bkrol nas nad pa'i mgul du btags na nges

par 'tsho bar 'gyur lags so/ /gzhan yang gang la la zhig bro nad rgyun rims kyis btab nas sdug bsngal zhing sos par ma gyur tam/ 'dre gdon ma rungs pa khyim du zhugs par gyur na/ hun lug thang 'brum bu

brgya rtsa brgyad blangs te gzugs bgyis pa de'i mdun du 'brum bu re re la sngags lan re btab nas zhugs kyi nang du dor bar bgyi zhing thams cad bas pa'i bar du bgyi'o/ /gzhan yang skud pa dkar po la sngags mdud

pa nyi shu rtsa gcig mdud de sngags lan re bzla zhing mdud pa re re mdud nas/ mdun gyi byams pa dang snying rje dang ldan pa'i gdong gi spyi bo la btags nas zhag lon te slar bkrol nas nad pa'i mgul du btags na bro
nad rnams 'byang zhing gdon bgegs ma rungs pa rnams 'byer zhing 'gyes par 'gyur lags so/ /gzhan yang mi mdza' ba dag gis bklags btsal bar gyur tam/ 'thab cing rtsod pa dang / byad stems kyis
gnod pa bgyid par gyur na me tog dang pog spos la sogs pa sna tshogs kyis gzugs bgyis pa de la mchod cing bi nA ya ka'i gzugs kyi mdun du zhugs pa nas/ 'un te'i 'bras bu 'brum bu brgya rtsa
brgyad blangs te sngags lan re btab nas zhugs kyi nang du dor bar bgyi'o/ /gzhan yang skud pa dkar po la mdud pa brgya rtsa brgyad mdud de/ sngags lan re bzla zhing mdud pa re re mdud nas gzugs de'i

g.yon phyogs kyi khro bo'i gdong gi spyi bo la btags nas zhag bzhi lon te slar bkrol la/ skud pa de blangs te mi mdza' ba de'i ming nas brjod de mdud pa re re nas so so tha dad par sbas nas re re la yang sngags lan re

bzla zhing re re nas btubs te thams cad bas pa'i bar du bgyis na/ mi mdza' ba de dag ci bgyi'o 'tshal mi 'byor cing rang nyid skyabs su mchi bar 'gyur lags so/ /gzhan yang gang la la zhig legs pa'i dngos po

grub par 'tshal na/ tshon sna lnga'i skud pa la sngags mdud brgya rtsa brgyad mdud de/ sngags lan re bzla zhing mdud pa re re mdud nas/ gzhan yang gzugs bgyis pa'i mdun du sngags lan bdun gyis btab ste/

byams pa dang snying rje dang ldan pa'i gdong gi spyi bo la btags nas zhag lon te slar bkrol nas bdag nyid kyi lus la btags na smon pa rnams yid bzhin du 'grub par 'gyur lags so/ /gzhan yang gang la la zhig

sgrib pa'i bgegs dang ldan pas/ legs pa'i dngos po rnams phar cher smon pa yid bzhin du grub par ma gyur tam bkra mi shis pa'i dngos po dag dus dus su rgyu (rgya )zhes snar thang pa'i dpe la 'dug)ma mchis par langs par gyur na spos chab kyis

gzugs bgyis pa de bkru bar bgyi'o/ /gzhan chab la lan brgya rtsa brgyad sngags kyis btab ste bi nA ya ka'i gzugs bkru bar bgyi'o/ /gzhan yang chab la lan brgya rtsa brgyad sngags kyis btab ste rang nyid kyi lus

la gtor na/ sgrib pa dang bgegs thams cad rang gi ngang gis zhu byang nas/ smon pa rnams yid bzhin du 'grub par 'gyur lags so/ /de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug

gis de skad ces smras pa dang / 'khor mang po thams cad kyis mthun par skyes bu chen po legs so legs so/ /sems can thams cad la phan par 'dod pa'i phyir rig sngags 'di smras pas/ bdag cag kyang rjes su
yi rang zhing yongs su 'dzin par smon to zhes bsngags pa brjod par gyur to/ /de nas 'khor mang po thams cad dga' mgu rangs par gyur te/ bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor
ba byas nas phyag byas te dgyes par gyur to/ /'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug zhal bcu gcig pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs rdzogs s+ho// //zhu chen gyi mkhan po lo ts+tsha ba/ bcom
ldan 'das kyi ring lugs pa ban de chos grub kyis rgya'i dpe las bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa/ yang zhus byad/ stag lung rgyud 'bum la gtugs legs par zhus so//
@#/ /rgya gar skad du/ pad ma mu ku Ta tan tra nA ma/ bod skad du/ pad ma cod pan zhes bya ba'i rgyud/ bcom ldan 'das 'jam pa'i rdo rje la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/
bcom ldan 'das lha'i gzhal med khang na longs spyod rdzogs pa'i skur sangs rgyas nas byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor dpag tu med pa dang thabs cig tu bzhugs te/ de nas bcom ldan 'das thugs

rje chen po'i sgo kun nas 'phro ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ 'od zer gyis rnam par snang mdzad gangs chen mtsho'i zhing gi rdul la reg pas reg ma thag tu bskal pa bzang po'i

sangs rgyas stong rtsa gnyis la mchod nas/ 'od zer de bcom ldan 'das kyi dbu'i gtsug du nub bo/ /nub ma thag tu thugs rje chen po phyag stong spyan stong dang ldan pa sku mdog gangs kyi rtse la nyi ma shar ba ltar
dkar ba zhal bcu gcig gi rtsa ba'i zhal dkar po/ steng zhal ser ba/ g.yas ljang gu/ g.yon dmar ba/ steng gi gsum nag po/ bcom ldan 'das kyi dbu ni byu ru bcag pa lta bur gyur te/
'dzum pa mdzad nas thugs rje chen po'i bdag po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la gzigs so/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis thal
mo sbyar te bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa/ sku dang sngags dang las rnams dang / /khyad par cho ga bstan par gyis zhes gsol ba btab nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' 'phags pa spyan
ras gzigs kyi dbang phyug la legs so zhes bya ba byin nas smras pa/ sku yi rnam pa 'di lta ste/ /thugs rje dag pa chu shel te/ /mnyam par bzhengs pas 'gro don mdzad/ /chu shel mdog 'dra zhal gsum

dkar/ /ljang gu'i mdog can nag po ste/ /ser po de bzhin bcom ldan dmar/ /drang srong rtag tu ri dgas brgyan/ /zhi ba 'dzum dang bzhad pa dang / /khros pa'i zhal mnga' spyan gsum mdzes/ /bcu pa sems dpa'i

rtags can de/ /bcu gcig bcom ldan 'das kyi bdag /yon tan nor bu mu tig phreng / /phrin las sna tshogs smad dkris pa/ /dang po'i phyag ni thal sbyar te/ /g.yas pa rin chen phreng ba 'dzin/ /g.yon pa dri med pad+ma

'dzin/ /g.yas pa mchog sbyin mdzad pa po/ /g.yon pa ril ba spyi blugs te/ /g.yas pa 'khor lo rab tu 'dzin/ /g.yon pa na ni mda' gzhu sta/ /lhag ma mchog sbyin spyan ldan pa'o/ /de nas yang bcom ldan 'das

kyis 'dzum pa mdzad de/ cod pan gnyis nas 'od zer rab tu 'phros pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la sangs rgyas thams cad kyi byin gyis brlabs byung ba'i pad ma'i steng du rigs lnga byung ba 'di lta ste/ rnam par snang

mdzad dang / rin chen 'byung ldan dang / snang ba mtha' yas dang / don yod grub pa dang / mi bskyod pa'o/ /khang bu brtsegs pa rin po che de'i nang du seng ge dang / rta dang / rma bya dang / nam mkha' lding dang / glang po che de dag ni cod pan

las byung ba'o/ /yang yum ni sku mdog sngon mo ste/ /pad ma las byung pad ma'i steng / /tshad med bzhi ste phyag bzhi mdzes/ /sems dpa'i rgyan du ldan pa yi/ /mnyam pa yi ni skyil dkrung bcas/ /yab ni

sku mdog ser po ste/ /pad ma las byung pad ma'i steng / /thal sbyar nor bu bgrang phreng 'dzin/ /rgyan rnams yongs su 'dzin pa'o/ /yang na 'od zer rab bkye ste/ /zla ba nyi ma las byung ba'i/ /nyi ma'i mdog can nyi ma ni/ /

gzhon nu uta pal mchog sbyin mdzad/ /zla ba las skyes nam mkha'i mdog /cung zhig khros pa rdo rje can/ /dkar po gangs ltar dkar ba ste/ /nyi zla'i steng na pad ma 'dzin/ /drag po gnyis dang hrIHyig las/ /gnyis med

tshul gyis 'bras bu rdzogs/ /ha ya gri ba khams gsum bsdud/ /khro gnyer can gyi phrin las mdzad/ /gshin rje gshed po gter 'dzin cing / /khams gsum rnam rgyal bdud sde 'joms/ /'khor lo dkar po dag pa'i

steng / /gru bzhi sgo bzhi rta babs bcas/ /dang por dkon mchog rab dad cing / /tshad med bzhi ni rab tu rdzogs/ /byang chub yan lag rdzogs pa dang / /chos dbyings rang bzhin stong nyid do/ /gleng gzhi dang sku bstan pa'i
le'u ste dang po'o// // de nas gsang sngags bstan pa'i phyir/ bcom ldan 'das kyis rnam par snang mdzad gang chen mtsho'i zhing khams thams cad du 'od bkye nas gtsug tu nub par gyur to/ /

de nas yang gsungs pa/ oM hU~M trA~M hrIHaH/ oM na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ na mo Ar+ya dz+nyA na sA ga ra ya/ bai ro tsa nA ya/ byu ha rA dzA ya/ ta thA ga tA ya/ a R+ha te/ samyak+sam+bud+d+h+hA+A ya/ na ma: A r+yA ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/ bo d+hi satwA ya/

ma hA satwA ya/ ma hA kA ru Ni kA ya/ tad+ya thA/ oM d+ha ra d+ha ra/ d+hi ri d+hi ri/ d+hu ru d+hu ru/ iT+Te/ baT+Te/ tsa le tsa le/ pra tsa le pra tsa le/ ku su me ku su me ba re/ i li mi li/ tsi ti dz+wa la ma pa na ya swA hA/ sngags 'di 'don

par byed pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mos lan cig brjod dam dran zhing yid la byas sam lus la bcangs na mtshams med pa lnga dang / de dang nye ba'i sdig pa'i las byang zhing sems can dmyal ba dang yi dgas

dang dud 'gro'i skye gnas su mi skye zhing mi khom pa brgyad du sdug bsngal dang bcas par mi 'gyur ro/ /gcan gzan dang / srin po dang / mi ma yin pa dang / nad dang 'jigs pa thams cad las grol bar 'gyur ro/ /

oM rak+Sha rak+Sha zhes pas kyang bsrung bar bya'o/ /oM a kA ro mu khaM sarba d+harmA NA~M/ Ad+ya nud pan+na twAta zhes pas gtor ma'i chus yi dgas la mchod par bya ste/ oM A: hU~M zhes pas so/ /de rnams kyi sngags bsdus

pa ni/ oM ma Ni pad me hU~M zhes pa'o/ /'di ni rigs gsum gyi bdag por 'gyur te/ de'i phan yon ni 'di'o/ /chos kyi sku dang gzugs kyi sku'i thugs rje chen por mthong bar 'gyur ro/ /oM na maH sarba ta thA

ga ta d+hU pe pU dzA me g+ha sa mu drA s+pha ra Na sa ma ye hU~M/ oM na maH sarba ta thA ga ta puSh+pe pU dzA me g+ha sa mu drA s+pha ra Na sa ma ye hU~M/ oM na maH sarba ta thA ga ta A lo ke pU dzA me g+ha sa mu drA s+pha ra Na sa ma ye hU~M/ oM na maH

sarba ta thA ga ta gan d+he pU dzA me g+ha sa mu dra s+pha ra Na sa ma ye hU~M/ oM na maH sarba ta thA ga ta nai wi d+ya pU dzA me g+ha sa mu dra s+pha ra Na sa ma ye hU~M/ oM na maH sarba ta thA ga ta shap+da pU dzA me g+ha sa mu dra s+pha ra Na sa ma ye hU~M/

oM na maH sarba ta thA ga ta maN+Da la pU dzA me g+ha sa mu dra s+pha ra Na sa ma ye hU~M/ de nas mchod pas yang dag mchod/ /stong nyid ye shes las byung ba'i/ /thabs dang shes rab gnyis ldan pa'i/ /hrIHyig dkar po yang

dag bzlas/ /sngags kyi le'u ste gnyis pa'o// // de nas las dang cho ga bstan pa'i phyir/ /dang po zhi ba'i las sgrub na/ /yid du 'ong ba'i ljongs dag tu/ /dkar po dang po gsal dus su/ /dri zhim chu yis
legs byugs te/ /me tog dkar po bkram byas nas/ /khrus dang kha zas phyogs mthun pa'i/ /bde ba'i stan la nyer 'jug ste/ /bum pa dkar po tsan dan dkar/ /dris bkang shing gos legs par

dkri/ /maN+Dal dbus su legs par gzhag /hrIHlas byung ba'i sems dpa'i sku/ /zhal gcig phyag gnyis sku mdog dkar/ / (snar thang pa'i dpe la rkang pa gsum mi 'dug)rgyan rnams rdzogs pa pad ma bsnams/ /zla ba'i gdan la legs bzhugs pa/ /

hrIHlas 'od zer 'phro ba bsgom/ /phyag stong spyan yang de bzhin te/ /rgyas pa'i sku ni mdun bsams nas/ /hrIH(snar thang pa'i dpe la 'di mi 'dug)yi 'phro 'du gsal ba ni/ /bzlas pa rab tu gsal ba ste/ /gsang sngags 'di ni brjod par bya/ /

na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ na ma Ar+ya dz+nyA na/ sA ga ra/ bai ro tsa na/ byu ha rA dzA ya/ ta thA ga tA ya/ na maH sarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH/ aR+h+had+b+h+yaH/ samyak+sam+bu d+d+hA ya/ na maH Ar+yA ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/ bo d+hi sa twA ya/ ma hA sa twA ya

ma hA kA ru Ni kA ya/ a mr-i ta ba la che ge mo shan+ting+ku ru swA hA/ zhes bzlas par bya'o/ /bru~M rnam par snang mdzad bum pa'i chus/ /gang zhig legs par khrus byed pa/ /dri ma thams cad yongs dag nas/ /'bras
bu bde ba de thob 'gyur/ /'jigs pa kun las rab grol te/ /myur du chu skyes thob par 'gyur/ /de nas rgyas pa sgrub 'dod na/ /nags tshal shin tu 'thug po ru/ /dri zhim chu yis legs byugs la/ /
'bras bur bcas pa'i me tog dgram/ /rgyan rnams yongs su brtags nas ni/ /bde ba'i stan la nyer 'dug ste/ /rin chen sna lnga 'bru snar bcas/ /rin chen ga 'ur blugs byas la/ /maN+Dal dbus su legs
par gzhag /hrIHlas byung ba sems dpa'i sku/ /zhal gcig phyag gnyis sku mdog ser/ /rgyan rnams rdzogs pa pad ma bsnams/ /phyag stong spyan yang de bzhin te/ /rgyas pa'i sku ni mdun bsams nas/ /

mchod pa lnga yis yang dag mchod/ /hrIHyi 'phro 'du gsal bar bzlas/ /na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ na maH Ar+ya dz+nyA na sA ga rA ya/ bai ro tsa nA ya/ byU ha rA dzA ya/ ta thA ga tA ya/ na maH sarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH/ aR+had b+h+yaHsa

myak+sam+bu d+d+he b+h+yaH/ na maH Ar+yA ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/ bo d+hi satwA ya/ ma hA satwA ya/ ma hA kA ru Ni kA ya/ rat+na ku na puSh+TiM ku ru swA hA/ bang mdzod stong pa'i steng gzhag ste/ /'bru yis yongs su khengs par 'gyur/ /de nas dbang

gi las byed na/ /sdud par byed pa'i chu klung 'gram/ /pa la sha dang a shwat+tha/ /me tog dmar por ril bu byas/ /bse gab dmar po'i nang du gzhug /me tog dmar pos rab tu mchod/ /hrIHyig las byung sgrol ma ni/ /

ljang gu phyag na lcags kyu 'dzin/ /phyag stong spyan yang de bzhin te/ /rgyas pa'i sku ni mdun bsams nas/ /mchod pa lnga yis yang dag mchod/ /hrIHyi 'phro 'du gsal bar bzlas/ /na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ na maH Ar+ya dz+nyA na/

sA ga rA ya/ bai ro tsa nA ya/ byu ha rA dzA ya/ ta thA ga tA ya/ (snar thang pa'i dpe la mi 'dug)na maH sarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH/ aR+ha b+h+yaH sa myak+sam+bu d+d+he b+h+yaH/ na maH Ar+yA ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/ bo d+hi sa twA ya/ ma hA sa twA ya/ ma hA kA ru Ni kA ya/ a mo g+ha b+ha smiM

ku ru/ oM tA re tud tA re tu re a mo g+ha b+hasmiM ku ru swA hA/ rdzas kyi lde gus lus byugs nas/ /byugs pa de yis khugs par 'gyur/ /de nas phrin las bya 'dod na/ /dur khrod shing gcig dag tu ni/ /ba yi lci bas
legs byugs nas/ /me tog sngon po nim pa yi/ /spos kyi tshom bu lnga byas dgram/ /byang du 'dug ste las 'di brtsam/ /gcan gzan steng du chu shel ste/ /hrIHyi yi ge las byung ba'i/ /mdog dkar ral pa'i
thor tshugs can/ /zhal gcig spyan ni gsum pa ste/ /ri dgas lpags pa 'dzin pa yi/ /drang srong khros pa'i cha byad can/ /phyag bzhi dang po mchog sbyin pa/ /g.yon pa pad stengs ral gri can/ /g.yas pa
ltos 'gros brgyan pa'i mdun/ /rtse gsum dkar pos brgyan pa'o/ /g.yon pa thod pa dkar po ste/ /dri zhim me tog dag gis bkang / /rgyal po chen po'i rol pa ltar/ /cung zhig zur gyis gzigs pa'o/ /
phyag stong spyan yang de bzhin te/ /bskal pa bzang po'i sangs rgyas stong / /pad ma'i gdan la legs bzhugs pa'i/ /rgyas pa'i sku ni legs bsams nas/ /hrIHyi 'phro 'du las byung ba'i/ /gsang sngags

rgyal po bzlas par bya/ /na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ na maH Ar+ya dz+nyA na sA ga rA ya/ bai ro tsa nA ya/ byU ha rA dzA ya/ ta thA ga tA ya/ (snar thang pa'i dpe la 'di mi 'dug)na maH sarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH/ aR+ha b+h+yaH/ sa myak+sam+bu d+d+he b+h+yaH/ na maH Ar+yA ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/

bo d+hi sa twA ya/ ma hA sa twA ya/ ma hA kA ru Ni kA ya/ tad+ya thA/ oM a ka Te/ ni ka Te/ ka Ta ka Te/ ka ro Te ka ro Ta/ bIr+ye swA hA/ oM karma a mo g+ha/ bi badzra siM ha nA di hU~M phaT/ dri 'am byugs pa dag la ni/ /btab la lus

la byug par bya/ /me tog sngon po mgo la gzhag /maN+Dal chu yis lus la byug / (snar thang pa'i dpe la 'dug)nyi shu rtsa lnga bzlas nas ni/ /las rnams thams cad grub par 'gyur/ /de nas bzhi ka sgrub 'dod na/ /bkra shis
dus gsum rdzogs dus su/ /ri bo yid 'ong gnas dag tu/ /sa gzhi chag chag legs btab ste/ /maN+Dal legs byas me tog ni/ /dri zhim dkar pos yongs gtor te/ /gtsang zhing dag pa'i rdzas rnams

dgram/ /gtsang ma bram ze byas te gzhag /khrus dang ku sha'i steng gnas te/ /hrIHlas byung ba'i chu skyes steng / /chu shel mdog 'dra zhal gsum yang / /'dzum dang zhi ba'i bdag nyid can/ /ljang gu bzhad pa'i
