swA hA/ lan bdun nam nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas te me'i nang du dor bar bya'o/ /zho dang 'o ma la sngags btab te shan ting ku ru dang bcas pas dbul bar bya'o/ /'o ma can gyi shing dang mar dkar po la ni sarba pA paM dang
bcas pas phul ste bstod pa bya'o/ /'jam dpal me tog dkar po dang bcas pa'i me'i khang par tsan dan la sogs pa'i dri zhim po'i shing la me sbar te/ sku gzugs mdun du bzhag la chu dang yungs kar la

sngags btab la mer gtor ba'i sngags ni/ tad+ya thA/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta/ tA re tud tA re tu re swA hA/ zhes bya ba'i sngags dang sarba pA paM shan+tiM ku ru swA hA/ zhes bya ba chu khyor ba brgya rtsa brgyad dbul bar bya'o/ /'jam dpal de'i

phan yon ni mtshams med pa la sogs pa'i sdig pa zhi bar 'gyur ro/ /nad 'go ba dang gdon la sogs pa thams cad kyang zhi bar 'gyur ro/ /skye ba thams cad du tshe rabs dran par 'gyur ro/ /'jam dpal ba'i rnam

pa lngas byug pas byugs te/ me'i khang bu dri dang ldan pa'i khang par spra tshil la gzugs byas pa dang bcas pa sngags 'dis bsreg go/ oM tA re tud tA re tu re swA hA/ zhes bya bas bsregs na dbang du 'gyur zhing
tshar gcad par yang 'gyur ro/ /sbyin bsreg gi le'u ste bcu bdun pa'o// // de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'dzum pa mdzad de byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal gzhon nu la 'khor lo'i rim pa bka' stsal

to/ /'khor lo ling tshe dgu pa la oM dang hA gnyis kyi dbus su che ge mo dang bcas pa bri/ rak+ShaHrak+ShaHzhes pa ni bsrung ba'o/ /phyogs mtshams su oM tA re tud tA re tu re swA hA/ zhes bya ba bris te kun la swA hA'i
bar du bcug pa gro ga la gur kum gyis bris nas dpung pa la btags na bsrung ba'i mchog tu 'gyur ro/ /zhi ba'i bsrung ba'i 'khor lo'i le'u ste bcwa brgyad pa'o// // de nas dbang gi bsrung ba ni 'khor

lo ling tshe dgu pa la oM dang hA gnyis kyi dbus su ni che ge mo dang bcas pa bri/ rak+ShaHrak+ShaHzhes pa ni bsrung ba'o/ /phyogs mtshams su tA re tud tA re tu re swA hA/ zhes bya ba bri ste kun la mu dang mu'i (bar )snar thang pa'i dpe la 'dug)du sa bon
no/ /de gro ga dmar po la rgya skyegs kyi khu bas bris te lte bar mi mngon par btags na bsrung ba'i mchog tu 'gyur zhing dbang du sdud do/ /dbang gi bsrung ba'i 'khor lo'i le'u ste bcu dgu pa'o// //

de nas rgyas pa'i bsrung ba ni 'khor lo rtsibs brgyad pa bya ste/ oM tA re tud tA re tu re brgyad po dgod par bya'o/ /dbus su swA hA'i mtha' can gyi ming rak+ShaHrak+ShaHdang bcas pa gro ga la gur kum gyis bris pa dpung pa 'am/

mgul du btags na bsrung ba'i mchog tu 'gyur ro/ /rgyas pa'i bsrung ba'i 'khor lo'i le'u ste nyi shu pa'o// // de nas bar chad thams cad bsrung ba'i 'khor lo ni mu khyud gsum la tha ma ling tshe brgyad pa'o/ /

dbus su ming gi mtha' can gyi swA hA rak+ShaHdang bcas pa'o/ /mu khyud nang ma la u u u u u u u u zhes bya ba dgod par bya'o/ /ling tshe brgyad pa phyi ma la ni/ oM tA re tu re tud tA re zhes bya ba'i yig 'bru rnams

u dang u'i bar du bcug pa bkod la gro ga 'am shing shun la gur kum gyis bris te spyi bo 'am mchan khung du mis mi mthong bar btags na gnod pa thams cad las thar ro/ /sngags ni ci mang du grangs dang ldan

par bzlas so/ /shin tu rgyas pa'i bsrung ba'i 'khor lo'i le'u ste nyi shu rtsa gcig pa'o// // de nas phrin las thams cad bsgrub pa'i 'khor lo ni gro ga 'am ras la ling tshe dgu pa'i 'khor lo tsan dan dkar

po'i chus bris te sngags dgod pa ni/ a A i I u U e ai o au r-i r-I l-i l-I aM aHzhes bya ba phyi'i mu khyud la'o/ /nang gi mu khyud la tA re tud tA re tu re swA hA/ oM dang hA'i bar du rak+ShaHshAn+tiM ku ru swA hA zhes pa

ni steng gi 'khor lo'o/ /'og gi 'khor lo ni sngags bzlog pas so/ /phyi'i dbyangs yig kyang bzlog par shes par bya'o/ /dbus su ni oM dang hA'i bar du rak+ShaHshAn+tiM ku ru bri bar bya'o/ /zhi ba chen po'i 'phrul
'khor gyi bsrung ba ste le'u nyi shu rtsa gnyis pa'o// // de nas phrin las bzhi'i las so so'i 'khor lo ni zhi ba ni kham pa la ga 'u kha sbyor bya ste mer bsregs la kha dog dkar pos byug par bya'o/ /

de'i nang du 'khor lo ling tshe dgu pa bris te sngags dgod pa ni/ oM tA re tud tA re tu re zhes bya ba re'u mig brgyad la'o/ /ru ru oM ru ru/ ru ru ta ru ru/ ru ru re ru ru/ ru ru tud ru ru/ ru ru tA ru ru/ ru ru re ru ru/ ru ru tu ru ru/ ru ru re ru ru/

zhes bri'o/ /dbus su ni ku ru shan ting ku ru swA hA zhes bris te ga 'ur sbyar te dbus su srad bu dkar po dang ldan pa'i ga'u maN+Dal thog tu bzhag la/ me tog dkar pos mchod cing mchod pa rnam pa lnga yang dbul te dus gsum

du mchod na zhi bar 'gyur ro/ /zhi ba'i 'khor lo'i le'u ste nyi shu rtsa gsum pa'o// // de nas zhi ba chen po'i las bya ba ni kham pa la ga'u kha sbyor bya ste tsan dan dkar pos snag tsha byas la 'khor lo phyi nang dang ldan

pa'i ling tshe dgu pa bri bar bya'o/ /sngags dgod pa ni swA shan ting ku ru hA zhes bya ba dbus su bri'o/ /mu khyud nang ma la ni a a zhes bya ba brgyad dgod par bya'o/ /mu khyud phyi ma la ni a oM a a tA a a re a/ a tud

a/ a tA a/ a re a/ a tu a/ a re a/ zhes bya ba bri bar bya'o/ /ga 'u me tog gi phreng ba bcings te maN+Dal gyi steng du bzhag nas dus bzhir mchod cing zhag bdun du sngags ma nor bar bzlas na zhi ba chen por 'grub

par 'gyur ro/ /zhi ba chen po'i le'u ste nyi shu rtsa bzhi pa'o// // de nas rgyas pa'i las bya ba na gur kum 'am gi wang gis gro ga la 'khor lo phyi nang dang ldan pa'i ling tshe dgu pa bri ste/ dbus su sar+b+ba puSha Ting ku ru/

oM a zhes bya ba dgod par bya'o/ /ling tshe nang ma brgyad la oM brgyad bri bar bya'o/ /ling tshe phyi ma brgyad la/ oM oM oM/ oM ta oM/ oM re oM/ oM tud oM/ oM tA oM/ oM re oM/ oM tu oM/ oM re oM/ zhes bya ba

bris nas kham pa'i ga 'u ra bcug ste me tog ser po nA ga puSha pa'i me tog dang mchod pa lnga dus bzhir zla ba rgyas nas bzung nas zhag bdun du mchod na tshe dang bsod nams thams cad rgyas par 'grub bo/ /rgyas pa'i

'khor lo'i le'u ste nyi shu rtsa lnga pa'o// // de nas dbang du bsdu bar 'dod na/ kaN Da ka ri'i shun pa dang seng ldeng gi shun pa dang mdzo mo shing gi shun pa bkus pa'i khu bas gse gab bam ga 'u la 'khor lo bri ba
ni ling tshe dgu pa'o/ /sngags dgod pa ni dbus su a swA tsa a mo g+ha A hriHha/ zhes bri bar bya'o/ /ling tshe brgyad la ni/ a oM a/ a tA a/ a re a/ a tud a/ a tA a/ a re a/ a tu a/ a re a/ zhes

bris nas thod pa kha sbyor gyi nang du bcug la skud pa sngon pos dkris te me tog dmar po dang mchod pa lngas dus bzhir zla ba khaM pa'i dus su mchod na thams cad dbang du 'du'o/ /dbang drag gi 'khor lo'i le'u ste nyi shu rtsa

drug pa'o// // de nas dbang du 'du bar byed pa ni/ srin lag gi khrag dang rgya skyegs kyi khu ba dang dur khrod kyi sol ba dang ka na ka'i khu ba rnams kyis bris te dur khrod kyi ras sam mi shi ba'i gos la 'khor lo

ling tshe dgu pa bri'o/ /dbus su a mo g+ha hrIHte zhes bri'o/ /rtsibs brgyad la oM de oM/ tA ba tA/ re data re/ tud tA tud/ tA a tA/ re mo re/ tu g+ha tu/ re hriHzhes bya ba bris te ga 'ur srin mgo dmar po dang 'khor lo

phral nas gtsang po phar 'gram tshur 'gram du sbas na dbye zhing dbang du 'gyur ro/ /dbye zhing dbang du bsdu ba'i 'khor lo'i le'u ste nyi shu rtsa bdun pa'o// // de nas bskrad par 'dod na ra dug pa dang khrag dang

rams rnams sbyar nas/ dur khrod kyi ras la 'khor lo gnyis bris te ling tshe dgu pa'i dbus su ha sa u tsa ha ha ha/ bri bar bya'o/ /ling tshe brgyad la ha oM ha/ ha hA ha/ ha re ha/ ha tud ha/ ha tA ha/

ha re ha/ ha tu ha/ ha re ha/ zhes bris te kha sbyar ka pa lar bcug ste skud pa sngon pos bcings te dur khrod tu sbas na bskrad par 'gyur ro/ /bskrad pa'i 'khor lo'i le'u ste nyi shu rtsa brgyad pa'o// //

de nas dbye ba'i 'khor lo ni/ dur khrod kyi sol ba dang bya rog dang 'ug pa'i khrag dang dug rnams mnyam par bsres pa'i snag tshas 'khor lo phyi nang dang bcas pa'i ling tshe dgu pa bris te dbus su phaT swA de ba data ta hA

phaT zhes bya ba bri'o/ /ling tshe nang ma brgyad la phaT phaT phaT phaT/ phaT phaT phaT phaT zhes bya ba bri'o/ /ling tshe phyi ma brgyad la phaT oM phaT/ phaT tA phaT/ phaT re phaT/ phaT tud phaT/ phaT tA phaT/ phaT re phaT/ phaT tu phaT/

phaT re phaT zhes bya ba bri ste/ bya rog dang 'ug pa'i sgo ngar bcug ste brag dang chu 'thab par sgo nga sbas na 'bye bar 'gyur ro/ /dbye ba'i 'khor lo'i le'u ste nyi shu rtsa dgu pa'o// // de nas gsad pa'i 'khor lo ni/

dug dang khrag dang ske tshe rnams mnyam par sbyar bas ling tshe dgu pa'i 'khor lo phyi nang dang bcas pa bris te/ dbus su hU~M swA ma ra ya hA phaT zhes bya ba bri'o/ /ling tshe nang ma la hU~M phaT hU~M/ phaT hU~M phaT/ hU~M phaT hU~M phaT/

hU~M phaT/ hU~M phaT hU~M/ phaT hU~M phaT/ hU~M phaT hU~M/ phaT hU~M phaT/ zhes bya ba bri'o/ /ling tshe phyi ma la hU~M oM phaT/ hU~M tA phaT/ hU~M re phaT/ hU~M tud phaT/ hU~M tA phaT/ hU~M re phaT/ hU~M tu phaT/ hU~M re phaT/ zhes bya ba bris te/ rabs

chad pho mo'i thod pa la bris te sngags mang du bzlas nas dur khrod du sbas na 'chi bar 'gyur ro/ /gsad pa'i 'khor lo'i le'u ste sum bcu pa'o// // de nas myos pa'i 'khor lo ni d+ha du ra'i chus ras sam

sho gu la ling tshe dgu pa phyi nang du bcas pa bris te/ dbus su ha ha de ba data ta ha ha/ zhes bri'o/ /ling tshe nang ma la h+ha h+ha h+ha h+ha h+ha h+ha h+ha h+ha/ zhes bri bar bya'o/ /phyi ma brgyad la/ h+ha oM h+ha/ h+ha tA h+ha/ h+ha re h+ha/

h+ha tuta h+ha/ h+ha tA h+ha/ h+ha re h+ha/ h+ha tu h+ha/ h+ha re h+ha/ zhes bya ba bris te rtswa'i ga 'ur bcug nas bzlas pa ci nas kyang myur bar bya ste/ lam rgya gram du sbas te d+ha du ra spangs na myos par 'gyur ro/ /gso na mar sbrang rtsi ba'i 'o mas

ling ga bkrus na 'tsho bar 'gyur ro/ /myos byed kyi 'khor lo'i le'u ste sum bcu rtsa gcig pa'o// // de nas mnan pa'i 'khor lo ni g.yam pa la ling tshe dgu pa'i 'khor lo bris te yung ba'i chus ling tse dgu

pa'i dbus su/ ga swa sta~M b+ha ya/ staM b+ha ya g+ha ha zhes bya ba bri'o/ /ling tshe brgyad la/ ga oM ga /ga tA ga /ga re ga /ga tud ga /ga tA ga /ga re ga /ga tu ga /ga re ga /zhes bya ba bris te 'khor lo kha sbyar nas lam rgya graM

du sbas na 'gul mi shes par 'gyur ro/ /mnan pa'i 'khor lo'i le'u ste sum bcu rtsa gnyis pa'o// // de nas mnan pa chen po ni yung ba'i khu bas snag tsha byas te/ kham pa'i ga 'u'i nang du phyi nang le'u tshe

dgu pa'i 'khor lo bris te sngags dgod pa ni/ dbus su rga swA staM b+ha ya staM b+ha ya rga ha zhes bya ba bri'o/ /nang ma la ha ha ha ha/ ha ha ha ha/ zhes bya ba brgyad bri'o/ /phyi rol gyi ling tshe brgyad la ni/ rga oM rga/

rga tA rga/ rga re rga/ rga tud rga/ rga tA rga/ rga re rga/ rga tu rga/ rga re rga/ zhes bya ba bris te/ bsgrub pa 'phags ma la byas la dgra gang nas 'ong ba'i phyogs su sbas na bsrung bar 'gyur zhing dgra'i sgor sbas na mnan
par 'gyur ro/ /dgra mnan pa'i 'khor lo'i le'u ste sum bcu rtsa gsum pa'o// // de nas rig sngags kyi sbyor ba gnon par byed pa'i 'khor lo ni yung ba'i khu bas g.yam pa 'am/ lhang tsher ma gnyis

gang yang rung ba la 'khor lo bris te/ ling tshe dgu pa phyi nang dang bcas pa bri'o/ /sngags dgod pa ni/ dbus su wa swA staM b+ha ya staM b+ha ya hA/ 'khor lo nang ma la/ wa wa wa wa wa wa wa wa/ zhes bya ba

bri'o/ /phyi ma la/ wa oM wa/ wa tA wa/ wa re wa/ wa tud wa/ wa tA wa/ wa re wa/ wa tu wa/ wa re wa/ zhes bya ba bris te phan tshun g.yas g.yon du 'khor lo re re sbas na gnon par 'gyur ro/ /rig sngags kyi
sbyor ba gnon pa'i le'u ste sum bcu rtsa bzhi pa'o// // de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal gzhon nus me tog man dA ra ba dang pad ma dang ku mu ta la sogs pa bsam gyis mi khyab
pas bcom ldan 'das la gtor to/ /lha rdzas kyi rol mo'i sgra du ma yang bsgrags so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa/ dam tshig kyang gang gis 'grub par 'gyur zhes zhus pa dang / bcom ldan 'das
kyis bka' stsal pa/ so so'i dam tshig sdom gnas te/ /lha yi 'khor lo dang ldan pas/ /srog chags dag ni gsad pa spangs/ /ma byin blang bar mi bya zhing / /bud med mi bsten dmad mi bya/ /brdzun ni rnam

pa kun tu spang / /myos 'gyur dag dang sha dag dang / /rku zhing rnam pa rtag tu spang / /mo rnams thams cad kun la ni/ /chags pa'i sems ni spang ba ste/ /ma bzhin du ni kun la ni/ /phan pa'i sems kyis kun la
bkur/ /dam tshig sdom la gnas pa yis/ /las rnams kun la mthu yod 'gyur/ /zhes bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs so/ /dam tshig dang sdom pa bstan pa'i le'u ste sum bcu rtsa lnga pa'o// //
de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin dang tshangs pa la sogs pa'i lha dpag tu med pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal gzhon nu la sogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor dpag tu med pa dang lha dang /
mi dang lha ma yin dang / dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do/ /bcom ldan 'das ma sgrol ma'i rgyud las sna tshogs bstan pa zhes bya ba
rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po d+harma shrI mi dra dang / bod kyi lo ts+tsha ba dge slong chos kyi bzang pos bsgyur ba'o/ /stag lung rgyud 'bum la gtugs nas zhus so dag go/ /

@/ /rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya tA rA b+haT+Ta TA ri ka nA ma aSh+Ta sha ta ka~M /bod skad du/ rje btsun ma 'phags ma sgrol ma'i mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pa zhes bya ba/ rje btsun ma 'phags ma sgrol ma la phyag 'tshal lo/ /dpal ldan yid

'ong po ta la/ /sna tshogs khams kyis rnam par spras/ /sna tshogs ljon pa bkram pa ste/ /skye gnyis du ma sgra 'byin pa/ /'bab chu sna tshogs ku co che/ /ri dgas sna tshogs 'khrugs pa ste/ /me tog sna tshogs rigs rnams

kyis/ /kun du dri yis bkang ba ste/ /sna tshogs yid 'ong 'bras bur ldan/ /rkang pa drug pa glu yi sgra/ /mi 'am ci ni glu snyan len/ /glang chen smyon pas yang dag khengs/ /rig 'dzin grub pa'i tshogs rnams dang / /

dri za rnams kyang glu len pa/ /thub pa 'dod chags bral rnams dang / /byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs gzhan dang / /sa bcu'i dbang phyug rnams dang ni/ /'phags ma sgrol sogs lha mo rnams/ /rig pa'i rgyal mo

stong rnams kyis/ /rtag tu legs par bsten pa'o/ /khro bo'i rgyal po'i tshogs gzhan dang / /rta mgrin la sogs kyis bskor ba/ /sems can kun la phan par brtson/ /bcom ldan 'das ni spyan ras gzigs/ /bzhugs

te de phyir dpal dang ldan/ /pad ma'i snying po thub pa'i gdan/ /dka' thub chen po dang ldan pa/ /byams pa dang ni snying rjer ldan/ /lha yi 'khor ni chen po la/ /chos gsung bar ni yang dag bzhugs/ /de ru nyer 'dug yang dag

lungs/ /phyag na rdo rje stobs po che/ /mchog tu snying rje dang ldan pas/ /spyan ras gzigs la zhus pa ste/ /rkun po sbrul dang seng ge me/ /glang po stag dang chus 'jigs pas/ /zhi mdzad thub pas sems can rnams/ /
'khor ba'i rgya mtshor bying ba rnams/ /'khor ba'i zhags pas bcings pa rnams/ /chags sdang gti mug dri ma las/ /gang gis sems can grol gyur pa/ /de gsungs bdag la thub chen po/ /'jig rten mgon pos

'di skad gsungs/ /dpal ldan de ni spyan ras gzigs/ /phyag na rdo rje rab rtogs byed/ /snyan pa'i tshig ni 'di skad gsungs/ /nyon cig gsang ba'i rgyal dbang po/ /skyob pa 'od dpag med pa yi/ /smon lam stobs kyis byung

ba ste/ /nga yis 'jig rten ma ru shes/ /snying rje chen po dang ldan pa'i/ /'gro ba 'don par brtson pa mo/ /nyi ma shar ba dang 'dra ba/ /zla ba nya 'dra byad kyi 'od/ /lha bcas mi dang lha min rnams/ /'di rnams thams cad
gsal bar byed/ /'jig rten gsum po g.yo bar byed/ /gnod sbyin srin po 'jigs par byed/ /phyag na ut+pal sngon po bsnams/ /ma 'jigs ma 'jigs zhes brjod ma/ /bar snang du ni 'phar bar gnas/ /'gro ba

yang dag bsrung don du/ /mtshon cha'i bskal pa byung ba dang / /'jigs pa sna tshogs 'khrugs don du/ /rgyal ba rnams kyis bdag bskyed de/ /ming rnams dran pa nyid kyis kyang / /sems can thams cad bdag gis bsrung / /
sna tshogs 'jigs pa'i rgya mtsho las/ /sems can thams cad bdag gis bsgral/ /des na bdag la 'jig rten du/ /rgyal ba'i tshogs kyis sgrol mar bsgrags/ /thal mo sbyar bar byas nas ni/ /spyan sngar 'dug

ste 'di skad gsol/ /gus dang bcas pas yang dag gnas/ /gang zhig rgyal bas sngon bsgrags pa/ /gsungs shig mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pa/ /sa bcu'i dbang phyug mgon po rnams/ /byang chub sems dpa' rab dga'

ba/ /sdig pa spong byed bsod nams dang / /bkra shis grags pa 'phel bar byed/ /gter dang nor rnams 'phel byed nyid/ /nad rnams thams cad brlag byed pa/ /dpal ldan shis pa 'jog byed pa/ /nad med tshe ni 'phel bar

byed/ /sems can rnams la byams bsgoms nas/ /de dag sgrogs shig thub chen po/ /'di skad zhus nas bcom ldan 'das/ /spyan ras gzigs dbang rab tu bzhad/ /phyogs rnams thams cad rab gzigs nas/ /'di lta bu yi

byams pa spros/ /phyag ni g.yas pas phyag thabs mdzad/ /bsod nams mtshan nyid ldan pa yi/ /de gsungs shes rab shin du che/ /legs so legs so dka' thub che/ /sems can kun la gcig tu brtse/ /skal ba chen po'i

mi rnams nyon/ /mi rnams gang zhig 'di sgrogs pa/ /nor gyi dbang phyug yang dag 'gyur/ /nad rnams thams cad rnam par grol/ /dbang phyug kun dang yang dag ldan/ /dus min 'chi ba nges par 'joms/ /'chi ba bde ba can 'gro ba/ /

de rnams bdag gis bshad par bya/ /lha yi dge 'dun bdag la nyon/ /'di la rjes su yid rang gis/ /legs par bsdams par 'gyur la bstod/ /oM dge ba can ni gzi brjid che/ /'jig rten gso byed snyan pa che/ /dbyangs can

ma ni spyan yangs ma/ /shes rab dpal dang blo 'phel ma/ /gso byed ma dang rgyas byed ma/ /swA hA oM gyi rnam pa 'dod gzugs ma/ /sems can kun la phan par brtson/ /g.yul las sgrol byed rgyal ba mo/ /lha mo shes rab

pha rol phyin/ /'phags ma sgrol ma yid 'ong ma/ /rdza rnga dung can rgyas ma mo/ /rig pa'i rgyal mo tshig snyan ma/ /zla ba'i gdong can dkar mo che/ /mi pham gos ni ser mo can/ /sgyu ma chen mo dkar mo che/ /stobs po che la pha rol

phyin/ /rtsub mo chen mo gtub chen mo/ /sdang ba'i sems can rlag byed ma/ /rab tu zhi ba zhi ba'i gzugs/ /rnam par rgyal ba 'bar ba'i 'od/ /glog gi phreng ba'i rgyal mtshan can/ /ral gri 'khor lo gzhu thogs mtshon/ /

'chol byed rengs byed nag mo che/ /mtshan mo nag mo mtshan spyod ma/ /bsrung byed rmongs byed zhi ba mo/ /mdzes ma dge ma dra ba'i ldi/ /tshangs pa mo ni rig byed ma/ /gsang ba mo ni brag phug gnas/ /bkra shis don byed zhi ba

mo/ /skye gnas rig byed yid mgyogs ma/ /thod pa can ni shugs chen mo/ /tshangs ma bde ma gzhan mi rgyal/ /ded dpon chen po snying rje gnas/ /chud zos lam ni rab ston ma/ /mchog ster ston byed ston pa mo/ /bud med

gzugs la dpag med gnon/ /ri khrod ma dang rnal 'byor ma/ /grub ma gtum mo bdud rtsi ma/ /des ma nor sbyin bsod nams ma/ /bskal chen skal bzang mdzes ston ma/ /mthar byed skrag byed 'jigs byed ma/ /drag dang brtul

zhugs chen mo ma/ /'gro la gcig tu phan par brtson/ /skyabs byed gus la gsong po ma/ /ngag gi dbang phyug zhi phra ma/ /rtag par kun 'gro rdo rje ma/ /don kun grub byed bzang po ma/ /gsad byed gso byed nor ster ma/ /mi 'jigs

bsod nams gau ta ma/ /spyan ras gzigs dbang bdag nyid skyes/ /mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad 'di dag ni/ /phan par byed par grags pa ste/ /mchog tu rmad byung gsang ba mo/ /lha yul na 'ang rnyed dka' ba'i/ /bskal bzang skal

ba dang ldan byed/ /dug ni thams cad nyams byed pa/ /nad rnams thams cad zhi byed ma/ /sems can kun la bde ster ma/ /blo ldan gang zhig lan gsum klog /mnyam bzhag gtsang sbra byas pa yis/ /des ni dus mi ring ba ru/ /

rgyal srid dpal yang thob par 'gyur/ /rtag tu sdug pa bde bar 'gyur/ /bkren pa phyug por 'gyur ba'o/ /rmongs pa shes rab chen por 'gyur/ /yid gzhungs 'gyur bar the tsom med/ /bcings pa 'ching las grol bar 'gyur/ /tha snyad

las kyang rgyal bar 'gyur/ /dgra bo bshes por 'gyur ba'o/ /rwa can dang ni mche ba can/ /dog pa'i 'thab mo rgyal dka' ba/ /sna tshogs 'jigs pa 'khrugs pa las/ /mtshan ni 'di rnams dran pa yis/ /'jigs pa kun las

grol bar byed/ /dus min 'chi las grol byed pa/ /skyes bu snyan pa thob par 'gyur/ /mir ni skye ba don dang bcas/ /de gcig pu yi phan yon gyis/ /gang zhig 'dir ni sngar langs nas/ /skyes bu gang zhig sgrogs byed pa/ /

de ni dus ring tshe dang ldan/ /mi yi dpal ni dga' 'gyur te/ /lha dang klu dang gnod sbyin dang / /dri za dang ni lus srul po/ /'byung po gshed byed srin po dang / /ma mo rtsub pa'i sems ldan pa/ /gnod sbyin mo dang yi dgas byed/ /

smyo byed dang ni gnod byed rnams/ /grib gnon dang ni brjed byed dang / /sha za la ni sogs pa rnams/ /ro langs sna tshogs la sogs dang / /skul byed ma dang sems sdang rnams/ /grib ma la yang 'gom mi byed/ /ji ltar slar

yang rtsod par 'gyur/ /sdang ba'i sems can 'ching bar byed/ /nad la sogs pas thebs mi 'gyur/ /phyug cing longs spyod yon tan ldan/ /bu dang tsha bo 'phel bar 'gyur/ /rigs dang ldan zhing mthong dgar 'gyur/ /

gzi brjid ldan zhing tshig gsal ba/ /blo ldan skye ba dran par 'gyur/ /bstan bcos thams cad rig par 'gyur/ /dge ba'i bshes gnyen yang dag ldan/ /byang chub sems kyis yang dag brgyan/ /gang dang gang du skyes

pa der/ /rtag tu sangs rgyas kyis mi spong / /rje btsun ma 'phags ma sgrol ma'i mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pa/ 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis gsungs pa rdzogs s+ho// //stag lung rgyud 'buM la gtugs nas zhus dag par bgyis/ /

@// //rgya gar skad du/ tA ra de bI nA ma aSh+Ta sha ta ka na/ bod skad du/ lha mo sgrol ma'i mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pa zhes bya ba/ lha mo chen mo sgrol ma rnam par rgyal ba'i nor bu rnam pa sna tshogs kyi do

shal dang / na bza' dang / sham thabs kyi gshal kas 'jig rten gyi khams chen po'i bla re byas pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de nas lha mo sgrol mas de'i tshe sngon ma mthong ma thos pa'i gzungs kyi mchog brjod pa/

oM trai lo kya bi dza ya/ a tsit+ta dzA ya/ a ni ra tsi dza tA ya/ su dzA ya/ bi dzA ya/ ma hA dzA ya/ bi dzA ya/ dza ya dza ya/ he he/ sma ra sma ra/ ba ra ba ra/ ba ra da/ ma hA de bi/ bi la sa/ bi la sa/ bi la sa/ ba dza a mo ta ka ri

bi dza ya de bi/ hI hI/ ki ni ki ni bi lam ba se/ sma ra sma ra/ ma hA pra dz+nyA a ni ba ta/ badzra ma ma hA kA ru Ni ka /b+ha gi ni hruM hruM/ s+phu Ta s+phu Ta/ s+phoT s+phoT/ A be sha ya/ A be sha ya/ d+hu na d+hu na/ bi d+hu na bi d+hu na/ kaM pa kaM pa/ kaM pa

ya/ su ra b+hi gan+d+ha/ a ti si ta/ mu khe ha la da ba la/ saM ga rA dza na/ bi ma bi gi/ bi nA sha ya/ bi nA sha ya/ he b+ha ga ba ti/ san+t+ra sa ya/ bi g+ha nA na/ pa ri ba la ya/ a smA kaM a smA kaM/ ma da ni ma da ni/ saM bo d+ha ya/ saM mo ha ya/

ha ra ha ra/ hi ri hi ri/ hu ru hu ru/ bi ta ka ra/ ba ra dza/ haM haM/ tro tA ya/ haM haM/ san+t+ra tA ya/ san+t+ro ya/ man+ta man+ta/ marda marda/ tsa ra tsa ra/ saM tsa ra saM tsa ra/ be ga be ga be ga ba ti/ na mo na mo na maHswA hA/ de nas lha dang lha min tshogs/ /

srin po gnod sbyin mi 'am ci/ /lto 'phye chen po'i tshogs rnams dang / /'byung po dri za log 'dren rnams/ /'jig rten gsum du grags pa'i mchog /gsang sngags chen po 'di thos nas/ /skrag cing mgo bo smad
gyur te/ /lag pa chen po yongs bskyod nas/ /gang gis 'di nas sa gsum 'di/ /mtha' dag khyab par byas pa'i phyir/ /'dod pa'i lha'i ngag bzlog pa/ /sgrol ma spyan yangs phyag 'tshal lo/ /spyan ras

gzigs kyi rigs smos pa/ /che ba nyid kyi grags pa 'od/ /spyan yangs khyod ni sems can rnams/ /phan bzhed slad du 'byung ba lags/ /de nas dbang phyug la sogs pa/ /lha dang lha min 'dus kun dang / /rigs

sngags 'chang gi bdag po dang / /de bzhin rig sngags 'chang ba rnams/ /bla gos phrag pa gcig gzar te/ /bskor ba mchog ni byas nas kyang / /pus mo'i lha nga sa steng du/ /btsugs nas tshig ni 'di skad smras/ /

sgrol ma 'od 'bar de la ni/ /phyag 'tshal phyag 'tshal phyag 'tshal lo/ /ming brgya rtsa brgyad dam pa yi/ /dpe med ming ni brjod par bgyi/ /bkra shis rnam rgyal dpal bzang ba/ /skye dgu'i dbang phyug mngon shes

myur/ /dbang phyug rab dga' 'jigs la drag /rgod bag med cing dregs pa med/ /pad ma'i spyan dang pad ma'i zhal/ /pad ma'i lte ba rab gtsang sbyin/ /spyan bzang spyan ni yangs pa ste/ /sngo ba ut+pal sngon po'i 'od/ /
skyob pa skyabs 'os bde ba sbyin/ /de bzhin stobs sbyin gzugs sbyin pa/ /mgon po mgon mdzad drag mo ste/ /dkon mchog gsum po rgyal mdzad ma/ /sgros dmar sen mo dmar ba ste/ /spyan rtsa dmar pos gzigs
par mdzad/ /dga' mdzad dga' stobs pad ma lags/ /pad ma'i mdog can pad mdog dgyes/ /'jig rten gsum 'dul zhi ba ste/ /'jigs pa'i cha lugs stobs mo che/ /'dul du 'chug ma 'dul mdzad

ma/ /bstod ldan mi mchog dam pa lags/ /rab gsal 'dul ba rdo rje can/ /rnam par rgyal ba 'od gsal ba/ /byang chub rdul med dri ma med/ /zla ba lha mchog rnams kyi rjed/ /sred bya dang ni sred bya'i bar/ /
rgyu zhing gshegs la 'od zer mdzes/ /chu lha g.yul 'gyed 'gying bag can/ /skyes mchog rang bzhin yid 'phros rgyas/ /gtsug phud gsum po lto tshil gsum/ /spyan gsum dri ma gsum sel ba/ /
srid pa sel mdzad khong dge ba/ /tshig ldan mar yang de bzhin grags/ /rgyal ba sbyin pa bsod nams sbyin/ /sdig pa 'joms ma 'jigs pa med/ /nor sbyin mdog sbyin zhi ba ma/ /gzugs bzang phyal bzang

nu ma bzang / /sgyu 'phrul sgyu 'phrul ldan zhing 'dul/ /dul ba bsrung ba rdul sel ba/ /phreng ba thogs ma rgyags mdzad ma/ /rgyags pa sbyin ma dregs spong ma/ /drag mo lags te gzi bskyed ma/ /dkar mo zhi mdzad

bde ba mo/ /skye dgu'i bdag mo tshangs par ldan/ /tshangs sbyin dbang phyug dam pa lags/ /zla ba'i 'od can zla ba'i zhal/ /zla ba'i gzi ni 'phrog par mdzad/ /nyi ma'i gzi 'phrog dgyes pa mo/ /yid 'ong bzang zhing
zhi ba mo/ /bde ba bde ldan mu dang stegs/ /bkra shis bgegs rnams sel mdzad ma/ /nor spel bsod nams rnam par rgyal/ /'dzam bu'i chu bo gser dngul 'od/ /'jigs pa sel ba 'jigs med sbyin/ /
sgrol ma lags te zla ba'i zhal/ /sems can kun la med mi 'gyur/ /mchod gnas phyag gnas dga' mdzad ma/ /cha lugs sngo ba cha lugs bzang / /rgyan dmar brgyan du thogs pa ste/ /na bza' gser mnabs gang
ga ma/ /dkar mo 'bar ba rnam par gzigs/ /ge'u wang gi thig le spos/ /'khor ldan rdo rje chu lha nyid/ /dkyil 'khor mchog mnga' 'jigs mdzad ma/ /tshems dkar bzhad cing tshems dkar 'dzum/ /dpung rgyan

snyan cha gdub 'khor thogs/ /do shal 'bar ba'i chun po can/ /'og pag bzang ldan zhal bzang ma/ /grogs ni nim pa'i lo ma thogs/ /nor bu'i cod pan nor bu 'chang / /nor bu'i rgyan rnams brgyan du thogs/ /nor bu'i

'od zer snang ba can/ /nor bu'i dkyil 'khor rgyan mnga' ba/ /'bar ba'i mdog mnga' rdo rje can/ /skyes pa bud med sad par mdzad/ /zhi ba dbyig thogs mche ba can/ /tshangs pa'i shugs can rlung dang ldan/ /bud med

lags te mkha' las gshegs/ /lha mo mchog gi 'od 'phrog ma/ /'od dang ldan pa 'dod pas 'dul/ /'dod pa'i khro bo rab 'joms ma/ /drag po thor tshugs gtsug phud can/ /tshangs pa tshangs pa'i gsung ldan rgyal/ /

ping ka'i skad 'dra pheg bzang ma/ /'jig rten dbang phyug rigs mchog skyes/ /dbyig pa'i shing lo rdo rje thogs/ /drag mo rin chen 'od kyis brgyan/ /gshegs na snyan cha dri med g.yo/ /gshin rje ba yi yid la 'jug /
rig sngags 'chang ma gzugs 'chang ma/ /stobs lnga stobs dang ldan par mdzad/ /stobs dang stobs med mnga' ba ste/ /shes rab mtshon gyis gcod par mdzad/ /sgyu rtsal lags te sgyu rtsal ldan/ /
de bzhin brjod dang smra ba lags/ /steng nas khyams dang khyams bza' tshul/ /tsam pa ka'i chun pos gsal/ /ser mo tsan pa legs pa'i rten/ /drag mo phyag na chun po thogs/ /skal ba bzang mo gshal ka

can/ /de bzhin shin du shas cher dgyes/ /rigs mtshan shin du stobs dang ldan/ /rdo rje khro bo dga' mdzad ma/ /bde ldan blo ldan rdo rje'i thabs/ /blo mdzad shes rab skyed par mdzad/ /lha mo lam me cod pan can/ /lha rnams

kun las tshul lhag pa/ /sred med bu mo sdig pa sel/ /bkra shis ngo tsha shes dang dgyes/ /rab tu dga' ma 'grogs na dga'/ /spyod tshul dga' la dga' dang ldan/ /dga' ma dga' bar mdzad pa ste/ /chos rnams kun
gyi legs pa'i rten/ /sangs rgyas sprul pa sprul mdzad ma/ /nga rgyal sel bar mdzad pa ste/ /las dang nyon mongs rab 'joms shing / /'dod pa'i sde rnams rab 'joms ma/ /shes pa bcu mnga' sangs rgyas

pa/ /pha rol phyin pa bcu la gnas/ /sa bcu dag la mnga' brnyes pa/ /stobs rnams bcu pos cher gsal ma/ /rdo rje cod pan rdo rje 'chang / /rdo rje phra mo lha min sel/ /dus kyi rdo rje rab tu rgyags/ /rdo rje lcags
kyu bde dang dpal/ /rdo rje zhags pa zhags pa bzang / /sgeg mo rdo rje phyag na bsnams/ /yid 'ong yid la tshim par mdzad/ /pha rol bgegs rnams sel mdzad ma/ /tshim mdzad shas cher bde ba ste/ /

rol cing gar thabs ston par mdzad/ /chos can ha la ha la'i 'od/ /chos sbyin rnam par gzigs pa lags/ /khyod ni rdo rje 'phro ba dang / /bdud rtsi rdo rjer brjod pa ste/ /rdo rje 'bar ba stobs mo che/ /lha mo chen
mo khyod phyag 'tshal/ /bdag cag rnams kyis bstod pa yis/ /mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad mchog 'di brjod/ /kye kye bcom ldan mchog nyid ni/ /smra ba rnams kyi mchog lags gsung / /de nas zla ba'i
'od 'dra zhing / /'bar la 'phro bar ldan pa yi/ /lha mo sgrol ma brjid bag can/ /'dzum bzhin du ni rab smras pa/ /dbang phyug chen po la sogs kun/ /nga'i tshig ni mnyan par bgyis/ /thams cad
rtag tu 'thun par ni/ /stobs bcu dag la brtson par gyis/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i tshul chen yang / /dus kun tu ni bsrung bar gyis/ /zhi ba'i lam la dmigs pas ni/ /'khor ba'i rgya mtsho mi bzad cing / /
'jigs pa chen po'i gzhir gyur pa/ /rgal dka' khyed kyis rgal bar gyis/ /mya ngan 'das pa'i grong khyer la/ /dmigs nas brtson te 'jug par gyis/ /de nas nyi 'od 'bar ba yi/ /phreng ba lta bu mdzes pa'i
zhal/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'brug gi sgra/ /'dra ba'i tshig ni bka' stsal pa/ /kye ma rig sngags sgrol ma'i mchog /mun pa sel bar byed pa dang / /mthu stobs rgya chen skyed byed pa/ /sgrib pa thams
cad gcod byed pa/ /tshogs rnams skyed pa'i gzi brjid kyis/ /dag par byas pa ma yin pas/ /shas cher dga' bar byed pa yi/ /gzungs 'di thos par mi 'gyur ro/ /sngon chad sangs rgyas brtson byas pa'i/ /
brtan po gzi brjid dag rnams la/ /dam tshig chen po rig sngags kyi/ /dam tshig 'di ni 'byung bar 'gyur/ /nyon mongs mtha' dag rab 'joms shing / /sdig pa thams cad sel byed pa/ /sems can

thams cad rab 'byed pa'i/ /gzungs sngags rdo rje mchog 'dzin pa/ /su zhig mnyam par bzhag pa yis/ /nyan tam 'chang ngam klog byed na/ /rang byung gis ni gsungs pa bzhin/ /de'i don kun grub par 'gyur/ /
nyon mongs kun las rnam grol zhing / /sems can kun las lhag pa'i mchog /'jig rten dag tu chos shes la/ /'dzud pa'i de bzhin gshegs dang mtshungs/ /su zhig ming brgya rtsa brgyad 'di/ /

'don zhing sgrol ma zla ba'i zhal/ /de bzhin bstod byed de dag ni/ /sangs rgyas nyid kyang thob par 'gyur/ /de'i don kyang grub 'gyur zhing / /rgyal po rnams dang stobs chen mi/ /gzhan yang sems can bgrang ba gang / /

thams cad de yi dbang du 'gyur/ /lha mo sgrol ma zhal bzang ba'i/ /ming brgya rtsa brgyad grags pa 'di/ /'jig rten dag na rgyags pa dang / /nyon mongs mi rigs kun sel ba'o/ /de nas bdud ris gyen du g.yos pa'i

ri bo 'khrug byed pa/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i ri bo mchog dang 'dra ba'i sku mnga' ba/ /'od gsal lha dang mi rnams legs par sad par mdzad pa po/ /rgyal sras thu bo rnams kyis khyab par stobs kyis brten pa

yis/ /gsung rab rtag tu tshogs chen brda sprod la/ /don chen grags shing phan phyir zhugs pa gang / /rab des chos de dang ni bsdud byed dang / /de bzhin khyad par sems pa'i rims sel bas/ /bzod med nyon mongs
sel ba dang / /zhi ba'i yid ni skyed pa'i tshig /rgyal ba'i mchog gis bka' stsal nas/ /gzhes par gyur te mi gsung bzhugs/ /de nas sgrol mchog lha mos gtsor gyur dga' bar byed cing yid 'phrog la/ /

dga' ba rgya chen skyed cing tshe dang bde sbyin bstan pa'i tshig thos pas/ /lha tshogs lha min tshogs bcas mtha' dag dga' bas rgyas shing rmad byung nas/ /rab tu dga' zhing spyi bos thal mo sbyar te smra ba zhi bar gyur/ /
sgrol ma'i mchog ces bya ba'i gzungs te lha mo sgrol ma'i mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pa/ rdzogs s+ho// //stag lung rgyud 'bum la gtugs nas zhus dag par bgyi// // dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo/ /

na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ na maH Ar+yA wa lo ki te shwa ra ya/ bo d+hi satwA ya/ ma hA satwA ya/ ma hA kA ru Ni kA ya/ tad+ya thA/ oM tA re tu t+tA re tu re sarba duSh+Ta pra duSh+Ta~M ma ma kr-i te dzaM b+ha ya: staM b+ha ya/ mo ha ya/ ban+d+ha ya/ hU~M hU~M hU~M/

phaT phaT phaT/ sarba duSh+Ta stam b+ha ni tA te swA hA/ 'phags ma sgrol ma'i gzungs rdzogs s+ho// //yang zhus ste/ stag lung rgyud 'bum la gtugs te zhus s+ho// //rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya tA rA swa pra ti dz+nyA nA ma d+hA ra NI/
bod skad du/ 'phags ma sgrol ma rang gis dam bcas pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs/ 'phags ma sgrol ma la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de nas sgrol ma rang gis dam bcas pa'i gzungs smras pa/ tad+ya thA/

oM tA re tA rA ya/ hU~M hU~M hU~M/ sa ma yas+thi te/ b+ha ra b+ha ra/ sarbA b+ha ra Na/ bi b+hu Shi te/ pad+ma ni pad+ma/ ma hA pad+ma/ A sa na s+thi te/ ha sa ha sa/ trai lo kya ba ra de/ sarba de ba dA na pa/ pU dzi te sma d+ha hi/ b+ha ga ba ti tA re/

sma rA hI/ b+ha ga bAM ta/ ta thA ga ta s+ya/ pu ra ta/ sa ma yaM/ d+ha ra d+ha ra/ ma hA satwa a ba lo ki te/ ma Ni ka ni ka /bi tsi trA b+ha ra Ne/ oM bi lo ka ya/ che ge mo/ b+ha ga ba te tA re/ hrIM hrIM hrIM phaT swA hA/ gzungs sngags 'di
yid kyis dran pa tsam gyis 'jigs pa thams cad sel bar 'gyur ro/ /dngos grub thams cad thob par 'gyur ro/ /sems can thams cad dbang du 'gyur ro/ /dkar po'i tshes brgyad dam bcwa lnga la 'phags

ma sgrol ma la mchod pa chen po byas te/ sgrol ma mngon sum du mthong gi bar de tsam du bzlas par bya'o/ /gang 'dod pa de sbyin no/ /mchog thams cad ster ro/ /ma byin na bdag gis mtshams med pa lnga byas so/ /

gzhan yang phan yon dpag tu med pa 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /rdo rje mchog gi rgyud las btus/ 'phags ma sgrol ma rang gis dam bcas pa'i gzungs/ rdzogs s+ho// //yang zhus ste/ stag lung rgyud 'bum la gtugs nas zhus dag go/ //

rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya tA ra aSh+Ta g+ho re tA sbI sU tra/ bod skad du/ 'phags ma sgrol ma 'jigs pa brgyad las skyob pa'i mdo/ dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo/ /rje btsun ma sgrol ma la phyag 'tshal lo/ /

bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das ri rab kyi steng lha'i gnas na bzhugs te/ de nyid du 'khor rnams kyi nang nas lha mo sgrol mas 'di skad ces

smras so/ /mtho ris rin chen lta bu 'di thob nas/ /las dang las kyi 'bras bu shes par byos/ /bzang po sten cing ngan pa spang bar gyis/ /gang dag sdig pa'i las rnams spyod byed pa/ /'jig rten pha rol mthur du 'bab

'gyur te/ /dud 'gro glen rkugs gcig la gcig za dang / /gyen mthur 'bab 'dzeg g.yang sa ngal ba'i lam/ /'jigs shing nga skrag shin du skyi g.ya' ba/ /zon dang bcas pa'i sdug bsngal bsam mi khyab/ /yi dgas

ltogs shing skom dang lus mi 'tsham/ /bza' btung snang yang gzhan gyis bsrungs pa dang / /kha cig zos kyang me dang mtshon du 'gyur/ /ltogs shing skom pa'i sdug bsngal bsam mi khyab/ /dmyal bar skyes pa'i sems

can de dag ni/ /rang dbang med par gshin rje gdug pas khrid/ /bsregs shing btsos te mtshon gyis rab tu 'thub/ /bsran glags med pa'i sdug bsngal tsha dang grang / /des na tshe 'dir sdig pa'i las byed pa/ /rang gis

rang la mngan ni char byas yin/ /bskal pa mang por sdug bsngal drag pos gdungs/ /thar pa'i dus med bsran pa'i glags kyang med/ /dran pa gsal bas las kyi 'bras bur shes/ /sdug bsngal ma bzod smre sngags

rang la rmo/ /skad ngan drag po'i ku sgras gzhan yang skrag / de la sogs te sdug bsngal bsam mi khyab/ /gang dag nyes dmigs rab tu shes gyis la/ /ngan song gsum gyi rgyu rnams rab tu spangs/ /sdig pa'i

rnam pa phra rags gang la yang / /lus ngag yid kyi sgo nas spyad da re/ /rang yang bde la 'gro rnams yongs la phan/ /chags sdang rmongs spangs snying rje'i rtsa ba brtan/ /sgo gsum dang bas 'bad de dge ba spyad/ /

shin du zab pa'i snying po 'di la 'bad/ /me tog sad kyis khyer ba'i 'bras bu la/ /so nam byas kyang myu gu mi skye ltar/ /sdom nyams the tshom zos pa'i gang zag gis/ /shin tu zab pa'i rig sngags bsgrub

gyur kyang / /byin brlabs 'byung ngo snyam yang 'byung mi srid/ /rtsol ba de dag ngal ba don med 'gyur/ /rig sngags de yang skye bo'i tshig dang mtshungs/ /ting 'dzin rnams kyang byis pa'i bsam pa 'dra/ /skyon med skyes bus

rig sngags de bsgrubs na/ /ji ltar 'dod pa bzhin du myur du 'grub/ /dper na n+ya gro d+ha'i sa bon ni/ /shin tu phra yang chu lud legs bran na/ /dgung zla bdun na dpag tshad tsam du skye/ /bems po phyi'i 'gyur yang de 'dra na/ /
rig pas rig pa bsgrub pa lta ci smos/ /'od gsal nang gi 'gyur la dpag tu med/ /tshong dpon lam la mkhas pa dag la brten/ /gru tshags legs pas rgya mtshor zhugs gyur na/ /rin chen 'dod pa bzhin du

rnyed gyur nas/ /rang gi gnas su legs par phyin pa yin/ /byams dang snying rje dga' dang btang snyoms rten/ /byang chub sems ldan dge ba spyad gyur na/ /yang dag rdzogs kyi lam la zhugs 'gyur te/ /nges par

mkhyen nyid sa la 'gro bar 'gyur/ /mda' nyid skyes bu'i 'theb nas shor gyur na/ /mi 'phang snyam yang shin tu 'phangs par 'gyur/ /chos nyid don kun chub pa'i gang zag ni/ /mi phyin snyam yang pha rol phyin par

'gyur/ /bya cha'i rnam pa rang bzhin rdzogs gyur nas/ /sangs rgyas 'bras bu 'thob par the tsom med/ /chos nyid rnam par dag pa de rtogs na/ /bdag med srog med srog kyang gcad du med/ /las med de'i rnam par

smin pa med/ /mtha' rnams rab spangs skyes bu rnam par grol/ /de don rtogs phyir bdag gis bshad pa'i/ /snying po 'di la gus pas bzlas gyur na/ /bskal pa grangs med gsum gyi sdig kyang 'dzad/ /ngan song gsum

dang 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal kun/ /rab tu sbyong zhing sgrib pa rnams gyang 'dag /don dang ldan pa'i snying po 'di lta ste/ oM byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen mo/ lha mo khyod kyis bskyab tu gsol/ /oM na mo Ar+ya

a ba lo ki hi shwa rA ya/ bo d+hi satwA ya/ ma hA satwA ya/ ma hA kA ru Ni kA ya/ tad+ya thA/ oM tA re tud tA re tu re sarba duSh+TAn/ pra duSh+Ta na ma ma kri te/ dzam b+ha ya/ stam b+ha ya/ mo hA ya/ ban d+ha ya/ hU~M hU~M hU~M/ phaT phaT phaT swA hA/

ma ma Ar+yA ba lo b+ha yA na rA/ bo d+hi satwA/ ma hA satwA ni/ a d+hiSh+ThA na/ a d+hiSh+Thi te ma ma sarba karma a ba ra Na swa b+hA ba/ shud d+he bi shud d+he/ sho d+ha ya bi sho d+ha ya hU~M phaT swA hA/ de nas sangs rgyas nyid kyis su/ /lha mo nyid la

rab tu bstod/ /thugs rje shin du che bas 'gro ba'i don mdzad ma/ /mtshan dang dpe byad rdzogs shing rin chen rgyan gyis spras/ /shin tu mdzes tshul 'dzum zhing bzhad pa'i bzhin/ /spyan gyi skye mched zar ma'i pad+ma 'dra/ /

snyan gyi skye mched ug cos bye ba 'dra/ /shangs kyi skye mched ad pal bum bu 'dra/ /zhal gyi skye mched ha lo rgyas pa 'dra/ /sna tshogs sku mnga' na chung mtshan ldan sku/ /chos kyi sgra sgrogs ka la ping ka'i gsung / /
sems can kun la byams mgon thugs rje'i thugs/ /'khor ba'i skyon gyis ma gos pad ma g.yon/ /sems can don rnams mdzad phyir skyabs sbyin g.yas/ /thabs dang shes rab nyi zla'i gdan la bzhugs/ /

rje btsun sgrol ma la ni skyabs su mchi/ /'khor ba'i g.yang sa che las bdag skyobs shig /'gro drug rang kha'i gnas su 'khor ra re/ /thugs rje chen mo'i zhags pas bdag zung shig /ngan song gsum gyi gnas
su sho ra re/ /'khyams med pa'i lam du bdag chug shig /log par lta ba'i rigs su skyes sa re/ /bla ma byang sems mnga' dang bdag sprod cig /bshes gnyen ngan pa dag dang phrad da re'o/ /seng ge glang
chen me dang sbrul/ /mi rgod chu dang rims rnams dang / /sha zas 'jigs pa brgyad po las/ /skyob mdzad khyed la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'jig rten 'di dang gzhan dag tu/ /'jigs pa brgyad las bskyab

tu gsol/ /pha rol 'bras bu ma thob bar dag tu/ /sbyin dang tshul khrims bzod pa brtson 'grus dang / /bsam gtan shes rab thabs dang smon lam dang / /stobs dang de bzhin ye shes pha rol phyin/ /bcu po de

dang mi 'bral 'grogs par shog /rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang la las chos 'di bri ba dang / bklag pa dang / kha thon dang / kun chub pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la bya ba dang / gzhan dag la yang rgya chen

bstan par bya'o zhes bka' stsal pa dang / thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor rnams yi rangs te mngon par bstod do/ /rje btsun ma sgrol ma 'jigs pa brgyad las skyob pa'i mdo' rdzogs s+ho// //yang zhus ste skar//

@#/ /rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya aSh+Ta ma hA ba ya tA rA ni nA ma d+hA ra NI/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa 'jigs pa chen po brgyad las sgrol ba zhes bya ba'i gzungs/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad
la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan 'byung gnas la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa kun nas spos dri la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa gzhan gyis mi thub pa'i rtsal dang
ldan pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel ba la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa zla ba mchog la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa zhi ba'i rgyal po la

phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa zla ba'i bla ma la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po snying rje chen po dang ldan pa 'jigs pa med par byed pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /tad+ya thA/

d+ha re d+ha re/ d+hA re d+hA ra NI/ ra na ko te a b+ha yA ka la pe/ kal pa ni ga Ni/ a nan ta kal pe/ a mr-i ta kal pe/ hu tA sha re/ a nan ta mu khe/ a nan ta tsak+Shu sa mud ga te/ oM b+ha swA hA/ rigs kyi bu gzungs kyi gsang sngags

'di dag ni sems can ngan song du 'gro ba rnams kyi don gyi phyir/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag gis gsungs pa dang / byin gyis brlabs pa dang / rjes su yi rang ba yin no/ /rigs kyi bu
byang chub sems dpa' gang la la gzungs 'di 'dzin par byed pa de 'jigs pa brgyad po sems can dmyal ba'i 'jigs pa mtha' yas pa dang / dud 'gro'i skye gnas kyi 'jigs pa mtha' yas pa dang / gshin rje'i
'jig rten gyi 'jigs pa mtha' yas pa dang / yi dgas kyi 'jigs pa mtha' yas pa dang / bgrod dka' ba'i 'jigs pa mtha' yas pa dang / skye ba'i 'jigs pa mtha' yas pa dang / nad kyi 'jigs pa mtha'
yas pa dang / 'chi ba'i 'jigs pa mtha' yas pa dag las yang dag par 'da' bar 'gyur ro/ /phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis dgongs par 'gyur ro/ /sems rnam par g.yeng ba

med par 'chi ba'i dus byed cing / sangs rgyas rnams kyi spyan sngar skye bar 'gyur/ zad mi shes pa'i lus thob par 'gyur/ sprul pa'i lus kyang thob par 'gyur ro/ /na maHsarba bid+ya/ sid d+h+yan tu me man tra pA da swA hA/

'phags pa 'jigs pa chen po brgyad las sgrol ba zhes bya ba'i gzungs/ rdzogs s+ho// //yang zhus ste skar/ / @#/ /dpal lha mo sgra dbyangs la bstod pa/ lam gang gis na sangs rgyas 'byung ba dang / /rgyal ba sras

bcas chos kyi bla mar gyur/ /mkhyen pa'i rim par sa rnams bkod pa yi/ /shes rab dkyil 'khor mang la skyabs su mchi/ /phyag 'tshal dpal ldan lha mo dbyangs can ma/ /'jig rten khams 'dir smra la dbang brnyes

shes/ /drang srong rig gsum rig pa'i pha rol gshegs/ /de ni spyod pa rgya chen rnams las byung / /sems can don phyir phrin las chen po'i khur/ /spro bar dka' ba kun kyang khyod kyis mdzad/ /sa dang pha rol phyin

pa bcu spyad pas/ /dge ba'i tshogs brtan yid bzhin lus su bsgyur/ /zhal gyi dkyil 'khor zla ba dri med rgyas/ /thugs rje'i spyan gsal 'gro ba'i mig 'byed pa/ /dus ring 'jig rten kun la bde bar gzigs/ /

de la lha dbang tshangs tshogs shin du 'dud/ /byams shing bzod ldan snying rje skyed pa'i ma/ /lha mo mchog ste 'gro kun skyong bar dgyes/ /thor tshugs ri bo rtse 'dra spobs pa 'phags/ /shes rab zab cing shes pa'i rten

byed kyang / /rig pa'i gnas la mnga' brnyes tshig gi bdag /'jig rten na yang lha'i lhar gyur la/ /sdug bsngal bsal bar rab brtson gnyen mchog pas/ /mu su rtog ge pa rnams kun kyang 'dud/ /yan lag rnam
par 'byes shing gsung snyan pa/ /yon tan dri med bsod nams 'bar bar bsgyings/ /rig pa mchog gi dngos grub sbyin mdzad pa/ /blo myur tshig 'chang spobs pa'i mchog stsol cig /sems can kun la rtag tu
phan sems pa/ /mi slu mchog khyod rnam grol sa la bzhugs/ /thugs dam brtan bcas skul pa rnams la yang / /dpal gyis dgongs shing don kun nye bar skongs/ /'di ltar 'jig rten dag na snang ba kun/ /

sgra 'joms khyad par tshig gis don mtshon te/ /phan tshun shes shing yang dag brda sprod pa 'ang / /dbyangs can khyod kyi mthu ste bsam mi khyab/ /gzungs dang chos kyi stobs la dbang brnyes pa/ /dam tshig bden grub

drang srong shes nyen can/ /lus sems ngag rnams byin gyis rlob pa dang / /yid 'ong sgras kyang 'jig rten tshim par byed/ /byang chub mchog gi spyod phyir su dag mos/ /bdag dang gzhan don phun sum tshogs 'gyur ba'i/ /

lus dang ngag yid rnam dag mchog 'dod la/ /bcom ldan 'das mas rtag tu don mchog stsol/ /bdag ni dpa' zhing byang chub lam brtson dang / /lce'i dbang po dag cing tshig btsun la/ /rig pa'i gter ldan smra la thogs med

dang / /bde gshegs spobs pa nye bar sgrub tu gsol/ /rig pa'i yum gyi rang bzhin rtog las dben/ /snyan pa'i rgyal mtshan dga' ba'i shugs kyis bskyod/ /mkha' la sna tshogs rnam par dri 'dod ltar/ /mtshan nyid

rtogs dka' yon tan gting mtha' med/ /na mo b+ha ga ba te/ brah+ma ni/ na maH shwa ra swa tai de bi sid d+h+yan tu man tra pA daM brah+ma nu man tra swA hA/ dpal lha mo sgra dbyangs la bstod pa/ rdzogs s+ho// //yang zhus she /

@// // rgya gar skad du/ Ar+yA shrI ma hA de bi byA ka ra Na/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa lha mo chen mo dpal lung bstan pa/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'di skad bdag

gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das bde ba can na byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun chen po 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug dang / byang chub sems

dpa' sems dpa' chen po mthu chen po thob dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sa'i snying po dang / byang chub
sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po kun du bzang po dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nam mkha'i snying po dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lag na rdo rje dang / byang chub sems dpa'
sems dpa' chen po 'jigs pa thams cad sel ba dang / de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dag byed kyi bkra shis thams cad 'dzin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
bsod nams kyi mtshan thams cad 'dzin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nyi zla dang / 'jig rten 'dzin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mu stegs kyi bkra shis

thams cad 'dzin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa dang / de la sogs pa bskal pa bzang po'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad dang thabs gcig tu
bzhugs so/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te phyogs gcig

tu 'dug go/ lha mo chen mo dpal yang bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du song ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ lan 'bum bskor ba byas nas bde ba can na gnas pa'i byang chub sems
dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag la yang mgo bos phyag 'tshal te phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/ de nas bcom ldan 'das bsod nams brgya stong du mas brgyan cing / de bzhin gshegs pa bye ba dag gis yongs su
bskor te/ brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / 'jig rten skyong ba thams cad kyis bstod cing bsngags so/ /lha mo chen mo dpal la gzigs nas tshangs pa chen po'i gsung gis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'

chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug rgyal po 'am/ /blon po 'am/ dge slong ngam/ dge slong ma 'am/ dge bsnyen nam/ dge bsnyen ma 'am/ bram ze 'aM/

rgyal rigs sam/ rje'u rigs sam/ dmangs rigs gang la la lha mo chen mo dpal gyi ming brgya rtsa brgyad dri ma med par grags pa zhes bya ba'i bstod pa 'di 'chang na/ rgyal rigs kyi rgyal po de'i yul dang /

sems can de dag gi 'jigs pa dang / yams kyi nad dang / gnod pa thams cad zhi bar 'gyur zhing chom rkun dang / g.yo can dang mi dang mi ma yin pa'i 'jigs pa thams cad 'byung bar mi 'gyur te/ nor dang 'bru dang / mdzod dang bang ba

thams cad rnam par 'phel bar 'gyur ro/ /rgyal rigs kyi rgyal po de'i khyim du yang dpal nges par gnas par 'gyur ro/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag gis tshig 'di skad ces gsol to/ /
bcom ldan 'das gsung 'di legs par bka' stsal pa legs so legs so/ /legs lags te/ gang dag lha mo chen mo dpal gyi ming rnams 'dzin pa dang / thos nas kyang sgrub par bgyid pa de dag gi yon
tan dang phan yon ni de dag lags so/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das lha

mo dpal gyis dge ba'i rtsa ba gang du bskyed pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ lha mo chen mo dpal gyis de bzhin gshegs pa gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed la dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed de/ spyan

ras gzigs dbang phyug sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na 'jig rten gyi khams rin po che las byung ba zhes bya ba na de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i me tog yon tan gyi rgya mtsho bai DUr+ya dang / gser gyi ri bo mdog mdzes

gser 'od dpal zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa mang po gzhan dag la yang lha mo chen mo dpal gyis dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed do/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan 'di dag kyang lha mo chen mo dpal de'i

dge ba'i rtsa ba rnam par 'phel ba dang / 'grub par byed pa dang / rtag tu rjes su 'brang ba yin te/ de dag ni 'dir lha mo chen mo dpal yang dag par brjod pa dang / sdig pa thams cad sel ba dang nyes sdig thams cad med

par byed pa dang / lus thams cad dri ma med par byed pa dang / nor dang 'bru rnams 'du zhing 'phel bar byed pa dang / dbul ba gcod par byed pa dang / lha dang klu dang / gnod sbyin dang dri za dang / lha ma yin dang nam mkha'

lding dang mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po thams cad 'dun par byed cing 'gugs par byed pa dang / yams kyi nad dang gnod pa dang / 'thab pa dang / 'khrug pa dang / 'gyed pa dang / rtsod pa thams cad zhi bar byed pa dang / pha rol tu phyin pa drug

bsgrub par byed pa'o/ /'di lta ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa dpal stug po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i me tog yon tan gyi rgya mtsho bai dUr+yA dang / gser gyi ri bo mdog mdzes gser 'od dpal la

phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa gang gA'i mu stegs kyi sgo thams cad bkra shis kyi dpal la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa tsan dan gyi me tog gzi brjid skar ma'i 'od kyi dpal la phyag 'tshal lo/ /

de bzhin gshegs pa kun du snang ba g.yul las rnam par rgyal ba'i dpal la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan rgya mtsho snang ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi dpal la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa chos

kyi cho 'phrul rgyal mtshan shugs kyi dpal la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa skar 'od zhi ba'i spos snang dpal la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa sems can gyi bsam pa zhi bar mdzad pa'i sku'i dpal

la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa smon lam rgya mtsho snang ba'i dpal la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shin du yongs su brjod pa mtshan gsol dpal la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa phyir mi

zlog pa'i 'khor lo rin po che'i gnas kyi dpal la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor 'od 'phags dpal la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa brtson 'grus grangs med pa la yang dag par rdzogs pa'i dpal la

phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa dpag tu med pa'i gser mchog snang ba'i dpal la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa gsung gi yan lag thams cad kyi sgra dbyangs kyi dpal la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa shes rab

sgron ma grangs med pa'i 'od kyi tog gi dpal la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa sred med kyi bu'i brtul zhugs kyi cho ga lhun po'i dpal la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa tshangs pa'i dpal la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs

pa dbang phyug chen po'i dpal la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa nyi zla'i 'od dpal la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa zab mo'i chos kyi 'od kyi rgyal po'i dpal la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa nam mkha'i sgron

ma 'od bzangs dpal la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa nyi 'od tog gi dpal la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa spos kyi sgron pa'i dpal la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa rgya mtsho'i snying po las byung ba'i

dpal la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa sprul pa'i 'brug sgra snyan pa'i dpal la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi snang ba thams cad bkod pa'i dpal la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa shing

gi rgyal po ltar skyes pa'i dpal la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen 'od 'phro ri bo'i dpal la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes 'od 'phro rgya mtsho'i dpal la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs

pa smon lam chen po'i shugs kyi dpal la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa sprin chen po'i dpal la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa dran pa'i tog gi rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa dbang po tog

gi rgyal mtshan gyi rgyal po'i dpal la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa nor dang 'bru thams cad sdud pa'i dpal la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa zhi ba 'dren pa'i dpal la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa

phun sum tshogs pa 'gugs pa'i dpal la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan 'di dag rim gror byas te/ bcang bar bya'o/ /bklag par bya'o/ /de ltar byas na rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod

nams shin du mang du bskyed par 'gyur ro/ /lha mo chen mo dpal de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis lung bstan te/ lha mo chen mo dpal khyod ma 'ongs pa'i dus na/ 'jig rten gyi khams dpal chen po rin po ches brgyan pa zhes

bya bar de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dpal nor bu rin po che las byung ba zhes bya bar 'gyur te/ 'jig rten gyi khams de yang lha'i rin po che sna tshogs kyis brgyan par 'gyur ro/ /

'jig rten gyi khams der de bzhin gshegs pa de nyid snang bar mdzad par 'gyur la/ 'jig rten gyi khams de na gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' de dag kyang rang las 'od byung zhing tshe dpag tu med par 'gyur ro/ /nam mkha' las

kyang sangs rgyas dang chos dang / dge 'dun gyi sgra 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /sangs rgyas kyi zhing der byang chub sems dpa' gang dag skye bar 'gyur ba de dag thams cad kyang pad ma'i snying po dag las skye bar 'gyur ro/ /zhes lung bstan to

de la ming brgya rtsa brgyad dri ma med pa lta bu zhes bya ba'i bstod pa rgyun chags bcu gnyis gang zhe na/ 'jigs pa med pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug lha mo chen mo dpal gyi ming rnam par nyon cig /'di lta ste/ de bzhin gshegs
pa thams cad kyis dbang bskur ba/ lha thams cad kyis dbang bskur ba/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi yum/ lha thams cad kyi ma/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dpal/ byang chub sems dpa' thams
cad kyi dpal/ 'phags pa nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi dpal/ tshangs pa dang / khyab 'jug dang / dbang phyug chen po rnams kyi dpal/ lha la sogs pa thams cad kyi dpal/ gnas thams cad

yod pa'i dpal/ lha dang klu dang / gnod sbyin dang dri za dang / lha ma yin dang nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po thams cad kyi dpal/ rig sngags 'chang dang / lag na rdo rje dang / rdo rje 'chang thams cad kyi dpal/

'jig rten skyong ba bzhi dang lnga'i dpal gza' brgyad dang rgyu skar nyi shu rtsa brgyad kyi dpal lo/ /oM nyi ma'i bu mo 'am/ yum rig byed bzhi'i dpal/ bkra shis ma/ sems can gyi ma/ rgyal ma/ rnam par rgyal ma/ gang gA ma/ mu stegs

thams cad ma/ bkra shis thams cad ma/ dri ma med par byed pa'i dpal/ sdig pa thams cad 'phrog ma/ rgyags byed ma/ zla ba'i dpal/ nyi ma'i dpal/ gza' thams cad kyi dpal/ seng ge la zhon ma/ pad ma'i mchog

'bum gyis bkab ma/ pad ma/ pad ma las byung ma/ pad ma la gnas ma/ pad ma 'dzin ma/ pad ma dang ldan ma/ rin po che 'od 'bar ba'i phreng ba du ma dang ldan ma/ nor sbyin ma/ dkar mo dkar mo chen mo/ lag dkar ma/ bkra shis
thams cad 'dzin ma/ bsod nams thams cad bsags pa'i lus can ma/ shes nyen can gyi bu mo/ lag pa 'bum ldan ma/ mig 'bum ldan ma/ mgo 'bum ldan ma/ nor bu rnam pa sna tshogs kyi cod pan dang ldan ma/

gzugs bzang ma/ kun gyi gzugs can ma/ grags ma/ shin du grags ma/ zhi ma/ sprin 'dra ba'i skra gtsang ma/ zla ba ltar mdzes ma/ dge ma/ dge byed ma/ sems can thams cad la mngon du phyogs pa'i dpal/ 'phags ma

me tog gi dpal me tog gi dbang phyug ma/ ri'i rgyal po ri rab thams cad kyi dpal/ chu klung dang mtsho thams cad kyi dpal/ chu dang rgya mtsho thams cad kyi dpal/ mu stegs thams cad mngon du phyogs pa'i dpal/ sman dang /

rtswa dang / nags tshal dang / nor dang 'bru thams cad kyi dpal/ gser sbyim ma/ zas dang skom sbyin ma/ 'od gsal ma/ snang ma/ lus gtsang ma/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dbang bsgyur ma/ lha'i tshogs thams cad

la mngon du phyogs ma'i dpal/ gshin rje dang / chu lha dang / lus ngan dang / brgya byin la sogs pa'i dpal/ sbyin byed ma/ longs spyod ma/ gzi brjid ma/ gzi brjid ldan ma/ phun sum tshogs ma 'byor pa ma/ rnam par

'phel ma/ mtho ma/ chos kyi dpal ma/ khyab 'jug la rten ma/ ku mu ta la gnas ma/ gnod sbyin ma/ bzod sbyin ma/ mthu rtsal gyi gnas ma/ dag byed dang bkra shis thams cad kyi lag ldan ma/ bkra mi shis pa thams cad 'jigs

par byed ma/ bsod nams thams cad sdud pa'i dpal/ sa thams cad dang rgyal po thams cad kyi dpal/ rig sngags 'chang gi rgyal po thams cad kyi dpal/ 'byung po dang / gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / yi dgas dang / sha za dang /

grul bum dang / lto 'phye chen po thams cad kyi dpal/ lha'i gnas dang / lha thams cad kyi dpal/ bzlas brjod dang / bzlas brjod du bya ba dang / sbyin sreg dang / sbyin sreg tu bya ba dang / bkra shis thams cad kyi dpal/ 'od ldan ma/

mchog dga' ma/ skal bas 'gyur ma/ drang srong thams cad dga' bar brjod pa'i dpal/ bud med thams cad kyi gnas gun gyi gtso mo dpal gyi mchog / mi 'am ci mo thams cad dang / lha ma yin mo thams cad kyi dpal

gyi mtshog /kha na ma tho ba med pa'i gnas na 'dug ma/ yid 'ong ma/ sim byed ma/ lus ngan la sdug ma/ chos kyi rgyal po'i dpal/ oM sdug bsngal thams cad las rnam par gzigs shing sgrol cig /thar bar mdzod

cig /bsod nams kyi tshogs thams cad bdag la mngon du gyur par mdzod cig swA hA/ oM gaM ga sarba tiR+tha mu khe swA hA/ oM sarba bid tre swA hA/ sarba ma~M ga la d+hA ri NI swA hA/ tsa tur ba de sarba na k+Sha tra/ gra ha ga /nA hA ga /

nA d+hA murta swA hA/ brah+mA swA hA/ beSh+Na be swA hA/ ru drA ya swA hA/ bi shwa mu khA ya swA hA/ oM gri ni gri na sarba ka d+ya sA d+ha ni/ si ni si ni/ A bA hA/ de ba hA/ bai shra ma nA ya swA hA/ su bar+Na/ d+ha na d+ha n+ya/ A kaR+Sha Nai swA hA/ sarba puN+ya

A kaR+Sha Ni swA hA/ shrI he ba te A kaR+Sha Ne+e swA hA/ sarba pA pa na sha mai swA hA/ sarba a lak+Sh+mi pra sha ma n+yai swA hA/ sarba ta thA ga ta a b+hi Shi ka ye swA hA/ sarba de ba ta a b+hi mu kha shri ye a yuR+ba la par+Na ke ra ye swA hA/ sarba bid twa maM ga la

hasta ye swA hA/ si ha ba ha na nai swA hA/ pad ma saM b+hU ta ye swA hA/ sarba kr-id ti ka kho rda bi ni sha mai swA hA/ 'jigs pa med pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug /gang la la lha mo chen mo dpal gyi ming nyes sdig thams cad

med par byed pa/ sdig pa thams cad 'jom par byed pa/ bsod nams thams cad sdud par byed pa/ bkra mi shis pa thams cad med par byed pa/ dpal dang / bde ba dang / skal ba bzang po thams cad sdud par byed pa 'di dag

dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan 'di dag 'chang ba dang / klog par byed pa des nang par langs te gtsang mar byas la/ sangs rgyas thams cad la me tog dang bdug pa gsol nas/ lha mo chen mo dpal la yang tsan dan

gyi bdug pa phul te bklags na des dpal thams cad mthong bar 'gyur/ bde ba dang / yid bde ba thams cad thob par 'gyur/ lha thams cad kyang bsrung ba dang / bskyab pa dang / sbed par byed par 'gyur/ de'i dgos pa thams

cad kyang 'grub par 'gyur ro/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ byang chub sems dpa' 'jigs pa med pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug dang / lha mo chen mo'i dpal de dang / thams cad dang ldan

pa'i 'khor de dang / lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin dang / dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do/ /'phags pa lha mo chen mo dpal lung bstan pa rdzogs s+ho// //

stag lung rgyud 'bum la gtugs nas zhuso/ / @#/ /rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya ma hA shi yAHsU traM/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa dpal chen mo'i mdo/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /
'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das bde ba can na bzhugs so/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug bcom ldan 'das
ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas/ bcom ldan 'das la bskor ba lan gsum byas te phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dpal chen mo
la gzigs nas 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /dpal chen mo'i mtshan bcu gnyis po 'di dge slong ngam/ dge slong ma 'am/ dge bsnyen nam/ dge bsnyen ma 'am/

de ma yin pa gzhan yang rung ste/ gang gis shes pa dang / gang la la 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / 'bri ba dang / 'phrir 'jug pa de ni dbul bor te phyug por 'gyur ro/ /de nas 'byung po'i tshogs thams cad kyis de ltar gyur

cig ces kun nas gsol to/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dpal chen mo'i mtshan bcu gnyis po bka' stsal pa 'di lta ste/ dpal ldan ma/ bkra shis ma/ pad ma'i phreng ba can/ nor gyi bdag mo/ dkar mo/ grags pa chen

mo/ pad ma'i spyan/ byed pa mo/ chen mo/ zas sbyin ma/ rin po che rab tu sbyin ma/ dpal chen mo/ s+yA da ya the daM/ dzi ni/ g+hI ni/ sarba aR+tha sA d+ha ni/ sha shi ni/ a lak+Sh+mi ni/ me nA sha ya sid+d+h+yan+tu me man+t+ra pa da sa swA hA/ oM b+h+r-i

ku TI pa ra ma su b+ha ge swA hA/ lan gsum du brjod par bya ste/ gang la la dus gsum du 'don pa de'i mi mthun pa'i phyogs thams cad 'jig par 'gyur ro/ /bskal ba bzang po dang ldan par 'gyur ro/ /'byor ba zad

mi shes par 'gyur ro/ /mi dang phrad du 'gro ba'i tshe bklags nas phrad par byas na mi des de la bu'i 'du shes skyed par 'gyur te dga' bar 'gyur la ji skad bsgo ba bzhin byed do/ /rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par bklags na

tshangs pa dang bram zes drag shul gyi las byas kyang mi tshugs par 'gyur la/ sangs rgyas mang po la bsnyen bkur byas par yang 'gyur ro/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ byang chub sems dpa'
'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do/ /'phags pa dpal chen mo'i mdo/ rdzogs s+ho// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po dzi na mi tra dang /

zhu chen gyi lo ts+tsha ba ban de ye shes sdes bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa/ stags lung rgyud 'bum la gtugs te/ yang zhus she / @#/ /dpal gyi lha mo'i mtshan bcu gnyis pa/ dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal
lo/ /'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la phyag 'tshal lo/ /phyag na rdo rje la phyag 'tshal lo/ /dpal lha mo chen mo la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das
bde ba can gyi 'jig rten na bzhugs te/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la
mgo bos phyag 'tshal te phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dpal lha mo chen mo yang bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste drung du phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi
zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dpal chen mo la gzigs nas spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /spyan ras

gzigs dbang phyug dge slong ngam/ dge slong ma 'am/ dge bsnyen nam/ dge bsnyen ma 'am/ sems can gang su yang rung bas dpal chen mo 'di'i ming bcu gnyis shes te 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / sgrub par byed pa dang /

brjod par yang byed na de dbul po spangs nas phyug po chen por 'gyur ro/ /de nas 'byung po'i tshogs thams cad kyis kyang de bzhin du gyur cig ces smras so/ /dpal lha mo chen mo'i ming bcu gnyis ni 'di lta ste/

bkra shis ma/ dpal ldan ma/ pad ma'i phreng thogs ma/ nor bdag ma/ dkar sham ma/ grags chen ma/ pad ma spyan mnga' ma/ grags ma/ 'od chen ma/ zas sbyin ma/ rin chen 'od ldan ma/ dpal chen mo ma/ sangs rgyas thams cad

la phyag 'tshal lo/ /spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la phyag 'tshal lo/ /dpal chen po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'di lta ste/ dzi ni/ g+hi Ni/ dgos pa thams cad sgrub par mdzad ma/ si mi si mi/ ni mi ni mi/ bdag gi mi shes pa thams
cad bsal bar mdzod cig swA hA/ bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa la mngon par

dga'o/ /dpal gyi lha mo chen mo'i mtshan bcu gnyis pa/ rdzogs s+ho// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po 'dzi na mi tra dang / zhu chen gyi lo ts+tsha ba ban de ye shes sdes bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa/ /stag lung rgyud 'bum la gtug nas zhuso//

ye d+harmA he tu pra b+ha bA he tun te ShAn ta thA ga to h+ya ba data/ he ShAnya tsa yo ni ro d+ha e ba~M ba dI ma hA shra ma NaH/ /maM ga la~M b+ha ba tu/ shu b+ham stu sarba dza ga ta~M/ shu b+ha~M/ /yang zhus she/ //

rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya sarba karma A ba ra Na bi sho d+ha ni nA ma d+hA ra NI/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa las kyi sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sbyong ba/zhes bya ba'i gzungs/ bcom ldan 'das mi 'khrugs pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /

na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ \u0f00 kaM ka ni kaM ka ni/ ro tsa ni ro tsa ni/ tro Ta ni tro Ta ni/ trA sa ni trA sa ni/ pra ti ha na pra ti ha na/ sarba karma pa raM pa rA Ni me swA hA/ gzungs sngags 'di'i cho ga ni 'di yin te/ rtag tu bzlas brjod byas na las

gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa thams cad rnam par dag par 'gyur ro/ /dus gsum du bzlas brjod byas na mtshams med pa lnga yang byang bar 'gyur ro/ /lan gcig bzlas brjod byas na ltas ngan pa dang / rmi lam ngan pa dang

bkra mi shis pa rnams med par 'gyur ro/ /lus la 'chang ngam/ glegs bam la bris nas mgul du thogs te 'chang na de la dus ma yin par 'chi ba rnams gtan du 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro/ /gang zhig snying rjes non te

ri dgas dang / bya dang / mi dang mi ma yin pa rnams kyang rung ste/ 'chi ba'i rna khung du brjod na de ngan song du 'gro bar mi 'gyur ro/ /yang na shi ste dus las 'das na shi 'phos pa'i ming nas smos te de'i phyir byams pa dang

snying rjes lan brgya 'am/ stong ngam 'bum brjod na sems can de sems can dmyal bar skyes su zin kyang de'i mod la thar bar 'gyur ro/ /sa 'am til lam/ yungs kar ram/ chu gang yang rung ba la bzlas brjod

byas te shi ba'i lus la gtor ram/ khrus byas nas de'i 'og tu bsreg pa 'am/ yang na mchad gyi nang du bcug ste bzhag la/ rig sngags kyang bris te mgo bo la btags na de ngan song du skyes pa yang zhag bdun

gyis gdon mi za bar thar te bde 'gro mtho ris kyi 'jig rten du skye bar 'gyur ba 'am/ yang na rang gi smon lam gyi dbang gis skye bar 'gyur ro/ /gang zhig zla ba nya ba'i tshe khrus byas la gtsang mar byas te dus gsuM

du gos brje zhing kha zas mi za ba 'am yang na zas dkar bag bza' zhing sku gdung dang ldan pa'i mchod rten skor bzhin du gang gi ming dang ldan pas lan 'bum bzlas brjod byas na de ngan song nas thar te gnas gtsang
ma'i lha'i ris su skyes nas grub pa po'i thad du 'ongs te mchod pa byed cing lus kyang ston la legs so/ /zhes bya ba yang byin nas lan gsum bskor ba byas te mi snang bar 'gyur ro/ /de'i ming bris la
gzungs sngags bzlas brjod byed cing mchod rten 'bum byas la gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan la sogs pas legs par mchod nas rgya mtsho chen po dang / yang na chu klung du btang na des sems can

dmyal ba la sogs pa nas thar bar 'gyur ro/ /yang na de ltar mchod pa byas nas 'jug tu lam gyi bzhi mdor mchod rten chen po byas te/ gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan la sogs pas legs par mchod la 'phags

pa'i dge 'dun la yang mchod ston gsol nas yon yang phul te legs par mchod nas che ge mo zhig gi dge ba'i rtsa bar gyur cig /'di kho nas bde 'gro mtho ris kyi 'jig rten du skye bar gyur cig ces kyang shes par byas na

de kho na bzhin du skyes nas lus kyang ston cing legs so zhes bya ba yang byin nas mi snang bar 'gyur ro/ /mtshams med pa lnga byed pa 'am/ dam pa'i chos spong ba 'am/ 'phags pa la skur ba btab pa yang rung ste 'chi kar rtsig pa

la gzungs sngags 'di bris pa mthong na de'i las kyi sgrib pa thams cad zad par 'gyur na/ 'don pa dang bzlas brjod byed pa lta ci smos te/ de bzhin gshegs pa de nyid byon nas 'di skad du rigs kyi bu tshur nga'i gan du shog ces kyang

gsung bar 'gyur ro/ /'phags pa las kyi sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sbyong ba zhes bya ba'i gzungs rdzogs s+ho// // stag lung rgyud 'bum la gtugs nas zhus dag bgyis so/ /yang zhus ste/ / @#/ /rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya bid+yA ud ta ma ma hA tan tra/

bod skad du/ 'phags pa rig pa mchog gi rgyud chen po/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi

tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lag na rdo rje rig pa bye ba phrag du mas bskor nas/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas bar snang las
babs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas te phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug kyang rig pa

bye ba du mas yongs su bskor nas 'khor de nyid du 'dus te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas te phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/ de nas 'byung po'i bdag po dbang ldan

'byung po bye ba phrag du mas bskor nas 'khor de nyid du 'dus par gyur te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs dang phyag na rdo rje la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/ de nas gdol pa'i rgyal po phur bu gsum pa yang 'khor

de nyid du 'dus par gyur to/ /rgyal po chen po bzhi yang g.yog 'khor bye ba phrag du mas kun nas bskor te 'khor de nyid du 'dus nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag byas te phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/ de nas byang chub

sems dpa' lag na rdo rjes bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar te/ pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs nas bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /

bcom ldan 'das sems can thams cad kyi don gyi slad du bdag gsang sngags kyi tshig 'chad par gnang bar mdzad du gsol/ bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' lag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /

lag na rdo rje khyod ni shin du ma rungs pa/ lag na rdo rje khyod ni shin du brtsam pa med pa/ shin du gtum pa yin na/ ci ltar sems can rnams kyi don gyi phyir gsang sngags 'chang / lag na rdo rje khyod ni dam tshig shes pa yin la/ sems can gang

dag dam tshig mi shes par brjod pa rnams ni rdo rjes mthar byed pa yin na/ khyod ci ltar gsang sngags 'chang / gsol pa bcom ldan 'das de de lta lags mod kyi/ bcom ldan 'das gang dag rig pa mchog 'di'i don 'don
pa dang 'chang ba dang mchod pa bgyid pa de dag ni bdag gi dam tshig 'tshal ba lags/ bdag gi dkyil 'khor du zhugs pa lags pas bcom ldan 'das kyis gnang ba mdzad du gsol/ de nas bcom ldan 'das la gnod

sbyin gyi bdag po lag na rdo rjes 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das bdag gi yi ge bzhi pa zhes bgyi ba 'di ni rig pa'i tshogs thams cad kyi snying por gyur pa la mang po rab tu sgrub pa/ stobs dang pha rol gnon pa dpag tu ma mchis

pa bstan pa thogs pa ma mchis pa ste/ bcom ldan 'das rig pa'i rgyal po bshad par bgyi'o/ /kye kye lha yul dang sa dang chu la gnas pa'i 'byung po'i tshogs rnams khyed yid rtse gcig tu gyis la nyon cig /rdo rjes mgo bkas par

gyur ta re/ de nas lag na rdo rjes rang gi rig pa'i tshogs la bltas nas gsang sngags smras pa/ na mo rat+na tra yA s+ya na mash+tsaN+Da badzra pA Ni s+ya/ ma hA yak+Sha se nA pa ti s+ya/ ma hA shAkya sam+bud+d+hA ya/ birli/ kirli/ mirli/ hirli/ bid+yA t+to ma ya rtsi rmi

ni durmi ni li swA hA/ de nas thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de 'dar yed yed nas thal mo sbyar te bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das bdag cag la bskyab tu gsol/ bde bar gshegs pa bdag
cag la bskyab tu gsol/ de nas gnod sbyin gyi dbang po lag na rdo rjes thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de dag la grogs po dag ma 'jigs shig ma 'jigs shig /rig pa'i rgyal po dran par gyis shig ces dbugs

phyung ngo / /de nas thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de ngo mtshar du gyur nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' lag na rdo rje 'di lta bu'i gsang sngags kyi tshig dag 'chad pa ni ngo mtshar

to/ /bcom ldan 'das bdag cag ni rig pa'i rgyal po gang na gnas pa der mchod par 'tshal lo/ /su klog pa dang / mchod par bgyid pa dang / sgrub pa'i rig sngags 'chang de'i brtson pa bskyed par bgyi'o/ /bka' stsal pa/

rigs kyi bu dag de de bzhin te/ de de bzhin no/ /de nas rig pa'i rgyal po'i las ni 'di lags te/ srad bu'am thal ba'am chu la lan cig brjod pas bsrungs bar 'gyur ro/ /rig sngags bcad na mtshon rnon po la lan gnyis brjod de rtswa ku sha

gcad do/ /yang na sa dra'o/ /de ltar na rig sngags thams cad gcad par 'gyur ro/ /lan gsum brjod na rig sngags tshang bar 'gyur ro/ /mar gyi ngo zhag brgyad la 'phags pa lag na rdo rje'i mdun du mchod pa bgyis la rig sngags gang

yi ge ma tshang ba 'am dran pa nyams pa de lan brgya rtsa brgyad brjod de/ rig pa'i mchog gi snying po dang lhan cig tu lan gsum brjod na rmi lam du ston to/ /ci ste las bcad par gyur na rtswa ku shas byab par bya ste rdzogs par 'gyur ro/ /

lag na rdo rje'i mdun du lan bzhi brjod na dge ba dang mi dge ba ston par 'gyur ro/ /ci 'dod pa yid bzhin du sbyor ba bgyis na las rnams su 'gyur ro/ /gdon tshar gcad na thal ba 'am chu 'am dur khrod kyi sol bas bsnun no/ /yang na gzugs

bgyis te lcug mas bzhus na gtong bar 'gyur ro/ /yang na sa la gzugs bgyis te dur khrod kyi sol bas lag mthil la rdo rje bris te lag pas bkab na gtong bar 'gyur ro/ /skud pa la mdud pa bor ba rnams kyis rig sngags bcing ngo / /

mkha' 'gro ma rnams bcad par bgyis na yungs kar dag la lan bdun bdun bsngags te bsnun na mkha' 'gro ma thams cad ma rungs par 'gyur ro/ /dbab par bgyi na rna bar bzlas brjod bgyi'o/ /yang na tsan dan dmar pos dkyil 'khor

byugs la rdo rje rtse lnga pa bris te gu gul gyis bdug pa dang me tog rnams kyis dbab po/ /phyag rgya gzhig na chu 'am thal lcags sam/ so phag gi dum bu rnams kyis so/ /dug las gso na chu 'am/ rma bya'i mdongs sam chu gri'am me long

gis so/ /mar gyi ngo zhag bcu bzhi nas lag na rdo rje'i mdun du zhag gsum bsnyung bar byas la lan brgyad stong bzlas brjod bgyi'o/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das lag na rdo rjes dam pa stsol bar 'gyur te/ de'i 'og tu dug gso ba la sogs

pa dang las gzhan rnams kyang bgyi'o/ /gal te mkha' 'gro ma rnams shin du bcad par 'tshal na/ de nas lag na rdo rje'i mdun du 'bras kyi gzegs mas lan brgya stong du sbyin bsreg bgyis na lag na rdo rjes ji skad bshad pa bzhin

du tshe ci tsam 'dod thub par rig sngags thams cad ma rungs par 'gyur ro/ /seng ldeng gi rdo rje bgyis te rig sngags 'chang gi ming nas brjod la sa la lan cig btsugs nas bshig par 'gyur te/ de phyin cad rig sngags 'chang de'i gsang sngags

rnams mi 'jug go/ rig sngags gcad par bgyid 'tshal na/ rig sngags 'chang gi gzugs bgyis pa gcad na bcad pa bgyis par 'gyur ro/ /rig sngags bshig par bgyid 'tshal bas rig sngags de rig pa mchog gi snying po dang lhan cig

brjod na rig sngags thams cad bshig par 'gyur te las mi bgyid do/ /rig pa 'gug par 'tshal bas mar gyi ngo brgyad la nyin zhag gcig bsnyung ba bgyis la lag na rdo rje'i mdun du mchod pa bgyis te/ rig pa mchog gi snying po dang lhan cig lan

brgyad stong bzlas brjod bgyis na rig pa 'gugs te phyis rig pa bsgrub bo/ /rig pa nyams par bgyis na bzlas brjod byas pas chog ste/ che ge mo'i rig pa la gnod pa mdzod cig ces bgyis na rig pa de las mi bgyid do/ /rig pa tshar

gcad par bgyi na thal ba la gzugs bgyi ste/ rig pa mchog gi snying po dang lhan cig brjod la rkang pa g.yon pas kyang phyis na rig pa smad pa dang nyams par 'gyur te las ma bgyid do/ /gal te rig sngags 'chang gzhig par 'tshal na lag

na rdo rje'i mdun du rig sngags 'chang gi ming nas brjod de mar me'i snying po me lce dang bcas pa bdun sbyin srig bgyis na rig sngags 'chang bshig par 'gyur te bsod nams kyang 'jig go/ srog kyang 'jig go/ rig sngags 'chang de'i tshe ci tsam

par gsang sngags rnams mi 'grub po/ /slar gso bar bgyi na ma la ta'i me tog mar la smyugs pa'i sbyin sreg bgyi ba lan nyi shu rtsa gcig lag na rdo rje'i mdun du sbyin sreg bgyis na rig pa 'grub bo/ /las 'di dag ni ma bsgrubs kyang

bgyid do/ /ci ste bgyid 'tshal na ri la 'dzegs te kha zas 'o skyo 'thung zhing lan 'bum bzlas brjod bgyis na rig pa'i rgyal po'i mchog rang gi gzugs su mthong bar 'gyur te de la bu ci bya zhes gsung bar 'gyur ro/ /des bcom ldan 'das las thams

cad mdzad du gsol zhes brjod par bgyi'o/ /de bzhin du gyur cig ces brjod nas mi snang bar 'gyur ro/ /de nas yid kyis bzlas brjod bgyis na rig sngags 'chang yang 'gug go/ grog mkhar gyi sa las sbrul bgyis te sngags kyis btab na

klu thams cad 'chi'o/ /dbang du yang 'gyur ro/ /gseg ma la lan bdun bsngags te mtshor bor na mtsho skam par 'gyur ro/ /'bab chu chen por bor na 'bab chu chen po skam par 'gyur ro/ /gang du bor ba de skam par 'gyur ro/ /bdag gi rig pa'i

rgyal po 'di ni rig pa'i rgyal po thams cad dang rig pa thams cad kyi mchog tu brjod pa'o/ /gal te rig pa gzhan dag gis las mi 'tshal na yang sbyor ba 'dis rig pa thams cad sbyor bar bgyi'o/ /las thams cad bgyid do/ /las bgyid

na rig pa'i rgyal po dang lhan cig lan gsum brjod la 'ga' zhig ma mchis na/ de'i mgo dum bu zin thig la'i snyi ma bzhin du 'gas par 'gyur ro/ /gang gi tshe gsang ba pa rnams kyi gsang sngags grub pa de'i tshe las thams cad tu rig pa'i

mchog bzlas brjod bgyi'o/ /mar gyi ngo zhag brgyad la nyin zhag gcig bsnyung ba bgyis te lag na rdo rje'i mdun du mchod pa bgyis la ba smad spu 'thun gyi mar sar blangs te/ mar sar des seng ldeng gi mer lan brgyad stong sbyin bsreg bgyis

na rig pa'i mchog rig pa sgrub pa rnams la dam pa rtsol bar 'gyur ro/ /gang gi tshe pha rol 'bros par bgyid 'tshal na phub ma las lan brgyad stong sbyin sreg bya'o/ /so phag gis kyang 'phangs na 'bros par 'gyur ro/ /mar gyi nyin zhag

gcig bsnyung ba bgyis te lag na rdo rje'i mdun du arka'i zhugs bus la rtswa dUr ba'i lo ma can brgyad stong sbyin sreg bgyis na ti na ra gcig rnyed par 'gyur ro/ /mar gyi ngo zhag bcu bzhi nas zhag gsum bsnyung ba bgyis te lag na rdo rje'i

mdun du me tog ku mu da dang zho dang sbrang rtsi dang mar la smyugs pa khri me'i nang du sbyin sreg bgyis na dpal che bar 'gyur ro/ /rgya mtsho'i sbu ba dang rgya spos dang ldong ros rnams cha mnyams te rma bya'i mkhris pa dang ri lu sran ma tsam

du bgyis te/ lag na rdo rje'i mdun du rig pa'i mchog lan brgyad stong bzlas brjod bgyis la sbrul gyis zin pa la chu la btab na 'jog pos zin pa yang 'tsho'o/ /srin bus zin pa dang bal ldogs dang 'bras/ phreng ba 'gyur ba la

chab skol ba las btang ngo / /sbrum ma bu ma phyin pa la ni mar las btang na bde bar btsa' bar 'gyur ro/ /bus pa gdon gyis zin na gdug pas bdugs pa gtong bar 'gyur ro/ /bud med kyi nad las ni dar ba la btang ngo / /phug tu 'jug na

lus la bsku'o/ /sgrub pa na bdag la bdugs na log 'dren thams cad las thar bar 'gyur ro/ /lag na rdo rje'i mdun du srad bu la rig pa'i mchog brgyad stong bzlas brjod bgyis te lag pa la btags nas g.yul ngor zhugs na pha rol

gyis mi thub par 'gyur ro/ /sbyin sreg bgyis pa'i thal ba 'am/ thal ba gtsang mas kham phor bkang la rig pa mchog bzlas brjod bgyis na rkun po gang na 'dug pa der mchi'o/ /gang gis rig pa'i rgyal po 'di yid kyis bzlas brjod bgyis pa de la dbang

phyug chen po dang dbang phyug chen po'i tshogs dang bgegs dang log 'dren dang mkha' 'gro ma dang / srin po dang sha za dang gnod sbyin dang 'byung po dang grul bum dang srul po dang mdangs 'phrog pa dang gdon brgyan ma dang ma mo dang lag na rdo rje'i phyag brnyan

dang gang gis kyang glags mi rnyed kyi lag na rdo rjes de'i mgo 'gems so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan snga 'am/ phyogs gtsang mar mchod pa bgyis te rtswa ku shwa'i mdung rtse gsum pa thogs la yungs kar dang zho dang sbrang rtsi dang mar bsregs pa sbyin blugs

lan nyi shu rtsa gcig sbyin sreg bgyi zhing nyin bdun dus gsum du gcer bur skra bshig la bgyis na nor stsol bar bgyid do/ /mar gyi ngo zhag drug nas brtsams te mtsho 'gram du mchis la/ mar gyi ngo zhag brgyad pa'i bar du yungs kar dag las sbyin

sreg lan brgyad stong bgyis na nor dang gos rnams stsol bar 'gyur ro/ /'phags pa rig pa'i rgyal po'i mchog sgrub pa ni ri mo mkhan gso sbyong bzung bas ma god pa'i ras la spyin dang ma 'dres pa'i tshon rtsi rnams kyis sangs rgyas kyi sku

gzugs bri bar bgyi'o/ /g.yas phyogs su lag na rdo rje stan nang tshangs can gyi steng na mchis par bri'o/ /lag na rdo rje'i 'og tu rig pa'i mchog bri'o/ /bcom ldan 'das ni gser gyi kha dog lta bu'o/ /lag na rdo rje ni sngo bsangs te rgyan thams cad kyis

brgyan pa'o/ /rig pa'i rgyal po yang sngo bsangs te rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan la stan gor bu'i steng na mchis par bri'o/ /mar gyi ngo zhag bcu bzhi la nyin zhag gcig bsnyung ba bgyis te ci nus su mchod par bgyis la rgyal ba'i blo gros

kyis rig pa'i rgyal po dgug par bgyi'o/ /rdo rje'i khas nye reg bgyi'o/ /rdo rje'i lte bas spos dbul bar bgyi'o/ /me kha las me tog dbul bar bgyi'o/ /gdong dkar gyis srung bar bgyi'o/ /rdo rje ser mos khrus bgyi'o/ /nag mos khu

ba bcing bar bgyi'o/ /gyen du lta ba'i gdong gis phyogs bcing bar bgyi'o/ /rdo rje'i seng ge'i khris 'dug par bgyi'o/ /rdo rje ldan mas bgegs gzhom par bgyi'o/ /shugs ldan mas slar gshegs su gsol lo/ /phyis rig pa

mchog gi ri mo'i gzugs kyi mdun du gu gul gyi ri lu brgyad stong sbyin sreg bgyis na dngos grub kyi mtshan mar bcom ldan 'das kyi gzugs 'gul bar 'gyur ro/ /zhag bdun na ti nar brgya rnyed par 'gyur ro/ /yang na longs spyod stsol

bar 'gyur ro/ /mar gyi ngo zhag brgyad na lag na rdo rje'i mdun du du ru ka'i 'bras bu las lan brgyad brgya sbyin sreg bgyis na gang 'dod pa de smyo bar 'gyur ro/ /lag na rdo rje'i mdun du mar dang gu gul gyi ri lu brgyad brgya'i sbyin sreg bgyis na

sos par 'gyur ro/ /mar gyi ngo zhag brgyad la nyin zhag gcig bsnyung ba bgyis te shing a shwat+tha'i lo 'dab kyi steng du ldong ros bzhag la ci srid kyis rnam gsum grub pa de srid du bzlas brjod bgyi'o/ /dro bar gyur na rkang pas mchi'o/ /
