sgra gcan 'dzin zhes grags pa ste/ /sangs rgyas sras ni mngon sum gnas/ /gnod sbyin lha min lto 'phye rnams/ /nyin mtshan du ni der song nas/ /dri dang phreng ba dpe med pas/ /mchod pa byed cing phyag

kyang 'tshal/ /de nas byang gi sgra mi snyan/ /lhun po yi ni byang phyogs gzhag /gtsang zhing gru bzhi lam pa ste/ /chu klung dag gis rab tu brgyan/ /gang dag gi ni tshe yi tshad/ /chig stong tshangs bar brjod pa dang / /sangs rgyas

rnams kyis gsungs pa yi/ /sems can ya mtshan de na gnas/ /rgya mtsho'i sa ni bskor ba yi/ /ri yi dam pa ri rab la/ /phyogs kyi lha ni bzhi po rnams/ /kun nas nges par gzhag par bya/ /kar sha pa Ni brgyad dag gis/ /

dkyil 'khor dang por rdo rje bri/ /de yi gnas rnams de dag tu/ /gser gyi gdu bu dag kyang bya/ /sgo rnams re rer don sgrub pa/ /rgyu dang mi rgyu 'jig rten gsum/ /thub par nus pa gang yin pa'i/ /sgo bsrung gnyis kyang

gzhag par bya/ /de yang sngags dang ldan bya zhing / /kun tu gzhal yas rgyas par bya/ /rdo rje thog tog lho phyogs bri/ /rdo rje khu tshur byang phyogs gzhag /de nas der ni lha bshos rnams/ /rnam pa sna tshogs bkra ba dang / /

bla med rab mdzes rgyas par bya/ /dri dang me tog phreng bas mchod/ /zhib de'i tha lu sna tshogs pa/ /sbrang rtsis byugs shing gzabs pa dang / /legs byas a shwa ka brti/ /de bzhin be reg nas khur dbul/ /ji tsam du ni

rgyas pa phul/ /de tsam du ni 'grub par bshad/ /'bras kyi 'o thugs chu la ka /thug pa sbyar thug sa mi ta/ /'bras chan tshod ma sna tshogs pa/ /kha dog sna tshogs sor lngar ldan/ /de la sogs pa gang 'dod pa/ /lo ma sna

tshogs skyon med pa/ /yang na kham por sar pa 'am/ /pad ma'i lo ma dag la gzhag /nas dang gro dang mo sran gre'u/ /sA lu dang ni til 'bru rnams/ /snod sar dag gi nang du gzhag /yang na gzhan du de bzhin gzhag /

hwags dang kha ras gang ba dang / /gtung ba bsil zhing zhim pa dag /snod sar dag gi nang dag tu/ /gzhag nas rab tu dbul bar bya/ /des na su la 'ang 'tshe mi 'gyur/ /dga' ba'i sems kyis za 'dod la/ /kha zas dag kyang

sbyin par bya/ /de nas dga' bar bya ba'i phyir/ /ta la'i lo ma bsil yab dbul/ /dri zhim pa'i dri kun gyis/ /dkyil 'khor la ni mchod par bya/ /spos kyi phye ma sna tshogs pa/ /mchog rnams kyis kyang de bzhin mchod/ /dza

ya mu sa na la sogs/ /dri zhim thams cad sbyar bas mchod/ /a ka ru dang du ru ska/ /shing gi thang chu gsar sbyar rnams/ /bdug pa'i rgyur ni bsngags pa yin/ /dngos grub sgo drung 'dug par bya/ /yang na nang du song nas ni/ /

de ni byang phyogs kha blta zhing / /lag na rdo rje tshul bzhin bod/ /shin tu bkra shis tshigs bcad dang / /de bzhin bde legs rdzogs pa gdon/ /de nas der ni rig sngags ma/ /rdo rje lcags kyu rtse mo can/ /rdo rje'i rigs las

byung ba yi/ /rig sngags bstan pa gang yin pa/ /des ni bdag nyid bsrung bar bya/ /de nas thog mar spyan drang ba/ /ri rab de yi rtse mor ni/ /'dug nas sgra chen gdon par bya/ /chos kyi chu klung spyan drang ba/ /dam pa 'di ni brjod

par bya/ /bkra shis tshigs bcad brjod pa dang / /chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba dang / /'dus pa chen po'i mdo dag dang / /'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi po dang / /rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba de/ /ma nyams the tshom med pa dang / /

'phags pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu'i/ /seng ge'i sgra ni dpe med gdon/ /de nas rdo rje rigs kyi yum/ /rig sngags rdo rje lcags kyu bzlas/ /de nas kyang ni rtse mo can/ /de nas rdo rje rigs skyes kyi/ /rig sngags dag ni gang

'dod dang / /snying po 'gro lding gtum po dang / /de yi steng dang 'dod pa yi/ /rdo rje ma dang 'og phag can/ /lu gu rgyud dang gtum mo dang / /ser gtum rdo rje thog thog ma/ /de bzhin rdo rje khu tshur ma/ /rdo rje thub dka' pho nya ma/ /

chen mo bcu dang drug bcu bzhi/ /dang po blo gros rdo rje ma/ /gnyis pa rdo rje dril bu ma/ /gsum pa rdo rje nag mo dang / /bzhi pa gzhan gyis mi thub pa/ /lnga pa rdo rje rol pa dang / /drug pa yang ni rgod bag can/ /bdun pa rdo rje shugs

yin te/ /brgyad pa rdo rje nyi ma yin/ /dgu pa rdo rje dbyug pa ste/ /de ni sna tshogs gzugs zhes grags/ /bcu pa rdo rje bden pa ste/ /ci dga' bar ni bzlas brjod bya/ /rdo rje dbyug pa blta bar bya/ /rdo rje khro bo 'joms byed

dang / /bung ba blta ba chu klung dang / /rdo rje ka t+ya na dang / /bdug pas 'jil dang bsrung ma dang / /yon tan chen mo de la sogs/ /nges pa nyid du bzlas brjod bya/ /des na dkyil 'khor 'grub par 'gyur/ /nges par gnas pas
rig sngags ni/ /mchog 'gyur rdo rje lcags kyu ma/ /bdug pa kun gyis rgyas pa yis/ /dkyil 'khor du ni brgyad brgya bzlas/ /des na las su bsgrub pa yis/ /rig sngags des ni grub par 'gyur/ /rig sngags

gang la dga' ba des/ /dkyil 'khor du ni bzlas brjod bya/ /lag na rdo rjes bshad pa yi/ /rig sngags mang po de nyid ni/ /mchog 'dod dngos grub 'dod pa yis/ /ci nas skyo bar mi 'gyur spyad/ /de nas rdzogs par spyan

drangs shing / /gsang sngags rgyas par byas nas ni/ /de nas dkyil 'khor 'dod pa kun/ /gzung ba yang ni bshad par bya/ /sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun dang / /dkon mchog gsum la gtso bor 'dzin/ /dad cing mnyam

par gzhag pa yi/ /mi ni dam tshig 'dzin du gzhug /des na de la mkhas pa yis/ /bslab gzhi lnga ni sbyin par bya/ /ming 'di zhes ni bya ba bdag /phyin cad nam 'tsho'i bar dag tu/ /srog gcod log par g.yem pa dang / /

rku dang brdzun du smra ba dang / /'bru dang sbyar ba'i chang 'thung ba/ /rtag tu bdag gi spang zhes smros/ /bslab gzhi mchog dang ldan pa de/ /blo gros rdo rje bsrungs bar bya/ /'bogs par 'gyur bar bya ba'i phyir/ /byin gyis brlab+sa

kyi cho ga 'ang bya/ /de nas der ni bum pa bdun/ /chu ni rab tu blugs nas kyang / /blo gros rdo rjes bsngags pa des/ /bdud rtsi zhes ni brjod pa yin/ /rdo rje 'dzin pa'i phyag rgya ni/ /dril bur bcas pas dran byed brjod/ /lag pa

gnyis ka bla 'og sbyar/ /mthe'u chung mthe bo sbrel bya zhing / /bdud rtsi'i chu ni blugs par bya/ /gos gtsang bgos zhing rab bsdams pa/ /skra bshig pa la ngu 'bod che/ /mi bzad rnams ni bsgo bar bya/ /'di ni ngu 'bod chen po ste/ /

'khrugs cing sdug bsngal chen po'i gnas/ /'di yis khyod ni dam tshig las/ /nyams na myur du gdungs par 'gyur/ /khyod ni dam tshig shes gyur na/ /rkyen du bab par ma lus sbyin/ /des na khyod la mkhas pa 'di/ /'khrugs

pa'i sdug bsngal byed mi 'gyur/ /dam tshig spangs pa gang yin dang / /dkyil 'khor du ni ma zhugs pa/ /de la dam tshig gzhan med pa/ /bstan bcos kyi ni gzhung lugs yin/ /dmyal ba yod pa 'di la ltos/ /nad rnams thams

cad tshogs pa dang / /'byung po la sogs rnams kyis rgyas/ /khyod ni de nyid ltung bar byed/ /gdon mi za yi sdig pa'i las/ /'di la dpyad par bya ba med/ /rtag tu khyod kyis dam tshig bsrungs/ /rtag tu dkyil 'khor

mchod pa gyis/ /'on kyang 'byung po sha za sogs/ /sdig byed de dag 'jug mi 'gyur/ /slob dpon la ni gus par bya/ /de ni rdo rje 'dzin nyid yin/ /da ni khyod tshe 'bras bur bcas/ /khyod kyi 'tsho ba 'bras bu yod/ /da ni dam

tshig lha rnams dang / /khyod ni mtshungs pa nyid du 'gyur/ /rdo rje 'dzin pa'i rgyal mtshan 'di/ /ji ltar rtag tu mdzes pa bzhin/ /de ltar khyod ni yon tan gyis/ /dam tshig nges par gnas par 'gyur/ /de nas rdo rje de blangs

la/ /lag pa g.yon pas dril bu bzung / /lag pa g.yas pas de yi g.yas/ /bzung nas kyang ni spro bar bya/ /'di skad rtag tu grub pa 'di/ /sdug bsngal dag las sgrol ba ste/ /rdo rje 'dzin chen nyid dang ni/ /lhan cig tu ni
'jug par 'gyur/ /de nas grur ni zhugs nas kyang / /'khor yug las ni brgal bar bya/ /lag pa btang nas de la ni/ /dkyil 'khor thams cad bstan par bya/ /'khrul pa med par me tog gis/ /mdun

bzhugs bde gshegs man chad dang / /dkyil 'khor gang dang gang mthong ba/ /de dang de la bde bar mchod/ /de nas thams cad mthong nas kyang / /yon gyi bum par dbul bar bya/ /blo can gyis ni mtshan yang bzung / /dam pa

gzhan yang bdag gis bshad/ /rdo rje stangs thabs 'gro ba dang / /gad mo bcas par bsgyur ba dang / /g.yon pas kyang ni brdab par bya/ /seng ge'i sgra sgrogs 'gying ba dang / /mdzub mos hUM yang bsgrags byas te/ /

thams cad shin tu byed pa'i mchog /de nas gzhan yang mi shes pa/ /cho ga bzhin du mnod par bya/ /slob dpon gus par legs bya zhing / /dam tshig kyang ni nges par bstan/ /til zan la sogs mon sran gre'u/ /bdag
nyid kyis ni legs par bza'/ /lhag par bla mar gus byas dang / /de la dga' bar byas nas ni/ /rdo rje 'dzin pa chen po dang / /rig sngags rnams la sdug par 'gyur/ /de nas rig sngags tshogs rnams la/ /

de yis rig sngags gang 'dod pa/ /de ni bsgrims te bklag bya zhing / /dngos grub 'dod pas rtag tu mchod/ /de ltar slob dpon rgya chen tshogs rnams dang / /lha dang lha min mchog gzugs du ma yis/ /mthong zhing thos

la 'brang bar 'gyur ba dang / /rtag tu legs mchod rjes su bstan pa yin/ /rdo rje'i rigs dpal dang ldan pa las mnyes pa dka' zhing me dang nyi ma las lhag pa de kho na nyid kyi mi dang dam pa'i yon tan dang ldan pa mchog tu

gyur pa gang dang gang yin pa de dag ni dkyil 'khor dang dam tshig rab tu rtogs pas rtag tu mthong zhing thos pa'am/ bsgrub pa'i tshul dang ldan par byas na dngos grub 'grub pa 'am/ phan pa yang thob par 'gyur ro/ /

rdo rje chen po thogs bzhin du rtag tu bdug pa dang me tog dang / dri dang / lha bshos rgyas par dbul zhing sbyin sreg bya'o/ /de ltar gnas bzhi pa tshul 'dzin cing nyi ma'i gzi brjid dang ldan pa'i dkyil 'khor dam pa 'di ni dpal

skyed cing mchog tu myur ba'i cho ga yin pas na dkyil 'khor thams cad kyi rgyal po nyid yin no/ /lag na rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor gyi rgyal po chen po lag na rdo rje dbang phyug chen po gnyis kyis dam tshig bshad pa las gnas

bzhi pa rdzogs s+ho// // de nas rdo rje lcags kyu ma/ /rdo rje yi ni rigs kyi yum/ /bsgrub pa yi ni don rnams kun/ /sgrub pa byed pa gang yin bshad/ /na mo rat+na tra yA ya na mash+tsaN+Da badzra pA Na ye/ ma hA yak+Sha se nA

pa ta ye/ na ma ste badzra d+ha ra badzra pA Ni badzrA ya/ na maHsu badzrA ya na mo badzra du ta ye/ na mo badzra shA na ye/ na mo badzra hr-i da yA ya/ na mo badzrAM ku shA ya/ na mo badzrA da ku shA ya/ na mo badzra ko shA ya/ na mo badzra bi dza yA ya/

na mo badzrAng+ku sha /ko Sha pA sha bi dza yA ya/ na maHpra brta A brta/ badzrAng+ku shi/ mi li mi li/ hi li hi li/ hi ri hi ri/ ki ri ki ri/ A kaD+D+h+ya/ A kaD+D+h+ya/ gi ri gi ri/ khi ri khi ri/ b+hi ri b+hi ri/ ki li ki li/ badzrAng+ku laM saM sma ra/

gi ri gi ri/ ti ri ti ri/ b+hi ri b+hi ri/ A gats+tsha/ A gats+tsha/ A na ya me hi rat+na su bar+Na d+ha na/ d+ha n+yaM/ a ta pa ya/ ma ba ru Na ku be ra/ in+d+ra mA kaD+D+h+yA ya/ yan+t+ra dA ma ni/ gr-ih+NAM ku she na/ tat+taM/ ki li ki li/ tsu ru tsu ru/ tsaN+Da tsaN+Di/

ki ri Ni/ brah+ma ma ba de hiM biSh+Nu na ba de hiM kalpi/ ko Sha kalpi/ ni li bi la/ ni lilbi ku mA raM ad+d+ha ru tri ma de hiM/ tsan+d+raM pa de hiM/ shuk+kaM ba de hiM/ sUr+ya ba de hiM/ ya maM ba de hiM/ tat+taM/ ba de hiM/ tsi ri tsi ri/ bI ri bI ri/ a kram+m+yA/ A na la

a kram+m+ye/ i hi tu rA hi/ tu ru tu ru/ sarba kA laM su/ di gra bi ra/ ki li ki li/ mi li mi li/ ti ri ti ri/ mi li mi li/ tsa ka tsa ka /ki ni ki ni/ bi ri bi ri/ sha tha ku shi sa ha sra/ mi la bi sha tsang+ku shi/ badzraM ba he badzrA ni pra ye/

ma ti ma ti/ ti ri ti ri/ ki ri ki ri/ a kram+m+ya/ a n+ya/ kaR+maM ma n+ya/ ba ra ka na ma nA ya/ ya she ya shi na/ ku ru ku ru/ ki ri ki ri/ g+hi ni g+hi ni/ khi ri khi ri/ bi tsa ra bi tsa ra/ ko shaM ko shi ni/ ku be raM ma kraSh+Ti ka kra ma kad+d+ha/

la la la la/ ha si ni pri ye/ pri yaM ka ri/ tsak+Shurma tri/ tsak+ShuHpra bi sha /ma na ma ki ri/ sha yasne tsan+d+ha ni/ b+hi la b+hi li/ pA sha de ba ra de/ tsak+Shurde/ ha ra ha ra/ ba su ba su/ mi si mi si/ he he hi hi ha ha/ ka ri ka la ka la/ ba la ba la/ tsak+ShuH

tsak+ShuH/ ta me ka tha ya sarba sarbe shang+ku ru ku ru/ ba ki me ka ta ya/ mi li mi li/ tsi li tsi li/ tsu lu tsu lu/ pri yaM pri ye na/ sa ra sa ra/ ka ra ka ra/ tsa ra tsa ra/ bi ri bi ri/ bi mi ya shaM ya she na/ la b+ha la b+ha/ ki ri ki ri/ mi ti mi ti/

lo ke/ ra ma ra ma/ ra ti ka ri b+hi ti ka ri/ ma ma su/ kha ka ri ni b+h+r-i ti ka ra/ king+ka ri king+ka ri/ ka ra ma ri/ bi ti bi ti/ mi ri mi ri/ mi ri mi ri/ tsi ri tsi ri/ he ri he ri/ bi ri bi ri/ g+hi ri g+hi ri/ b+hi ri b+hi ri/ hi ri hi ri/ badzra Ni/

badzrAng+ku shi pa ra mAng+ku shi ha re badzre k+Shi pa Ni ka la shi ba ni/ bak+Sha pa Ni/ tsak+Shu raM ka shi pa Ni/ b+ha ra b+ha ra/ ma ma pi ri pi ri/ ku ru ku ru/ ki ri ki ri/ tu ru tu ru/ ta ra ta ra/ badzrAd+ku shi ye swA hA/ ko ShAng+ku/ shI ye swA hA/ pa shang+ku shI ye swA

hA/ bi dza yAng+ku shI ye swA hA/ k+She mang+ku shI ye swA hA/ adz+nyA yAng+ku shI ye swA hA/ sarbA ng+ku sha A kaR+Sha NI ye swA hA/ de bAng+ku shI ye swA hA/ s+t+rI pu ru ShAng+ku shI ye swA hA/ hr-i da yAng+ku shI ye swA hA/ d+harmAng+ku shI ye swA hA/ sarba lo ka dza

yAng+ku shI ye swA hA/ sarba satwa nA ma ka ri sha Na/ ba shi ka ra NAng+ku shI ye swA hA/ /rdo rje lcags kyu de nyid ni/ /'di ltar rnam pa gzhan du yang / /rdo rje rigs chen gtso mo ste/ /'bar ba chen mo mchog sbyin mchog /rigs kyi

yum ste rigs kyi mchog /las mchog kun gyi byed pa mo/ /bcing dang bkrol ba thams cad kyi/ /las kun la ni thub med pa/ /dam pa ci 'dra de bzhin 'dri/ /bar ma ci 'dra de bzhin 'gyur/ /snying po dang ni ming 'di yang / /

gtso bo dang ni mchog tu bshad/ /lag na rdo rje nyid kyang ni/ /skad cig gis ni 'di bkug na/ /phyi rol rgyal po pho nya sogs/ /tshogs rnams lta la ci zhig smos/ /lha yi rigs ni mthong ba yi/ /rig sngags 'chang ba

de la ni/ /'grub par mi 'gyur gang yang med/ /gang zhig rab tu bsgrims nas ni/ /yum 'di rtag tu 'chang byed pa/ /de la mchog kun 'grub par 'gyur/ /bcing ba dang ni grol ba la/ /rig sngags gsang sngags kun

bdag 'gyur/ /nang dang phyi rol bcas pa yi/ /'khor dang ldan par byas na ni/ /gcig pu 'jig rten gsum mchog dang / /rnam pa gsum du 'gyur bar bshad/ /de dag thams cad khyad par du/ /stobs dang ldan par skye bos

brjod/ /mdor na yum 'di thams cad kyi/ /mchog gi dam par bshad pa yin/ /de dag bsgrubs pa'i dus dang ni/ /tha mal dus su rtag tu yang / /ji skad bshad pa de bzhin du/ /rig sngags 'di ni sbyar bar bya/ /na maHtsu ru

kun+da/ tsu ru kun+da/ tsu ru kun+da/ badzra pA Ni/ na mo b+hud+d+ha s+ya swA hA/ lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas brjod byas pa'i yungs kar gyi phye mas gzhag par bya/ na maHku ru tsu ru badzra pA Ni/ na mo bud+d+ha s+ya swA hA/ 'dis ni me tog dang bdug

pa dbul bar bya'o/ /na mo dum+me dum+me/ u du m+me dus+sa dum+me/ tsu ru tsu ru swA hA/ 'dis bshos dbul lo/ /na mo badzrI badzrI/ badzri Ni badzri Ni/ ha na ha na/ da ha da ha/ pa tsa pa tsa e taM sarba big+h+nAM bi nA ya kaM/ sa ma mA ra ya/ ha na ha na/

ut+sA da ya/ nA sha ya/ bi d+h+waM sa ya/ sarba duSh+Ta tsit+ta sh+tsa ma me/ hu ru hu ru/ sid+d+ha sh+tsaN+Da badzra pA Ni rAdz+nyA pa ya ti swA hA/ me sbyar la sngags 'dis shing 'o ma can gyi yam sreg shing ngam/ ka ri ma la ka ri'i yam sreg shing dang ske tse

dang / lan tshwa dang tsha ba gsum rnams lhan cig tu sbyar te/ sbyin sreg byas na bgegs dang log 'dren gyi gnod pa thams cad sel bar byed do/ /de nas de yi bsgrub pa ni/ /rig sngags 'chang ba kun gyis mchod/ /bsgrub pa'i

thabs ni gang gis su/ /stobs chen 'di ni grub pa bshad/ /thams cad mkhyen pas thams cad gzigs/ /sangs rgyas 'grub byed mgon po dang / /'jig rten dag na ya mtshan gsang / /rdo rje 'dzin la phyag 'tshal nas/ /lha

rnams dang ni dri za dang / /rig sngags 'chang dang lto 'phye che/ /shin tu ya mtshan gsang ba 'di/ /don kun 'grub byed mnyan par gyis/ /gang zhig gsang ba'i rgyal po'i mchog /'di ni so sor 'chang byed pa/ /de la 'jig rten

thams cad na/ /bka' las 'gal bar byed pa med/ /ci ste sgrub pa'i de nyid shes/ /yang na dngos grub 'dod pa yis/ /cho ga bzhin du kun byas na/ /sgrub pa pos ni thams cad 'thob/ /lha 'am lha ma yin rnams dang / /gnod

sbyin yang na rig sngags 'chang / /gzhan yang gang dag su yang rung / /'gal bar byed pa gang yang med/ /sangs rgyas shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ /rdo rje 'dzin pa chen po dang / /rig sngags bdag gi bla ma la/ /ci ste mchog tu dang

byed na/ /de ni kun las lhag ma dang / /sems can kun gyis mchod pa dang / /rtag tu dngos grub kun byed dang / /gzhan gyi dngos grub 'jig par nus/ /dus kun du ni gtsang ba dang / /gsang ba thams cad 'chang byed la/ /

rig sngags 'chang gi go 'phang mchog /shin tu sems par byed pa yi/ /cho gar ldan zhing rgyas par bcas/ /de ni ma lus bshad par bya/ /de nas lha dang lha ma yin/ /mi dang rig sngags 'chang rnams dang / /'byung po'i

tshogs dang klu rnams dang / /gnod sbyin rnams dang srin por bcas/ /gsang ba'i mchog ni mnyan pa'i phyir/ /thams cad thal mo sbyar nas 'khod/ /de nas tshig don rtogs pa yi/ /rdo rje 'dzin pas de dag la/ /gsal bar

bya phyir tshig 'di smras/ /nga ni dkyil 'khor dam pa dang / /bla ma'i rigs ni sngon mthong la/ /rdo rje dang ni rdo rje 'dzin/ /rig sngags sgrub pa rtogs byas nas/ /zla ba phyed gsum bar du ni/ /zla gcig pas ni bsgrub par bya/ /

sangs rgyas gzugs ni rdzogs pa 'am/ /sku gdung ldan pa'i mchod rten der/ /rig sngags rdo rje lcags kyu ma/ /rig sngags rigs kyi tshogs bskor ba/ /cho ga bzhin du byas nas ni/ /yid dang 'thad pas mchod par bya/ /mtshams

bcad dang ni phyogs bcing dang / /chus ni kun nas bcad pa dang / /thams cad du ni bsrung ba rnams/ /cho ga bzhin du legs par dgod/ /sna gsum rdo rje bkra shis dang / /lcags kyu kha gdengs yungs kar gyis/ /tshul bzhin

dang por mdun dag tu/ /rdo rje lcags kyu'i gzugs su bri/ /kha zas kyang ni dkar gsum gyis/ /cho ga bzhin byas bza' bar bya/ /dus gsum yang na nub bdun du/ /bzlas brjod mchog gi brgyad brgya bya/ /de nas

der ni rdo rje dang / /lcags kyu 'bar ba mthong bar 'gyur/ /der ni gzugs las grub pa po/ /lha yi rig sngags 'chang bzhin 'gyur/ /'jig rten gsum yang snang bar byed/ /sa steng dag kyang 'bar ba dang / /'jig rten

gsum yang g.yo bar ni/ /bdag nyid kyi ni der mthong 'gyur/ /rig sngags rdo rje lcags kyu dge/ /de nas de la 'grub par 'gyur/ /ri dgas kyis bskor gzhon nu ma'i/ /thad de dga' ba btsen par 'gyur/ /de nas lha dang 'byung

po dag /rgya mtsho nam mkha' sa gnas pa/ /dang ba med cing ma grub rnams/ /de ltar dga' bar gyur nas ni/ /don rnams kun yang byed par 'gyur/ /de bzhin du ni ji ltar yang / /kun tu dngos grub ya mtshan can/ /mkha'

la de bzhin byed par 'gyur/ /de nas ci dga' rgyu ba dang / /de yi dga' mgur de bzhin byed/ /rtse dga' mchog tu shes par bya/ /de ni yun du 'tsho bar 'gyur/ /de ni dga' bzhin mkha' la 'gro/ /lha yi rig sngags 'chang

gis bskor/ /de ni gcig pu ci dga' bar/ /rdo rje 'dzin pa yin bzhin du/ /lhag par dga' ba'i gnas rnams su/ /rig sngags 'chang bas bskor bar 'gyur/ /de ni na da ku bar bzhin/ /dga' bar gang yang rtse bar 'gyur/ /

dus men par ni shing rnams dang / /me tog tshal dang 'bras bu'i tshal/ /khang bzangs yid du 'ong ba rnams/ /thams cad kyang ni sprul bar byed/ /'on kyang 'di ni mdo tsam ste/ /'dir ni de las bshad mi bya/ /rdo rje lcags kyu

grub na ni/ /tshig tu brjod pa thams cad grub/ /las kyi dam pa 'di nyid kyis/ /thams cad kyang ni 'grub par bshad/ /dam tshig tshul bzhin mthong nas ni/ /dam tshig dag la mkhas pa yis/ /sangs rgyas rigs sngags

rdo rje 'dzin/ /bla ma tshul bzhin mchod par bya/ /bsgrims te mchod pa byas na ni/ /lha bshos dag kyang tshul bzhin dbul/ /de nas 'dod pa kun sbyin pa/ /rdo rje lcags kyu rig sngags gdon/ /lha bshos de yi cho ga dang / /me tog

bdug pas mchod byas nas/ /sgrub pa pos ni ci nus gyis/ /dus gsum bzlas brjod byas na ni/ /nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas pas kyang / /gdon gyi las rnams 'grub par 'gyur/ /des na gdon ni stong phrag rnams/ /dga'

mgur yang ni gzhig par nus/ /yang na g.yul ngor mi bzad 'jig /gdon dag gi ni dkyil 'khor du/ /myur du gdon ni 'bebs pa dang / /de bzhin gzhig dang bsad pa dang / /bcing dang brdeg dang gzir ba dang / /ku co 'don du

'jug yang rung / /grong khyer dang ni gnas rnams dang / /smas pa'i rma ni spo ba dang / /rig sngags dam pa bshad pa 'dis/ /thams cad kyang ni byed par 'gyur/ /babs pa de dag thams cad kyang / /pi wang dag kyang lan

du gzhug /de bzhin gar gyi cho ga rnams/ /yid 'ong ya mtshan byed du gzhug /dgug dang rmi lam cho ga dang / /de bzhin lcags sgrog gzhom pa dang / /rgyal po'i pho brang dag na ni/ /rtsod pa dag las lhag par rgyal/ /gzugs

dang stobs chen ldan pa yi/ /rig sngags rdo rje lcags kyu ma/ /gang gi snying la tshul bzhin rtag /de yi don kun 'grub par 'gyur/ /skyes pa 'am yang na bud med dam/ /klu 'am lha yang dga' ba yod/ /der ni kun tu

thams cad la/ /don rnams thams cad 'grub par 'gyur/ /rgyal po dang ni blon po dang / /blon po chen po mdun na 'don/ /zhag bdun yang na lnga yi bar/ /brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas dbang du 'gyur/ /gang zhig 'chi bar bya 'dod na/ /

de yi gzugs de der bris la/ /lag pas mnan la bzlas brjod bya/ /gdon dang klu yi gdon yang rung / /'byung po 'byung po'i gdon dang ni/ /khar ni rdo rjes gzir byas na/ /zhag bdun gyis ni brlag par 'gyur/ /bran

mo dang ni mi rnams kyang / /zhag gsum gyis ni brlag par 'gyur/ /dbang du bya bar 'dod na ni/ /der yang nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas/ /brgyad brgyar bzlas brjod byas na ni/ /bu dang bu mo chung ma dang / /khyim thabs dang ni nor

'jog dang / /khyim dang bzhon pa glang chen rta/ /ma he dang ni grong yang rung / /zhag bdun gyis ni myur bar 'thob/ /gzhan gyis rig sngags rigs kun dang / /gdon rnams kyang ni brlag par 'gyur/ /khye'u dag ni bu

mo rnams/ /nad kyis kyang ni ma rung 'gyur/ /ro bsregs sol ba'i ri mo yis/ /dgra yi gzugs ni der bris la/ /de yi steng du 'dug nas ni/ /gang du gzhom par 'dod pa der/ /gzir bar byas te zhag bdun du/ /

bzlas brjod dang ni sbyin sreg bya/ /de ltar byas na gzir bar 'gyur/ /ci ste bu mo thob 'dod na/ /des ni zhag bdun bya bar bstan/ /zhag bdun 'bum du bzlas na ni/ /bu mo'i mchog kyang thob par 'gyur/ /rig sngags

'chang ba bdag nyid kyis/ /khros nas bzlas brjod byas na ni/ /grong khyer dag ni 'bar ba dang / /gser dang de bzhin 'jig pa dang / /gdon dag gis ni 'debs par 'gyur/ /gang las rgyal 'dod dmag gi nang / /
'dug nas kyang ni bzlas brjod bya/ /grong khyer dbus 'dug bzlas na ni/ /nad kyis grong khyer dkrugs par 'gyur/ /grong gi dbus 'dug bzlas na ni/ /grong mi nad kyis dkrugs par 'gyur/ /dgon par 'dug nas

bzlas na ni/ /gdug pa kun las thar bar 'gyur/ /de nas yid ni zhi ba yis zhi ba'i rig sngags brjod par bya/ /zhi phyir rig sngags brjod na ni/ /thams cad du ni zhi bar 'gyur/ /bsad phyir rig sngags bzlas

na ni/ /phan tshun du yang gsod par 'gyur/ /'thab du gzud phyir rig sngags bzlas/ /'thab mo mngon du 'byung bar 'gyur/ /shing skam phyir ni chu la bzlas/ /zla ba gcig gis lo ma 'byung / /kun dga' ra ba yid 'ong yang / /

zla ba gcig gis gshig par 'gyur/ /ci ste nyi ma rangs par bzlas/ /chu dang zas dang bag chos dang / /'bras bu rnam pa sna tshogs kyang / /de ma thag tu bsgyur bar byed/ /gzhan gyis bzhon dang de bzhin du/ /shing rta'i bzhon

pa 'dzoms par byed/ /ci ste chu klung chen po yi/ /'gram du song nas bzlas brjod byas/ /las rnams gang dang gang 'dod dang / /gang gang cho ga ji bzhin gang / /de bzhin cho ga gtor ma dang / /bzlas brjod sbyin sreg gtsang

byas na/ /des na don rnams thams cad kyang / /byed 'gyur de la the tshom med/ /rtag tu bden smra bslab la dga'/ /dngos grub mchog chen thams cad ldan/ /'byung po bsgrub par 'dod na ni/ /zhag gsum smyung byas mar

gyi ngo / /bcu bzhi la ni gtor ma sbyin/ /zla ba drug gam zla ba phyed/ /shing drung yang na dgon par gnas/ /gcig pu bsrung ba mchog byas la/ /slongs mo yi ni zas kyang bza'/ /zla drug yang na zla ba gcig /lha 'am

gdon kyang gnas kyang rung / /zla gcig phyugs kyi lhas su gnas/ /zho dang 'o ma mar yang bza'/ /sku gdung ldan pa'i mchod rten drung / /zla gcig sna tshogs zas kyis mchod/ /zla ba gnyis ni dur khrod du/ /gtor

ma bdug pa gtsang sogs mchod/ /thang ngam mchod rten drung du bzlas/ /de nas 'byung po brlag par 'gyur/ /der ni 'byung po dam pa gang / /yang na thog mar gang 'ongs dang / /gang tshe de la nye bar 'gyur/ /gang na gang zhig

sems kyis 'dod/ /de tshe shin du bsnyen nas ni/ /rdo rje lcags kyu rtag tu bzlas/ /de yi ming ni dris nas kyang / /de nyid ming ni bzung bar bya/ /gcig pus dkyil 'khor byas na ni/ /rigs sngags rdo rje lcags kyu'i tshogs/ /

dri la sogs pas legs mchod nas/ /des ni 'byung po de dag dgug /de yis ming brjod 'byung po rnams/ /dga' nas der ni 'ong bar 'gyur/ /de nas des ni legs pas mchod/ /gzhan yang 'ongs nas mchod par bya/ /

ming ni legs par brjod bya zhing / /skrag byed ming la brten nas ni/ /'byung po bsgrub tu grub 'gyur na/ /mi ni 'grub par 'gyur ba yin/ /de nas de la 'byung po rnams/ /kun nas nye bar 'khor bar 'gyur/ /rgyal po'i zham

ring 'thun byed bzhin/ /las kun yang ni byed par 'gyur/ /de ni rgyal po'i dmag rnams la/ /rgyal po chen pos byas pa bzhin/ /stobs chen 'byung po'i sde dag la/ /bka' ni kun tu stsol bar byed/ /sa stengs kun du

rtse byed cing / /'byung po'i bdag po kun gyis mchod/ /'byung po dag gis phul ba yi/ /kha zas la sogs thams cad za/ /grong ni gang la rgyal 'dod cing / /yang na phan par 'dod kyang rung / /bsgrub phyir yang ni gzhig pa'i

phyir/ /der ni 'byung po rnams kyang gtong / /des ni ming gang ma bkug pa'i/ /'byung po'am 'byung po'i tshogs kyang rung / /de yi las mchog 'dod na ni/ /de yi ming yang smos par bya/ /ming ni smos pa de yis na/ /

snyems pa med pa'i 'byung po yang / /bkug pa med par myur du ni/ /bka' bzhin byed par 'gyur ba bstan/ /de ni mi yi 'khor dag tu/ /sgyu 'phrul du ma byed par 'gyur/ /lhag par 'byung po'i 'khor dag tu/ /

spyod pa sna tshogs byed par 'gyur/ /srog chags mi la sogs rnaMs kyi/ /srog la dbang bar des 'gyuro/ /'byor par bya ba'i phyir yang rung / /yang na lus ni gzhig phyir des/ /ming gis bkug pa'i 'byung po la/ /dga' bzhin bag brkyang smra bar bya/ /

ming la sogs pa 'di dag gis/ /sna ni shin du che ba dang / /shin du ring bar byos shig ces/ /bsgo na de bzhin byed par 'gyur/ /de bzhin rkang lag bzhin mdog bsgyur/ /rid pa dang ni brkam pa dang / /ma rung bar ni

byos shig ces/ /bsgo na de tshe de bzhin byed/ /de bzhin rnam pa mang po dang / /shin du 'jigs pa sna tshogs ston/ /de bzhin zhi byed sna tshogs kyis/ /'byung po sgrub pa rtse bar 'gyur/ /mi 'dod na yang mi rnams dang / /

'byung po mang pos mthong mi 'gyur/ /rig sngags 'chang chen bzhin du 'gyur/ /gang zhig rig sngags rtag tu zlos/ /lha la yang ni phyag 'tshal zhing / /rtag tu 'byung po rnams la yang / /kha zas ci 'dod sbyin byed por/ /de ni

lhag par bde 'gyur zhing / /tshe yang lhag par bskal par thub/ /'byung po mang po'i rgyal po mchog / /gtso bor yang ni 'gyur ba dang / /lha yi rgyal po 'dra ba yang / /rkyen du bab par bshad pa yin/ /rdo rje lcags kyu ma'i bsgrub
pa rdzogs s+ho// // rdo rje lcags kyu'i rigs la ni/ /rig sngags don kun grub byed pa/ /lha mo mchog 'gror grags pa 'di/ /sems can rnams kyis bsten par bshad/ /zla ba drug gis 'grub 'gyur te/ /tshig

gis don kun byed par bstan/ /rtsi sman thams cad blangs nas ni/ /srang gcig nges par gzhag par bya/ /na mo rat+na tra ya s+ya/ na mo badzra pA Ni s+ya/ ba ti ba ra ti/ ku sha sam+pan+na ma na se a ta ra te/ ba te ye saM tse b+hU te/ at+te

the/ rU pi ta a smra mi swA hA/ sku gdung ldan pa'i mchod rten drung / /dus gsum bzlas brjod brgyad brgya bya/ /gtsang zhing tshangs par spyod pa yis/ /lha bshos me tog bdug pa dang / /de bzhin mtshan mo mar me dang / /mchod

pa ci nus ci dga' bya/ /mtshams bcad phyogs bcing bsrung ba rnams/ /rtag tu rdo rje lcags kyus bya/ /de ltar rtag tu brtson pa la/ /de ni zla ba drug gis 'grub/ /de nas 'dod chags la sogs dang / /sman chen mnyam

par 'jog par 'gyur/ /nad dang sman kun ston pa dang / /gtam rgyud thams cad smra bar 'gyur/ /sgrub pa po la legs nyes rnams/ /tshig gis ston cing smra bar byed/ /gsang sngags de yi cho ga ni 'di yin te/ /ras ma nyams pa la

tshon rtsi spyin med pas bcom ldan 'das dang lag na rdo rje'i sku gzugs bris te/ lha mo yang bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la 'dud par byas nas/ yar gyi ngo tshes gcig la brtsams te/ zas su 'o ma dang phye'i lde gu za zhing dus

gsum du sna ma'i me tog brgyad brgyad la lan re re bzlas brjod byas pas lag na rdo rje la bsnun par bya'o/ /bcom ldan 'das dang lag na rdo rje la mchod pa yang rtag tu byas te/ mjug tu zhag gsum smyung bar byas nas/ zla ba nya'i

nub mo brgyad stong gis bsnun la ci 'byor pas mchod na 'grub par 'gyur te/ don thams cad ston par byed do/ /gzhan yang tshes bcu gnyis nas brtsams te/ /nya'i bar du gtsang zhing nges pa dang ldan par byas te/ ras la bcos

ldan 'das dang / lag na rdo rje dang / lha mo dang / sgrub pa po rnams dge bsnyen la 'drir bcug ste/ sku gdung dang ldan pa'i mchod rten gyi drung du bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar mchod pa byas nas/ sna ma'i me tog brgyad brgya la lan

brgyad brgya sngags kyis btab nas phung po lngar bcad de/ /de rnams las cha gcig bcom ldan 'das la dbul bar bya'o/ /lhag ma rnams ni phyogs bzhir gtor bar bya'o/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das la phul ba de dag las kha

gcig blangs te ras dkar po'i nang du phur nas sngas su bcug ste nyal bar bya'o/ /'o ma dang phye'i 'dag gu dang zas dkar po za zhing me tog dkar po dang / dri dkar po phul na zla ba nya la 'grub par 'gyur ro/ /de nas gang gi nyin par

yang rung ste/ cho ga de bzhin du sna ma'i me tog brgyad brgya la lan brgyad brgya bzlas brjod byas te/ mchod pa byas la/ lhag ma yang de bzhin du gtor nas nyal na rmyi lam du thams cad ston par byed do/ /cho ga gsum pa ni me

long la bsgrub par bya'o/ /mchog 'gro ma'i rig sngags kyi cho ga rdzogs s+ho// // na mo rat+na tra ya s+ya/ na ma sh+tsaN+Da badzra pA Ni s+ya/ ma hA yak+Sha se nA pa ti s+ya/ e h+ye hi badzra pA Ni/ i daM bA ha na/ ma nu sma ra shI g+h+raM ma

na tsa ba la li ta ga ti/ ma hA yak+Sha se nA pa ti badzra pA Ni/ hi hi he hi he hi hi hi/ he ku ru he ku ru/ ku ku ku ku/ ku badzra pA Ni/ sa ra sa ra/ bai ri bai ri/ he hi he hi he hi/ ku ku b+ha ku ku b+ha/ badzra pA Ni swA hA/ 'di ni snying po spyan drang pA+o'o/ /

de la 'di ni lag na rdo rje'i snying po yin no/ /sarba tra a pa ra dzi taM/ sarba tra a pra ti ha taM/ sarba tra ar+tha sA d+ha naM/ dza ste dzo gra ma naM/ swa rU pa mu pa da shA nAM/ kI li kI li/ mo ku la shab+dA ru taM badzro t+yU t+ta ka ra ka ra kr-i t+yu ka ra na ra na

dza naM/ ad+d+ha na si d+d+hAM pa ra ma sid+d+haM/ pa tsa laM tsaN+DaM pi tra/ pa kaM sa kaM ra ka ta ka raM shAM ti ka raM/ puSh+Ti ka raM/ swa b+ba no pa rad naM/ tsa ra da na/ sarba karma ar+tha sA d+ha kaM/ A kaR+shaM NAM/ badzra pA Ni s+ya/ bo la lA pa naM/ badzra pA Ni s+ya ha sa pA naM/

badzra pA Ni s+ya/ pa ra ma hr-i da ya mi daM na/ badzra pA Ni s+ya/ badzra pA Ni ra ma hA yak+Sha se nA pa ti rAdz+nyA pa ya ti/ badzre Na ha na ti/ da ha ti/ pa tsa ti/ ts+tshin+da ti/ ts+tshin+da ti/ bid dra pa ya ti/ A lo ka bi lo kaM ka ro ti/ hi li ni/ li mi li o u ho u b+ha

badzra pA Ni/ hu ru hu ru/ saM b+haM badzra b+ha dza ye duSh+TAM/ ha na ha na/ da ha da ha/ pa tsa pa tsa/ gr-ih+Na gr-ih+Na/ ba sh+yaM ka ro ha hi la ha lA ya swA hA/ hu lu hu lA ya swA hA/ hi li hi lA ya swA hA/ ka la ka lA ya swA hA/ ku lu ku lU ya swA hA/ kI li

kI lI ya swA hA/ ke li ki lA ya swA hA/ da ya ma na sma ra badzra pA Ni/ ma hA yak+Sha sa ma ti sa ma ya pra ti gr-ih+Na hu te hu ti d+hUM pa pA sha pa gan+d+ha ma l+yaM tsa ra swa ma dU twa swa ma yaM b+h+ya ti kra ma mad ma/ sa ma yo bi ti shu ti/ hi li hi ri na i li/

ku ru kaM du pra sa da shak+to smin+tu ru me ha ra ba ra hi ri li/ ni ri li/ badzra pA Ni/ ti li ti li/ ba shi ma nu brta hi ri Ni ni ri Ni badzra pA Ni sa ma ya nu brta hi ri mi ri i b+ha ha ya ni/ satwaM badzra pA Ni ma ma hi/ swa ya mu pa tiSh+Tha swA hA/ 'di ni de'i

bdug pa'i sngags so/ /li hi li hi pi li tu u b+h+yo/ u b+ha hu ru hu/ bany+dza bany+dza/ ba sh+ye mye ka ro haM daM swA hA/ /lag na rdo rje phyag 'tshal bcas/ /rtsed mo can zhes bya ba yi/ /snying po 'di ni 'jig rten grags/ /de na 'dod dgur

bsgrub pa yin/ /gang zhig dngos grub mchog 'dod cing / /'di yi bsgrub pa'i don shes pa/ /des ni rdo rje bsgrub pa'i mchog /ya mtshan 'di ni bsgrub par bya/ /de nas rim pa ji bzhin du/ /bdag gis legs par bshad

par bya/ /dam pa'i don gyi rjes mthun pa/ /thub la spyi bos phyag 'tshal ba/ /gser ram ra gan zangs la sogs/ /yang na tsan dan dmar po las/ /rdo rje rtse mo brgyad pa 'am/ /yang na rtse mo bzhi par bya/ /sor gsum

yang na drug gam brgyad/ /yang na sor ni bcu gnyis pa/ /zur brgyad shin tu rdzogs pa 'am/ /yang na zur ni drug tu bya/ /de nas dgon pa 'am rang gi khyim/ /gtsang zhing mnyam pa'i sa phyogs su/ /ba lang lci bas dkyil

'khor byugs/ /sku gdung mchog dga' gtsang ma yis/ /de yi steng du dri zhim pa'i/ /spos kyis dkyil 'khor byug par bya/ /yungs kar phul thag bzhi rnams kyang / /dbus dag tu ni bzhag par bya/ /de yi steng du rdo rje de/ /dri dang

me tog phreng bas brgyan/ /rtag tu yang ni dus gsum du/ /mchod pa rnam pa sna tshogs bya/ /tsam pa ka dang tsam pa ka'i/ /me tog sna ma'i me tog rnams/ /yid du 'ong bas sangs rgyas dang / /rdo rje 'dzin la nges par mchod/ /

du rus ska dang a ka ru/ /bdug pa'i mchog ni rtag tu bsreg /sku gzugs cho ga bzhin bris la/ /cho ga 'di ni bya ba ste/ /sangs rgyas gser gyi kha dog 'dra/ /sangs rgyas thad na gnas pa yi/ /lag na rdo rje g.yon phyogs

bri/ /rgyal po bzhin du brgyan bya zhing / /ha cang dmar bar mi bya ste/ /sku gzugs nub phyogs logs su bstan/ /shes rab can gyis cho ga 'di/ /bya ste de ni rim bzhin bshad/ /dang po yang ni tshes gcig brtsams/ /nges
par gnas shing gtsang ba yis/ /khrus ni ba lang lci ba dang / /ba bcin btsags pas dus gsum bya/ /mdun du rtag tu gos phrugs ni/ /bdug pas rab tu bdugs pa bgo/ tsam pa ka dang tsam ka yis/ /

me tog rnams kyis rtag tu mchod/ /sna tshogs dri dang me tog phreng / /mdzes shing yid du 'ong bas mchod/ /lan grangs brgyad brgyar bzlas brjod bya/ /du rus ska dang a ka ru/ /bsreg cing mar me gnyis kyang dbul/ /

rtag tu 'chi bar mi bya ste/ /de bzhin mar gyi mar me gzhan/ /nyin gcig bzhin du bskyed par bya/ /de tshe 'o ma'i 'dag gu rnams/ /za zhing mnyam par bzhag pa dang / /gso sbyong yan lag brgyad ldan pas/ /tshes ni bcu

gnyis bar du yang / /rtag tu ku sha'i mal stan 'dug /de nas zhag gsum smyung byas nas/ /zla ba nya la cho ga bzhin/ /dpe med pa yi mchod pa bya/ /der ni tshon rtsi sna gsum gyis/ /grong khyer dag kyang bri bar bya/ /gru bzhi

lham pa sgo bzhir ldan/ /phyogs cha legs par bcad bya zhing / /mnyam byas de yi nang dag tu/ /lha bshos dkar po dpe med dbul/ /phyi rol du yang sna tshogs pa/ /ci 'dod thams cad bzhag par bya/ /de nas ku sha'i stan

'dug cing / /bsrung byas cho ga shes pa des/ /rdo rje 'bar bar gyur gyi bar/ /a ka ru dang du rus ska/ /bsreg cing dga' bzhin bzlas brjod bya/ /nyi ma las lhag de yi gzi/ /rdo rje de ni legs par blangs/ /cis kyang mi 'jigs

mkha' la 'gro/ /rig sngags grub pa'i stobs dang ldan/ /rig sngags bdag po thams cad dang / /lag na rdo rje rigs skyes pa'i/ /rig sngags tshogs ni kun gyis mchod/ /don mang dag la brten bya zhing / /rnam pa mang du

ci zhig smos/ /lag na rdo rje mnyam 'gyur te/ /'di la the tshom ci yang med/ /de nas dga' ba ma yin pa'i/ /las de dag kyang 'dir bya ste/ /de dag gi ni mdor bstan pa/ /snying po bsdus pa bshad par bya/ /gang zhig mi yi gtso bo

'am/ /blon po dbang du bya 'dod des/ /de yi bsgrub pa gang yin pa/ /'di yang rab tu bshad par bya/ /zhag bdun gtsang mar byas nas ni/ /nas kyi zas ni dus su bza'/ /de nas seng ldeng me bsangs la/ /yam sreg shing dang

sbrang rtsi zho/ /mar blangs brgyad brgya tshang bar ni/ /dus gsum du yang sbyin sreg bya/ /dus kyi lhag ma rtag tu bzlas/ /lan gsum khrus byas nges par gnas/ /dbang du bya 'dod gang yin pa/ /de dang yang ni phrad par bya/ /de yi ming ni smos pas

kyang / /de ni bran bzhin dbang du gyur/ /mi ni gang zhig bran nor 'dod/ /des ni nor gyi tshad bsams la/ /de yi bsgrub mchog 'di bya zhing / /lan gsum khrus bya bil ba yi/ /bdug pa mar dang ldan pa bsreg /de nas lag na rdo rje'i mdun/ /

der ni ba lang lci ba'i mer/ /sngar bshad pa ni gang yin pa'i/ /sbyin sreg mnyam par bzhag pas bya/ /yang na bil ba'i sbyin sreg ni/ /mar dang yungs kar ldan pa 'am/ /yungs kar mar dang ldan pa 'ang rung / /yang na mar ldan bil ba 'am/ /

mar dang yungs kar ldan pa yi/ /sbrang rtsi bzang po bil bar ldan/ /yang na re re sbyin sreg mchog /brgya rtsa brgyad du bya ba ste/ /seng ldeng yam sreg shing bzang gis/ /dus gsum du ni rnam gsum byas/ /phye dang ba gcin 'de gu dang / /phye dang

'o ma'i 'de gu 'ang rung / /dus gsum bza' zhing yang na ni/ /mi smra mi bza' rig sngags bzlas/ /yang na sbyin sreg yid kyis bya/ /gtsang zhing brtson par gnas pa des/ /nor ni yid la gang 'dod pa/ /zhag bdun gyis ni thob par 'gyur/ /zla phyed yang na

zla ba gcig /yang na zla ba phyed gsum gyis/ /rnam pa kun gyi thabs rnams gyi/ /'dod pa thams cad ma lus sbyin/ /yang na gdon gyi las rnams 'dir/ /sbyin sreg bzlas brjod brtson pa dang / /gtsang zhing dam tshig mkhas pa yis/ /thams cad

rab tu 'grub par 'gyur/ /rtsed mo can gyi snying po rdzogs s+ho// // de nas gtum po'i snying po'i cho ga rgyas par bshad par bya'o/ /na maHtsi li/ tsi ri ni/ i li ku ru hat+ti pra sid+ha b+hak+to smi ku ru me ha ba raM ki li bi li/ hi ri ni su ru ku ru/ sa ma ya

ma nu brta hr-i da yaM swA hA/ snying po dran par byed pa'i tshig 'di dag gang du brjod pa der dga' bar gyur nas las thams cad byed par 'gyur ro/ /na maHkI li kI lA ya swA hA/ ma hA kI li kI lA ya swA hA/ kro d+ha kI li kI lA ya swA hA/ tsaN+Da

kI li kI lA ya swA hA/ di ba ti kI li kI lA ya swA hA/ badzra kI li kI lA ya swA hA/ badzra d+ha rA ya swA hA/ badzra mo ta nA ya swA hA/ badzra stam+b+ha nA ya swA hA/ badzra pra b+han+d+ha nA yang swA hA/ e hi sti badzra/ e hi su sti badzra/ e hi pra ti pra ti ra badzra/ e

ha a pra ti ha ta badzra/ e hi a mo g+ha badzra/ e hi shi g+h+raM nI la be ga badzra/ ma hA yak+Sha se nA pa ti/ badzra pA Ni/ mu ne mu ne mu ne/ ri ma ti/ ma hA ma ti/ su ma ti/ he hi pa ni ti li/ sau haM di li piR+t+wa ma ti to ni ra ti ra ti ti/ ku la ti

li shi li/ tsa ra di mo ti/ ku tsit+tha maR+te/ su bu ru bu R+ma ru/ khu khu ti/ khu khu ti/ khu da li ti li ti li/ ti/ ri e hi shI g+h+raM badzra pA Ni/ ma hA yak+Sha se nA pa ti/ i daM g+han+d+ha ma le/ a nu le pa na maH/ pra tits+tsha ku di ku di ku ti swA hA/ ku di bi ri/ bi ri ti swA hA/

bi ti maM ku ti la swA hA/ a ra li sa ra li gi ri ni/ ba li ni/ si li ti/ pur+Na kur+Na sharba durba karba turba kut+ta/ mut+ta narba barba/ balba ram+ba ha hwa/ e hi e hi shI g+h+raM badzra pA Ni/ he he hai hai/ tu ru tu ru/ la hUM la hUM swA hA/ sma ra taM nA ga ri

yat+t+ra/ pra ti dz+nya kr-i ta/ mi ti ri ti/ di ri ri ti li pu swA hA/ ku khu lu tu ka ti lu ti li ri swA hA/ e hi tri ma hA yak+Sha se nA pa ti hi ri/ ti ri b+hi ti/ ri li gi ni/ ni ra dzan+tu/ bi ri dza yan+tu/ ri kan+ti ring+ga / tsu ru tsu ru/ tsi ri ti ri swA hA/ narba sharba rba

ku ku lu/ khu khu lu/ khu khu ti ni/ ru ru ta ru/ smra ra taM/ pra ti swA hA/ lag na rdo rje gtum rab gtum/ /nga yi snying po gnyis pa ni/ /gtum zhing rab gtum las yin te/ /ming yang gtum po zhes par grags/ /gtum po rdo rje
'dzin pa yi/ /snying po gtum po 'di dag ni/ /gnyis pa zhes ni bya bar bstan/ /las rnams la ni zla phyed de/ /dam pa rnams kyi las kun mchog /gdon la sogs dang sems can kun/ /'gugs pa'i mchog la sogs

pa dang / /bsrung ba la sogs dpe med pa/ /'di'i las ni stong rnams dang / /cho ga chen po brgyad rnams kyang / /lha gnas mthong bar nges par ni/ /bzlas brjod sbyin sreg rnams kyis bya/ /la la gang zhig rdo rje 'dzin/ /

mngon sum mthong bar 'dod na ni/ /nga yi bsgrub pa'i thabs 'di dag /spyan 'dren mchog 'di de yis bya/ /dus gsum ba lang lci bas bskus/ /las kyang dag cing sems dag dang / /rdo rje 'dzin la gus pa dang / /rkang lag la sogs

bkrus nas kyang / /dgon pa'am rang gi khyim yang rung / /gtsang ma'i phyogs su mchod rten nam/ /sku gzugs yang na sku gdung gi/ /mdun du rtag tu mnyam par bzhag / /mi ni gtsang sbrar spyod pa yis/ /bdug pa me tog

la sogs pa/ /mchog dang khyad par 'phags pa yis/ /dus gsum rtag tu mchod par bya/ /de la rab spro de la gus/ /srog kyang de la bstan byas nas/ /lag na rdo rje gzugs kyang rung / /ji skad bstan bzhin ri mor bri/ /

dri dang phreng ba byug pa yis/ /rtag tu de la mchod par bya/ /mar dang ldan pas dus su bza'/ /sbrang rtsi 'o thug bza' bar bya/ /ri mo'i sku gzugs nub phyogs bstan/ /rtag tu shar phyogs kha blta 'dug /mar gyi mar me mi

'chi bas/ /nyin par mchod pa legs par bya/ /cho 'phrul gyi ni zla phyed dam/ /yar gyi ngo yi tshes brgyad la/ /brtsams te brgyad stong bzlas brjod bya/ /yang na nyin re dus gsum du/ /lan grangs brgyad brgyar bzlas brjod bya/ /thang

chu yang ni bsreg par bya/ /dang zhing rtse gcig sems kyis ni/ /bsrung ba'i mchog byas bzlas brjod bya/ /zla ba phyed ni lon nas kyang / /des ni zhag gsum smyung ba bya/ /mchod pa la sogs kun rgyas shing / /shin tu mang por

byas nas kyang / /'dod pa yid la gzhag bya zhing / /de nas gus pa mchog gis su/ /oM ni tshig stong bzlas brjod byas/ /de nas rdo rje can yang mthong / /de la mchog sbyin gtso bo de/ /dam pa'i mchog ni sbyin par byed/ /bsgrub

pa'i cho gas spyan drangs nas/ /mchod sbyin mchog la ci 'dod smros/ /tshig gis gang dag gang brjod pa'i/ /bsgrub pa'i dam pa thob par 'gyur/ /de'i slar gtang cho ga de/ /rnam pa thams cad bshad par bya/ /

des ni phyag dang mchod pa dang / /mchod yon me tog la sogs 'bul/ /'dod pa'i rig sngags lan cig brjod/ /des ni rdo rje 'dzin par 'gro/ /na maHhi li hu la ni/ li hu la a ha ha ha ha ha/ sa bra ti gats+tsha tu b+ha ga baM/

badzra pA Ni re tha su khaM tsu lu tsu lu swA hA/ /'di ni gcig gam gsum du brjod/ /lnga 'am bdun nam nyi shu gcig /brgya 'am yang na brgyad brgya 'am/ /lan stong cho ga bzhin du brjod/ /'byung po'i gnas sam gzhan dag tu/ /

rdo rje dang ni lha'i mdun/ /dri kun gyi ni sbyor ba dang / /bcing dang grol la bzlas brjod bya/ /dgug dang slar btang thams cad dang / /bcing dang grol ba thams cad la/ /der ni lan cig brjod par bya/ /des na rdo rje 'dzin par 'gro/ /'di

ni rtsed mo ldan pa yi/ /bsgrub dang slar gtang ba yang yin/ /'di gnyis la ni khyad par du/ /dbye bar bya ba mang po yod/ /gang gis rtag tu gtsang byas la/ /lo gcig bar du dus gsum du/ /bzlas brjod rnam pa gsum byas na/ /

de yis bde bar 'dod pa 'thob/ /gang zhig zla drug sgrub byed cing / /bzlas brjod nyi shu rtsa gcig byed/ /legs byas de ni mkha' la rgyu/ /'bring dang lhag ma nyid du 'gyur/ /gang zhig zla gsum bzlas brjod byed/ /yang na yid kyis

sbyin sreg las/ /byas na cho ga 'di dag gis/ /de ltar de yang 'grub par 'gyur/ /zla ba phyed gsum za gcig zos/ /des kyang dngos grub tha ma 'am/ /'bring dang khyad par 'phags pa thob/ /khyim gyi don rnams grub byed cing / /

nad rnams kyang ni sel bar byed/ /don rnams ji skad bshad pa bzhin/ /de dag thams cad rab tu 'grub/ /zla ba gcig tu bzlas brjod byed/ /'o thug sbrang rtsi mar bcas bza'/ /dus gsum brgyad brgya bzlas pas ni/ /gsum

brjod mkha' la 'gro bar 'gyur/ /legs par ma byas gdon la sogs/ /don rnams thams cad 'grub par 'gyur/ /bcing dang dgrol ba thams cad dam/ /bsgrub pa'am gzhig pa bcang bar byed/ /zla phyed nas kyi kha zas zos/ /

gdon gyi las rnams byed par nus/ /ba gcin nas kyi kha zas zos/ /don rnams thams cad 'grub par nus/ /zhag bdun du ni dus gsum du/ /de bzhin brgyad brgya bzlas brjod byas/ /dbang du bya dang bcings la sogs/ /

bsad par yang ni nus par 'gyur/ /gang zhig zhag lngar zas mi za/ /nyin gcig bzhin du bzlas brjod byed/ /des ma mo rnams gzhig pa 'am/ /bsgrol dang dbang du bya bar nus/ /zhag gsum bar du dus gsum du/ /gang zhig

sbyin sreg rnam gsum byed/ /lhag ma'i dus su khros nas bzlas/ /des ni gzhan yang gzhig par nus/ /drag po yi ni las byed na/ /zhag gcig smyung byas dur khrod du/ /khrag gi sbyin sreg byas na ni/ /des ni gdon dang mi rnams

gzhig /de dag bsgrub par bya ba'i phyir/ /dang por zhag gsum smyung byas nas/ /mar gyi ngo ni bcu bzhi la/ /sum brgya lnga bcu gtsang mas bzlas/ /sngar bstan 'di dag byas na ni/ /de nas nges par gnyis kas kyang / /tshig gis gang

dang gang smras pa/ /bsam pa'i las ni byed par 'gyur/ /de ltar rtsed mo ldan pa yi/ /dkyil 'khor snying po mchog kyang bshad/ /'gro lding snying po gsum po yang / /cho ga dag dang bcas par ni/ /las kyi dam pa thams cad dang / /

de bzhin 'bring dang tha ma la/ /rdo rje rdzogs par khru gang srid/ /rtse gsum yongs su dag pa'i mchog /yang na rtse drug dam pa ni/ /de kun gyis ni bri bar bya/ /gus mchod rdo rje rig sngags kyis/ /rdo rje de ni spyan yang drang / /me tog

dam pa ma nyams pa/ /lag pa g.yon thogs legs par mchod/ /lag na bdug thogs pus mo btsugs/ /des na rig sngags 'di yang bzlas/ /na ma reM reM grAM grAM/ tsi ri Ti bi NAM/ tra pa ru Ni/ badzra ma ya/ tu pi ta ye badzra pA Ni/

ma hA ba hA ya swA hA/ /bris pa de ni lag g.yon thogs/ /mchod gnas kyang ni mchod par bya/ /bya ba zin nas slar gtang phyir/ /mchod nas slar ni gtang bar bya/ /gtum po dang rtsed mo can gyi bsgrub pa rdzogs s+ho// //

'gro lding gi snying po bshad par bya ste/ gleng bzhi ni mnyan du yod pa'o/ /de nas gnod sbyin gyi sde'i bdag po lag na rdo rje bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ste/ bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas dul ba mchog gis gnas shing

bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug ste/ pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs nas mgo bo btud cing thal mo rab tu sbyar te/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das bdag gis skye bo mang po la

sman pa dang / skye bo mang po la bde ba'i slad du bdag nyid kyi snying po 'jig rten dag la bshad lags so/ /bdag gi snying po ni 'di lags te bcom ldan 'das gang gis bdag nyid kyi snying po 'dis bdag bkug na de'i thad du bdag myur du

mchi bar 'tshal lo/ /bcom ldan 'das ci ste bdag nyid kyi snying po 'dis bdag bkug pa las ma mchis na 'jig rten pa la la dgra bcom pa gsod pa'am/ dge 'dun gyi dbyen bgyid pa gang lags pa de dag gi skye gnas su mchi
bar 'gyur ro/ /bcom ldan 'das de bas na zhag gcig smyung bar bgyis pas bdag bkug na de las bcom ldan 'das kyis slar gtang bar gsol/ de skad ces gsol nas bcom ldan 'das yid tsam 'dzum pa mdzad de/ /

lag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /lag na rdo rje legs so legs so/ /khyod kyis 'jig rten dag la khas blangs pas/ khyod la nga mnyes kyis gnod sbyin gyi sde'i bdag po lag na rdo rje khyod song la dad pa dang ldan pa

yi chad par ma byed cig /de lta mod kyi nga yang khyod kyi snying po nyan par ni 'dod do/ /de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ gnod sbyin gyi sde'i bdag po chen po lag na rdo rjes gdong cung zad tsam phab nas 'dzem bzhin du bcom ldan 'das

la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das bdag la gsan du gsol/ tad d+ya thA/ e hi s+thi ra badzra/ e hi su s+thi ra badzra/ e hi ma tu badzra/ a pra ti ha ta badzra/ i hi i ma ka badzra/ e hi shI g+h+raM nI la be ga badzra be ga badzra/ ma hA

badzra/ badzra pA Ni ma hA yak+Sha se nA pa ti mu ne mu ne/ a nai ri ma ti ma hA ma ti su ma ti e ran+ti li/ d+hu ri ti me de pu li ri ti/ dzi ri ti ku la ti shi li shi ba li ti ma ti pu tshot+ta marta tsit+ta tsit+ta merta/ du ru du ru/ khu khu ti khu khu ti ha la ti li/ ti ri e hi

shI g+h+raM badzra pA Ni i daM gaM d+ha mA le nu le pa naM/ pra tits+tsha/ ut+ta li ut+tha/ ut+tha li swA hA/ ku ti bi ri ti swA hA/ tsi ti bi ti ha ti swA hA/ na mo badzra pA Ni s+ya/ a la li ma la ri bi li ni/ pa ra ma li ni shi li/ li pi ba li/ lo ti pUr+Na garba sharba

narba turba ut+ta put+ta narba tsarba sharba malba dzalba ralba swA hA/ e hi g+h+raM badzra pA Ni he hi he hi/ tu ri tu ri/ la hUM la hUM swA hA/ sma ra tAn+ta ka rAn+ta ti dz+nyA taM mi ti ri ti mi ti ri ti/ mi di ti ti li ri ri ri/ khu khu lu khu khu ti la hUM ri ti e hi twaM ma hA yak+Sha se

nA pa ti li ri li ri/ ba si ri ri ki ri ti sma ri ma hA sma ri u dzu ri/ ge tsu ru tsu ru ti swA hA/ tarba b+harba marba khu khu la khu ti li/ tu ru tu ru/ sma ra taM pra ti dz+nyAM swA hA/ 'gro lding zhes bya ba'i snying po 'di/ /'jig rten gsum grags 'jig rten

gyi/ /rab kyi mchog gi gtso bo ste/ /lag na rdo rje gsum pa yin/ /'jig rten gsum mchog gtso bos kyang / /'di las 'gal bar byed mi nus/ /'jig rten gsum mchog 'jig gsum dbang / /tshangs pa la sogs snying po'i bar/ /

de yi bsgrub pa de nyid de/ /de yi las rnams rgyas pa yang / /rtsed mo can dang gtum po bzhin/ /'di yang de ltar bya ba ste/ /bsgrub pa'i mdo tsam bshad bya na/ /gtsang ma'i mis ni gtsang ma'i phyogs/ /dri dang phreng ba byug pa rnams/ /mchod

dang khyad par 'phags pa yis/ /mchod rten yang na sku gzugs rnams/ /sku gdung ldan pa mchod par bya/ /rdo rje bris pa legs mchod nas/ /ri mo'i sku gzugs nub phyogs bstan/ /yar gyi tshes brgyad brtsams byas la/ /

sbrang rtsi 'o thug mar dang bcas/ /dus gsum za zhing rig sngags bzlas/ /thang chu bzang po bsreg par bya/ /lci ba stsogs par legs par bkru/ /dag pas shar phyogs bltas te 'dug /shin tu mnyam bzhag dus

gsum du/ /lan grangs brgyad brgya bzlas brjod bya/ /de nas yid du 'ong ba yi/ /mchod pa las bzhin mjug tu bya/ /zla ba phyed ni 'das nas kyang / /nya'i nub mo spyan yang drang / /lha yi gnas ni mthong ba des/ /cho ga mchog gis

bsrung bar bya/ /brgya rtsa brgyad ni brjod byas na/ /de nas rdo rje can yang mthong / /de nas gzhan yang stong gi phyed/ /ci ste gus pas 'dun pas mchod/ /rdo rje 'dzin chen mngon sum du/ /mthong 'gyur de la the tshom med/ /mchod

sbyin mchog gi gtso bo des/ /de la dam pa sbyin par 'gyur/ /yang na 'khor los sgyur ba nyid/ /'dod pa gzhan lta ci zhig smos/ /ji skad bshad pa'i cho ga dang / /ji skad bshad pa'i slar gtang dang / /ji skad bshad pa'i las
rnams kyang / /mjug tu legs par bya ba yin/ /'gro lding gi cho ga dang bcas pa rdzogs s+ho// // sangs rgyas la phyag 'tshal lo/ /chos la phyag 'tshal lo/ /dge 'dun la phyag 'tshal lo/ /gnod sbyin gyi

sde'i bdag po chen po lag na rdo rje la phyag 'tshal lo/ /gleng gzhi ni mnyan du yod pa ste/ /de nas gnod sbyin gyi sde'i bdag po chen po lag na rdo rjes bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar te/ pus mo g.yas pa'i
lha nga sa la gtsugs nas/ spyi bor thal mo sbyar te/ dul ba mchog gi gnas nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das bdag gis skye bo mang po la sman pa'i slad du/ bdag

nyid kyi snying po 'jig rten dag la bshad lags te/ bdag gi snying po ni 'di lags so/ /gang gis snying po 'dis bdag bkug na de'i thad du bdag myur du mchi bar 'tshal lo/ /ci ste bdag snying po 'dis bkug pa

las ma mchis na 'jig rten la la mtshams ma mchis par bgyid cing dge 'dun gyi dbyen bgyid pa gang lags pa de dag gi skye gnas su mchi bar 'gyur ro/ /bcom ldan 'das de bas na zhag gcig smyung bar bgyis pas
bdag bkug na de las bcom ldan 'das kyis slar gtang du gsol/ lag na rdo rjes de skad ces gsol nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis yid tsam 'dzum pa mdzad de/ 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /lag na rdo rje legs so

legs so/ /khyod kyis 'jig rten dag la khas blangs pas khyod la nga mnyes kyis/ /gnod sbyin gyi sde'i bdag po chen po khyod song song la dad pa dang ldan pa yi chad pa ma byed cig /de lta mod kyi nga yang khyod kyi snying po nyan par ni

'dod do/ /de skad ces bka' stsal to/ /gnod sbyin gyi sde'i bdag po chen po lag na rdo rjes gdong yid tsam phab nas 'dzem bzhin du bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bdag gi snying po cho ga dang bcas pa gsan du

gsol/ 'di bsgrub par 'tshal zhing bcom ldan 'das la mchod par dga' bas yar gyi ngo tshes gcig la brtsams te zas su 'o ma dang phye'i 'de gu 'tshal te/ dus gsum du ba lang gi lci bas khrus bgyis la/ gtsang mas

gos gtsang ma bgos nas bdug pa bsreg cing sku gdung dang ldan pa'i mchod rten nam/ sku gzugs kyi mdun du mchod pa rgyas par bgyis la snying po brjod par bgyi ste/ gsang sngags kyi tshig 'di dag gis thog mar bdag nyid bsrung

bar bgyi'o/ /na mo rat+na tra ya s+ya/ na mo badzra pA Ni s+ya/ ma hA yak+Sha se nA pa ti s+ya/ shrI nu at+t+rai b+ha/ badzra pA Ni ma ti shi ba ma nA ya/ a n+yo n+ya badzra a sha ni ra na maH sarba gra ha duSh+Ta a pa ra ti shu rak+Sha yaM ma nash+tsa a b+ha yA ka ri hi hi badzra pA Ni

hi hi he ha hi/ hi ri ku ku bu/ hi ri ku bi sa ra sa ra su bi ri tsi ri badzra pA Ni duR+da n+tA nAM/ da ma ka da ma da ma swA hA/ lan bdun bzlas brjod bgyis nas lag pa la btags na sems can thams cad kyis mi thub par 'gyur ro/ /na mo rat+na

trA ya s+ya/ na mo badzra pA Ni s+ya/ ma hA yak+Sha se nA pa ti s+ya/ e hi badzra pA Ni/ i daM aM b+ha ha na ma nu sma ra ma hA s+thi ra badzra/ e hi su s+thi ra badzra/ e hi na ma pA badzra/ e hi a pra ti ha ta badzra/ e hi shI g+h+raM ma na tsa ba la ga ti ma hA yak+Sha

se nA pa ti/ badzra pA Ni hi hi he hi hi he hi hi he hi hi he hi hi he he/ ku tu ku tu ku tu ku tu badzra pA Ni e hi/ hi hi he/ hi hi hi hi hi/ hi hi hi hi hi hi hi hi/ badzra pA Ni ku ku bu ku ku bu ku ku bu/ ku b+h+ya ku b+h+ya/ ku ku b+h+ya/ badzra pA Ni/ sa ra sa ra/ e

bai ri/ e bai ri/ e bai ri/ e bai ri/ ha ra ni li/ a ba ha ya mi twaM/ ma ma hi sa mA ye no pa tiSh+Tha swA hA/ lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bgyis pa'i thang chu'i bdug pas spyan drang bar bgyi'o/ /na mo rat+na tra ya s+ya/ na mo badzra pA Ni s+ya/

ma hA yak+Sha se nA pa ti si/ hi ri hi ri ni badzra pA Ni/ pra ti gr-ih+Na/ A hu ti/ puSh+paM d+hU baM gan+d+ha ma l+yeM/ ma twaM/ sa ma yo b+ha d+hi sh+ye ti swA hA/ bcom ldan 'das dam tshig bgyi ba dang / de dag gi me tog dbul ba lags te/ me tog rnams ci nas kyang

sku gzugs kyi dbu la bab par gyen du gtor bar bgyi ste/ ba ru ra'i yam sreg shing brgyad brgya sbrang rtsi dang mar gyi nang du bsnyugs pas sbyin sreg bgyi'o/ /na mo rat+na tra ya s+ya/ na mo badzra pA Ni s+ya/ ma hA yak+Sha se nA pa ti s+ya/ mu ne mu ne

mu ne mu ne mu ne mu ne/ ri ma ti ma ti ma ti ma hA ma ti su ma ti/ sma ra sa ma yaM badzra pA Ni a raN+Ti li s+phu ti pha ti phuHbi li ki ti/ tsi ri li ti go ra la hit+ti li si ri pa la ti/ ba di phu tsit+ti/ ma re te phuHkhu khu ti khu ti li li ti ri swA hA/ mu ne mu ne

badzra pA Ni/ gan+d+ha mA l+ya a nu le pa na ma pra tIts+tsha/ ku hu li ku hu ku hu li swA hA/ tsa ti li swA hA/ tu tu b+ha ri swA hA/ bid+yA ma tu ti li swA hA/ a ra li ma ra li/ sha li ni/ badzra ma li ni/ bi lit+ti/ si ri li bi/ g+hur+Na g+hur+Na sharba sarba narba bra

h+ma b+hat+ta puN+ya narba sarba/ harba darba rarba tsarba rba swA hA/ e hi shI g+h+raM badzra pA Ni he he hau hau/ tu ru tu ru/ tu ru/ tu ru/ tu ru/ la hu la hu la hu la hu swA hA/ sma ra taM/ nA ga riM/ yat+t+ra saM/ pra ti dz+nyA taM/ bud+d+ha sa kA she/ ut+ta hr-i da ya/ mi ti ri ti/

mi ti ri ti/ ma ti ma ti ti ti/ la ri swA hA/ khu la lu lu khu khu ti lu ti swA hA/ e hi twaM ma hA yak+Sha se nA pa ti/ hi li ri ri ti b+h+yo/ ma ri ki ri dzaM sa ri dzam+b+ha/ shu ri tsi ti/ tsu ru tsu ru tsu ru/ li ti swA hA/ narba sharba b+harba khu khu ti ti swA hA/ tu ru tu ru

sma ra twaM/ pra ti dz+nyAM/ badzra pA Ni swA hA/ ha la ha lA ya swA hA/ ku lu ku lA ya swA hA/ ka la ka lA ya swA hA/ kI li kI lA ya swA hA/ ma hA kI li kI lA ya swA hA/ kro d+ha kI li kI lA ya swA hA/ tri pa ta kI li kI lA ya swA hA/ tsaN+Da kI li kI lA ya swA hA/ badzra kI li

kI lA ya swA hA/ badzra d+ha rA ya swA hA/ badzra bany+dza ya swA hA/ badzra pA Na ye swA hA/ hi li mi li ni li/ oM sum+b+ha sum+b+ha/ phu ru phu ru saM b+hany+dza nA ma ba be b+h+yaHswA hA/ bcom ldan 'das snying po 'di ni las thams cad bgyid pa lags te/

don thams cad la gzhan gyis mi thub cing don mchis pa dang / zhi ba dang / zhi bar bgyi ba dang / dgra 'joms shing gzhan gyis mi tshugs pa lags te/ thang chu dang / sra rtsi'i pog dang / pog dkar po dang / a ka ru'i bdug pa bsreg

cing brjod par bgyi'o/ /phyag 'tshal ba ni snga ma nyid de/ ha ri ha ri ni/ badzra pA Ni/ muny+tsa d+ha/ ha sa na swA hA/ khi ri kha ra zhes smos pas dgod par 'gyur ro/ /na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ na mo hi li mu li li mu badzra pA Ni tsu ru tsu ru/

dzalpa dzalpa swA hA/ bdug pa de dag nyi shu dag dang sbyang bar bgyi'o/ /na mo rat+na tra ya s+ya/ hi li ha ri badzra pA Ni pa ti s+ya/ sid+ha b+hak+to smi swA hA/ ba dan dmar po phyar te dbul bar bgyi'o/ /lag na rdo rje'i snying po 'di ni sems can thams cad la

bde ba'i phyir las thams cad byed pa yin no/ /lag na rdo rje'i snying po rdzogs s+ho// // sngar bshad blon mo 'bar ba gang / /de dag kun gyi mchog gyur pa/ /'dod pa yi ni rdo rje ma/ /'bar ba de ni bshad par bya/ /dkon mchog gsuM

la phyag 'tshal lo/ /lag na rdo rje dang / 'dod pa'i dbang phyug la phyag 'tshal lo/ /gleng gzhi ni mnyan du yod pa'o/ /de nas 'dod pa'i dbang phyug rig sngags 'chang dang bcas par bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ste/ bcom
ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar rig sngags byas nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das bdag gis rig sngags kyi blon mo zhes bgyi ba de bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar bdag gis bshad par

'tshal na/ dge slong dang / dge slong ma dang / dge bsnyen dang / dge bsnyen ma rnams la sman par 'gyur ba dang rtsed mo dang las thams cad bgyid pa dang las thams cad bsgrub pa'i slad du bzhes su gsol/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal

pa/ 'dod pa'i dbang phyug nga'i nyan thos dge slong dang / dge slong ma dang / dge bsnyen dang dge bsnyen ma 'dod chags dang ldan pa dag yod de/ /de dag gi bar du gcod par 'gyur gyis mthong shig de dag 'dod pa'i dbang phyug gi

lan gsum gyi bar du bcom ldan 'das la gsol to/ /btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyi nyan thos dge slong dang / dge slong ma dang / dge bsnyen dang / dge bsnyen ma 'dod chags dang ldan pa ma mchis pa de dag la rig sngags kyi

rtsed mor 'gyur na/ bdag gi de bcom ldan 'das kyis bzhes su gsol/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rtag tu zham 'bring na 'dug cing g.yon phyogs na gnas pa/ gnod sbyin lag na rdo rje la gzigs so/ /de nas gnod

sbyin lag na rdo rjes bcom ldan 'das la bltas nas 'dod pa'i dbang phyug la 'di skad ces smras so/ /'dod pa'i dbang phyug skye bo mang po la phan pa dang / skye bo mang po la bde ba'i phyir rig sngags de shod cig shod cig /de nas

'dod pa'i dbang phyug dga' zhing mgu la yid rangs te/ rab tu dga' nas dga' ba dang yid bde ba skyes te/ de'i tshe rig sngags 'di bshad do/ /s+yAd+ya the daM i ta yo pa ba ti saM ba ti b+ha ya naM/ tsi li ta ni tsa/ yo ta na d+harma ma bi dza

ni ti pra ban+tu naM/ a ti kra naM taM bai ma de ba nA ma se na ti sarba sid+d+ha tsa yo gi ni/ ye na sit+t+ya na/ b+ha ga baM/ shA sta lo ke a nut+ta ra/ a ne saM t+yaM bA tsa ne/ na a yi ma bit+tsa sa mu dza sa ma y+ya bi da/ khi ni khi ni/ kuN+Da la mu khu ki swA hA/

ku ti ny+dza re ku ti ny+dza ye/ tam+bu le/ suM da kuM phe ba ste/ pra se a ga ste thaM ga ti ni pa ka sid+d+ha karma bi nA sha ni ya ya karma ma ha sra ni pra yuk+ta/ ni ba na ye ta/ kri taM ya ma/ in+d+rA ga ni/ man+t+ri Na/ tsit+ta ro ri sha ba/ tsa tuR+Ni/ sha na su

kri taM kun+da/ tsUr+Na yo go ba di ye te/ su hr-i dra dre/ s+t+rAM s+t+rAM hr-i da yaM/ ba shaM baM/ bash+tsa hr-i da ya/ bi d+ye shwa na/ dzam+b+ha naM/ stam+b+ha naM/ mo ha naM/ tsa ka ri she ti/ tsaN+Da lI baR+Sha dzA/ bi te pra yuk+ta mU la karma su pa ta pAM su ra dzA na tsai ba sarba me da ni kA ra yed

da/ e ka ut+ta ba ne to/ de na ri ba ra bi nA sha ne sarba karma ri bid+ya de marda dat+ta/ pa she s+yAt+te/ badzra pA Ni/ ma te gau re/ bid+ya rA dzA a nut+ta ra/ oM dzam+b+ha ya swA hA/ stam+b+ha ya swA hA/ mo ha ya swA hA/ mA lA ya swA hA/ ya mA ya swA hA/

ya ma ma mA swA hA/ badzrA ya swA hA/ ma hA badzrA ya swA hA/ badzra d+ha rA ya swA hA/ badzra pA Na ye swA hA/ badzra hastA ya swA hA/ badzro gra hastA ya swA hA/ badzra daN+DA ya swA hA/ badzro gra daN+DA ya swA hA/ bi shwa pA Na ye swA hA/ na maHkA me shwa ra badzra pA Na ye swA hA/

rig sngags 'dod pa'i rdo rje ma/ /'di ni rlung gi shugs zhes bya/ /'dod pa'i khams ni kun gyi mchog /rig sngags rgyal mo bla na med/ /'dod pa'i khams gnas ci yang rung / /'dod pa 'am 'dod pa zhig bar rung / /rab tu bsgrub+sa

na de dag ni/ /don du mi sgrub gang yang med/ /las kyi dam pa ji bzhin dang / /khyad par dang ni bsgrub pa'i mchog /de nyid thog mar bshad par bya/ /rang byung la ni phyag byas nas/ /sangs rgyas byang chub shing drung du/ /shar phyogs blta zhing

'dug par bya/ /kaR+ni ka ra'i me tog dang / /de ni bco ma'i gser mdog 'dra/ /sangs rgyas kyi ni g.yas logs su/ /rigs mchog rab sbyin shes nyen can/ /'dod pa'i dbang phyug rma bya yi/ /mgrin pa bzhin du sngo bar bri/ /sangs rgyas kyi ni

g.yon logs su/ /mnga' bdag rdo rje 'dzin chen ni/ /sprin dmar mdog 'dra 'od dang bcas/ /dpal mchog pad mar bzhugs pa bri/ /de nas mar gyi brgyad la brtsams/ /nas kyi zas bza' dus sum bcu/ /dus gsum du ni bsgrim

bya zhing / /cho ga 'di ni rtag tu bya/ /me tog dkar po sngon po dang / /dmar po dang ni rnam pa gsum/ /blangs te gnas der zhugs nas ni/ /cho ga bzhin du mchod par bya/ /der ni lnga bcu gcig bzlas pas/ /tshes grangs bcu gnyis

bar du yang / /dkar po sangs rgyas bsnun par bya/ /sngon pos 'dod pa'i dbang phyug la/ /pad ma dmar po la sogs pas/ /lag na rdo rje bsnun pas kyang / /zhag gsum khrus byas gso sbyong ldan/ /bcwa lnga yi ni gtsang ma yis/ /lha bshos

sna tshogs kun du dgram/ /du ru ska dang a ka ru/ /sangs rgyas kyi ni bdug mchog bsreg /thang chu'i snod ni tha dad bzhag /lag na rdo rje gu gul dbul/ /sangs rgyas rig sngags rdo rje 'dzin/ /slob dpon la ni gus mchod bya/ /de nas

sems ni bsdus nas kyang / /mchod pa dag ni rgyas par bya/ /bden pa bzhi ni ston pa pos/ /me tog dkar po bcom ldan la/ /bzhi brgya 'am brgyad brgya dam pa yis/ /bzlas shing bzlas shing bsnun par bya/ /sngo ba'i nang na mdog sngon

mchog /sum brgyas 'dod pa'i dbang phyug la/ /dmar ba'i nang na mdog dmar mchog /sum brgyas rdo rje 'dzin la bsnun/ /bsrung ba la ni khri lam du/ /zla gcig brgyad brgya bzlas brjod bya/ /bsgrub pa thog ma tha mar yang / /skud pa

nag pos bcing bar bya/ /ba ti bi da ra rak+Sha d+ha re rak+Sha/ ma hA d+ha ni rak+Sha/ ta thA ga ta sa ha dza ta rak+Sha/ puSh+pa ke tu rak+Sha/ a pa ta rak+Sha swA hA/ rtsa ba'i skud pa gtsang byas nas/ /bsgrub pa de ltar bsrung byas la/ /mtshams bcad pa ni 'dis

byas na/ /mtshams bcad kun gyi mchog tu 'gyur/ /d+ha ni ka ni d+ha ne ke ni sarba si ma ban+d+hA ni swA hA/ mtshams bcad kyi ni me 'di yang / /brgyad brgya bzlas sam yang na ni/ /de bzhin tshon skud sna tshogs kyis/ /gnas rnams

kun tu bskor bar bya/ /dngos grub bsgrub cing nor 'dod pas/ /dngos grub ltas ni blta ba'i phyir/ /rig sngags rgyal dbang grub rnams kyi/ /bsgrub pa'i tshig ni bzlas brjod bya/ /a gaM de sA d+ha ya a mo ge sA d+ha ya/ sa pa le

sa d+ha ya ut+sa de sat+t+ye t+ya ge pradz+nye u pa sha Ne sA d+ha ya swA hA/ /de nas rig sngags sgrub pa na/ /mtshan ma dag ni rtogs par bya/ /sku gdung ldan pa'i sku gzugs de/ /nyi ma bzhin du 'bar bar 'gyur/ /dad dang mchod pa'i nyes pa dang / /

rig sngags nyams pa'i nyes pa yis/ /ci ste der na ma grub na/ /yar gyi ngo la 'ang bsgrub par bya/ /dad dang mchod dang cho ga yis/ /de bzhin rdzogs par brtsam par bya/ /dus gsum gtsang sbra rdzogs bya zhing / /nas kyi kha zas dus

su bza'/ /bzlas brjod 'dun pas mtshan ma gsum/ /ma byung bar du bzlas brjod bya/ /sangs rgyas zhal nas an+da rnyil/ /yang na mthon ka chen po 'byung / /'dod pa'i dbang phyug kha nas kyang / /bzang po dkyil 'khor steng du

lhung / /lag na rdo rje'i kha nas kyang / /phun sum tshogs pa'i dbyig rnams 'byung / /yid bzhin nor bu 'dra ba yi/ /nor bu legs sdug mgo la gdags/ /'dod na g.yas pa'i khrig mar yang / /cho ga bzhin du gdags par bya/ /sa dang

nam mkha' snang byed cing / /'khor los sgyur ba gzhan bzhin 'gyur/ /nor bu'i mthus ni 'jigs byed cing / /rig sngags grub mthus stobs chen 'gyur/ /des ni mun par 'jigs byed cing / /rgya mtsho chen por 'jigs pa

med/ /'dod pa dag la mchod par 'gyur/ /rig sngags mchog bsgrubs skyabs kyi mchog /de yang rin chen spyod kun gyi/ /nang na tshugs par nus pa med/ /mu stegs rnams kyis kun rig bzhin/ /ji ltar dbang phyug 'dod la

spyod/ /'dod pa lhag ma de bzhin du/ /rig pa'i rgyal po mchog bsgrub ste/ /'dod la mngon du spyod par 'gyur/ /ci ste dad cing gus pa dang / /lag na rdo rje cho ga shes/ /de yang rdo rje 'dzin bzhin du/ /'jig rten gsum na 'jigs

med rgyu/ /dbyig rnams dang ni dong tse dag /'phags pa la las bsgrub na yang / /gnyis ka des bsgrubs 'jigs pa med/ /bde can dag dang ldan pa dang / /nag mo che dang ldan pa des/ /mngon du yid bzhin nor bu 'chang / /grong khyer

rgyal po bzhin du 'thob/ /bya ba mang las brten pa dang / /rnam pa mang po sna tshogs pa/ /mang po 'di dag ci smos te/ /mdo tsam 'di ni mnyan par gyis/ /'dod pa yi ni rdo rje ma/ /'di ni las kun bsgrub pa ste/ /blon mo

rnams kyi dam pa'i mchog /las rnams kun la don yod pa/ /ci ste yid la 'dod pa yi/ /dngos grub bde mchog dgongs na yang / /bya ba'i don kun grub pa yi/ /'dod pa'i rdo rje ma nyid bsgrub/ /rtag tu rang dgar bde ba sbyin/ /

rang dgar 'gro ba'i gzhi yang yin/ /rang dgar rtse zhing spyod pa yang / /'chang ba la sogs rang dgar 'gyur/ /'di ni spro ba'i ngang can la/ /nams kyang rgyab kyis phyogs mi 'gyur/ /bsgrub pa de yang 'joms mi byed/ /'bras

bu med par mi 'gyur la/ /bgegs kyang byed par mi 'gyur ro/ /dkyil 'khor las ni nyams gyur dang / /dam tshig dag kyang spangs pa dang / /sangs rgyas rdo rje 'dzin mchog sogs/ /ma dad rnams la grub mi 'gyur/ /de phyir

dkon mchog gsum po dang / /de bzhin rdo rje 'dzin pa dang / /rig sngags rang gi bla ma la/ /gus byas mchod cing bsgrub par bya/ /bsgrub pa dag ni ma byas kyang / /rtsa ba'i rig sngags stobs ldan pa/ /las rnams stong dag

'grub byed pa/ /gang yin de dag shes par gyis/ /kri ka ma la ka'i shing / /yam bsreg shing ni brgya rtsa brgyad/ /gtsang ma'i phyogs su me sbar te/ /cho ga dag ni rgyas par bya/ /zhag bdun bar du dus gsum du/ /de bzhin

bzlas brjod brgyad brgya bya/ /mar bcas 'o thug sbrang rtsir ldan/ /me mchog sbyin sreg byas na ni/ /'dis ni rgyal po 'am yang na ni/ /'khor los sgyur ba 'ang dbang gyur na/ /rgyal srid dag la phan pa yi/ /rgyal po'i 'khor lta ci

zhig smos/ /lan tshwa las ni gzugs byas nas/ /rkang pa nas brtsam sbyin sreg bya/ /cho ga des ni bud med dang / /skyes pa dbang du zhugs par 'gyur/ /bu mo yi ni gzugs byas nas/ /rkang pa nas brtsams sbyin sreg bya/ /cho ga des ni

bud med rnams/ / dbang du bya ba bstan pa yin/ /lo ma'i sbrang ma'i dpung byas nas/ /yungs kar me tog bsregs pa yis/ /de bzhin zhag bdun dus gsum du/ /rab tu bsgrims te mchod par bya/ /de ni yungs kar me tog gis/ /zhag

bdun bar du bsgrubs na ni/ /lan bdun bzlas pa 'grub 'gyur te/ /lo ma'i sbrang ma 'phro bar 'gyur/ /cho ga dag ni mchog dang ni/ /de bzhin man ta ka blangs nas/ /bzlas brjod brgyad brgya bzlas bya zhing / /thog mar legs par

mchod byas nas/ /gang gi ming ni brjod pa de/ /skad cig gis ni dbang du 'gyur/ /de bzhin cho ga byas nas ni/ /nan ta ka ni phyi nas blang / /a ka ru dang tsan dan dang / /ma ru pa ka rlon pa blang / /dri la sogs pa de dag gis/ /khrus

byas skye bo thams cad dgra/ /thog mar mchod pa la sogs pa/ /byed cing byed cing zhag bdun du/ /dus gsum brgyad brgya bzlas brjod bya/ /phyi nas mkhas pas khrus kyang bya/ /mar gyi ngo ni bcu bzhi la/ /bzlas brjod brgya rtsa

brgyad byas na/ /rgyal pos de la mchod par bya/ /bong nga yi ni rtsa ba yang / /byang phyogs blta zhing brko bar bya/ /de nas de yi shun lpags ni/ /mar gyi ngo yi bcu bzhi la/ /phye mar byas nas bzlas brjod bya/ /de bzhin brgyad brgya bzlas nas

ni/ /phur mar byas te bcang bar bya/ /bud med la ni des gtor na/ /de ma thag tu dbang du 'gyur/ /thams cad dbye bar bya ba ni/ /nim pa'i yal ga bsreg bya zhing / /'di dang 'di gnyis rtsod gyur cig /ces bya cho ga gsang ba yin/ /

de las phyir gso dam pa ni/ /gsang sngags 'dis ni bkru bar bya/ /dri la sogs pas snying nas mchod/ /bzlas brjod brgyad brgya byas na ni/ /byad stems dgrol ba'i mchog yin te/ /ci dga' bar ni brtsam bya zhing / /

zhag bdun bar du bsgrubs na ni/ /mi song 'jigs med 'bab par 'gyur/ /kar+Na pi lu li gcig dang / /skye tshe'i 'bru dang lan tshwa dang / /nim pa'i 'bru dang ras bal gyi/ /sa bon de dag sbyin sreg bya/ /'di nas gzhan du

che ge mo/ /song shig bros shig med gyur cig /ces ni ming yang brjod byas na/ /'gro 'gyur 'di la the tshom med/ /de las slar ni gso ba dang / /bzhag par byas na lan bdun du/ /de la bsrung ba mchog byas na/ /

gnas su dga' bar byed par 'gyur/ /ba ta la'i lo ma dang / /bil ba 'dzam bu a mra dang / /skyu ru ra la sogs pa yis/ /skal chung de ni khrus byas na/ /skal dang ldan par byed pa'i mchog /gos 'dod pa sha'i me tog

rnams/ /sbyin sreg byas na gos rnams thob/ /hi r+Na ne mu li ki rnams/ /sbyin sreg byas na dbyig rnams 'phel/ /gser 'dod bas ni su bar+Na/ /tshul bzhin sbyin sreg byas na 'thob/ /gser bsgrub pa yi nang na ni/ /cho ga 'di ni mchog tu bshad/ /

'dod pa'i rdo rje ma'i cho ga rdzogs s+ho// // de nas rdo rje 'og phag can/ /gnod sbyin rnams kyi snying po ste/ /'phrog ma zhes kyang rab grags te/ /'bar ba de ni bshad par bya/ /dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo/ /

gnod sbyin sde'i bdag po lag na rdo rje gsum po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /gnod sbyin thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /lngas rtsen la phyag 'tshal lo/ /gnod sbyin mo chen mo 'phrog ma rdo rje'i 'og phag can rigs

thams cad dang ldan pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de nas gnod sbyin thams cad kyi snying po brjod par bya yis/ khyed kun nga la nyon cig /mthong na don yod zhi ba dang / /gsum mchog blta na mi bzad dang / /'byung po thams cad rab zhi

byed/ /lag na rdo rje stobs po che/ /nor gyi bdag po rnams thos bu/ /gnod sbyin kun gyi mnga' bdag rje/ /gnod sbyin gang dag ri la gnas/ /sa ti ri dang ri bo che/ /zho gdong dang ni gdong rgyas dang / /'dod pa'i don sbyin gnod sbyin gang / /

mtshon cha 'thab cha sna tshogs can/ /stobs ldan rdzu 'phrul chen po dang / /rgyal dang rnam par rgyal ba dang / /pad ma dkar dang dgra 'joms dang / /rgyan phreng rgyas dang rgyan phreng che/ /bdud rtsi snying rje snying rje grong / /gnod sbyin chen po

lngas rtsen dang / /gnod sbyin na la ku be ra/ /nor bu'i sul can gnod sbyin gang / /nor bu bzang zhes grags pa dang / /rdzogs ldan dang ni rdzogs bzangs dang / /rab tu bzang dang bzang po nyid/ /bdag gi snying pos bkug pas na/ /de dag

thams cad 'dir gshegs shig /ma smos gnod sbyin de dag dang / /bdag gi don grub de dag dang / /rtag tu dge dang phan byed dang / /gnod sbyin gdon ni skyed byed dang / /gnod sbyin mo ni 'phrog ma mo/ /bu mangs khyod ni 'dir shog shig /

gzugs chen ldan zhing stobs che ba'i/ /bu de dag kyang 'dir shog shig /khyod ni rtag tu gnod sbyin dang / /bu'i 'khor dang lhan cig tu/ /lag na rdo rjes rab bskul bas/ /las rnams thams cad bsgrub par gyis/ /dgra yi

phyogs dang mdza' bo'i phyogs/ /de bzhin rgyal po sa gang dang / /nags dang brag khrod rdzong rnams dang / /g.yul du rgyal bar bya ba dang / /rgyas pa yi ni las rnams dang / /rtsod pa dang ni 'thab pa dang / /bsrung ba'i las dang

dbang bsgrub dang / /bag ma dag ni len pa la/ /lag na rdo rjes bshad pa bzhin/ /rdo rje dbyug sogs lhan cig tu/ /dam pa 'chang ba'i 'og phag mas/ /don rnams thams cad myur te gyis/ /s+yA d+ya the dan/ a ma le/ bi ma le nir ma le/

mAng ga l+ya sa hi te/ ha na ha na/ sa ra sa ra/ a sha ne be nA ma tiSh+Tha rA dzA dU ti de ba dU ti/ yak+Sha dU ti badzra dU ti sarba gra ha nA sha ni sha tru pra marda ni badzra dU ti i daM/ kurbA hi badzre sA da ya kA r+ya ma ma pa re shaM d+hu b+ha ga kA r+ya ma b+hi duSh+Ti ka durmu

khe durma kha me ma ma/ sha tra bo/ nA tha b+ha n+b+ha bi dza ye bi dza yo me/ b+ha ba tu a pa rA dzi te/ a pa rA dza yo me b+ha ba tu ba la ba la/ ban+to b+haM bA mi ma ti d+hi ta man+to b+ha ba ni/ a ma le maM ga l+ye/ ma re hi taM/ bi ma l+ye/ na she ha taM/ maM ga le/

ma re hi taM bi ma le/ na she hi taM/ dan+ta da karma dan+te hi da na la g+hu pA sha ni pra she hi taM/ sarba rA dzA dwA ra bi rA dzA ni a pa rA dzi ti/ sarbA yak+Sha hr-i da ya brta ni/ a pa yA mi bA pi tsa a nu sa ra sa ra sarba yak+Sha hr-i da yA ni a bi ba pi tsa

so ni so ni/ sa ra sa ra/ sa ma ya ma nu sma ra/ a yA na/ ya na saM tsa la ni/ sarba yak+Sha hr-i da yA ni/ ha na ha na/ da ha da ha/ pa tsa pa tsa/ b+hany+tsa b+hany+tsa/ b+ha na b+ha na/ mu ru mu ru/ tu ru tu ru/ b+ha ba b+ha ba/ rak+Sha rak+Sha maM karma dU ti ma ma

karma/ pra b+hi sha /sarba ar+tha sA d+ha ni/ sarba ar+tha sA d+ha ma me sA d+ha ya/ i dany+tsa me/ kar+yaM ku+e ru ku ru swA hA/ rig sngags rdo rje 'og phag can/ /gnod sbyin kun gyi snying po ste/ /'phrog ma zhes kyang rab grags pa/ /shes

ldan de ni bshad pa yin/ /dkyil 'khor gyi ni las mthong dang / /dkyil 'khor bsgrub pa byas pa yis/ /dkyil 'khor cho ga de bzhin du/ /las kyi dkyil 'khor mchog mchod nas/ /nyin zhag gcig tu smyung bar bya/ /

yang na zhag gsum smyung byas la/ /gtsang mas gtsang ma'i sa phyogs su/ /gnod sbyin dkyil 'khor rab gsal bri/ /yang na zhag gi ngo gnyis las/ /gang 'dod pa yi mtshan ma ni/ /gru bzhi lham pa sgo bzhir ldan/ /
khru bcu pa la dbyibs legs pa/ /sangs rgyas dbu gsum shar phyogs gzigs/ /yang na chos kyi dkyil 'khor bri/ /de'i g.yon phyogs rig sngags kyi/ /stobs 'chang lag na rdo rje bri/ /sangs rgyas kyi ni
g.yas logs su/ /nor gyi dbang phyug gnod sbyin bcas/ /de dag mdun du 'phrog ma ni/ /'og phag rig sngags sna tshogs mchog /de yi rig sngags tshogs kun ni/ /g.yas phyogs ngos su gnas par bya/ /

rgyal po chen po yul 'khor srung / /dri za mchog gi dpung gis bskor/ /shar phyogs sgor ni rab gnas shing / /nub phyogs su ni blta bar bya/ /rgyal po chen po 'phags skyes po/ /grul bum mchog gi dpung gis bskor/ /

lho phyogs sgo'i nang na gnas/ /lho phyogs nas ni byang du lta/ /rgyal po chen po mig mi bzang / /klu dag dang ni nam mkha' lding / /mchog rnams kyi ni mdun du 'dug /nub phyogs nas ni shar du lta/ /rgyal po chen po

po ku be ra/ /gnod sbyin mchog gi dpung gis bskor/ /byang phyogs kyi ni sgo na gnas/ /lho phyogs phyogs su blta bar bya/ /kho ra khor yug thams cad nas/ /gdon rnams brgyad brgyas bskor bar bya/ /me rnams kyang ni shin tu dgod/ /

bshos rnams kun du dgram par bya/ /de nas gnod sbyin gtor ma yang / /sha bcas dkyil 'khor nang du dgram/ /mar me la sogs dri rnams dang / /me tog 'bras bu kun gyis bskor/ /de ltar byas na rig sngags che/ /rgyal mo

yi ni dam pa 'di/ /bzlas brjod byed na bshos rnams dang / /bdug pa dri la sogs pa dbul/ /bzlas brjod bsnyen pa grangs med par/ /bzlas brjod bya zhing kun nas mchod/ /bdug pa thams cad nang du bsreg /bzlas brjod

brgyad brgya bkra shis pa/ /mkhas pas sngon du byas na ni/ /de nyid bsrung ba'i mchog yin no/ /de nyid rab tu bsgrub pa yin/ /phyogs bcing ba yang de nyid de/ /de nas 'di'i bzlas brjod rnams/ /brgya rtsa brgyad ni bzlas pa na/ /

bsgrub pa'i 'phrog ma 'gul ba dang / /sa gzhi dag kyang g.yo bar 'gyur/ /gnod sbyin rnam pa sna tshogs dag /kun nas der ni snang bar 'gyur/ /g.yo zhing sgra 'byin lta bar byed/ /rab tu 'du zhing 'phungs pa dang / /'jigs pa'i

gzugs rnams mthong 'gyur zhing / /gzugs so cog ni du mar ston/ /de ni de yis 'jigs mi bya/ /sangs rgyas kyi ni drung dag tu/ /rig sngags tshogs ni bzlas brjod bya/ /rig sngags rgyal po rab 'bar ba/ /rdo rje 'og

phag rnam bsgrags pa/ /de tshe bdag nyid 'ong bar 'gyur/ /de mthong de ni sde dang bcas/ /mkha' la rgyu ba'i mchog tu 'gyur/ /gzhon nu la sogs gnod sbyin gyi/ /tshogs mchog kun gyis de la mchod/ /gnod sbyin bzhin

du 'ang rgyu ba dang / /ji bzhin stobs dang ldan par rgyu/ /de srid du ni mkha' la 'gro/ /yang na tshe dpag med par gnas/ /dkyil 'khor mngon par mchod nas ni/ /rnam pa kun gyis rig sngags bzlas/ /ma grub na yang gdon
la sogs/ /las rnams thams cad byed par nus/ /yid dang tshig gis bzlas byas nas/ /don rnams rnam pa sna tshogs pa/ /thams cad kyang ni bsgrub par nus/ /rtag tu bzlas brjod sbyin sreg dang / /mchod pa

kun dang mnyam bzhag dang / /rtag tu mchod pa dga' ba yis/ /don rnams thams cad bsgrub par bya/ /rdo rje 'og phag can gyi cho ga rdzogs s+ho// // de nas sngags 'chang kun gyis mchod/ /lag na rdo rje'i sras gtuM

ba/ /rdo rje'i sde ni stobs po che/ /mthong na don yod zhi ba po/ /gtum po rdo rje 'dzin dga' ba/ /'bar ba chen po mchod sbyin mchog /don kun grub byed bshad par bya/ /na mo rat+na tra ya s+ya/ na mo ma hA satwa s+ya/ satwa satwa s+ya/

a ti pa la s+ya/ a pra me/ ya ba la s+ya/ badzra se nA ya s+ya/ badzra ka ma da s+ya/ tu ru tu ru/ badzra se nA ya swA hA/ ku ru ku ru ma hA se nA ya swA hA/ hu ru hu ru/ sarba satwa/ pu dzi tA ya swA hA/ su ru su ru/ satwa kA ma tA ya swA hA/ mu ru

mu ru/ ma hA pu ru shA ya swA hA/ ma hA se nA pa ta ye/ sarba karma dA ya swA hA/ sarba dza ya dza ya/ dA ya swA hA/ sarba sid+d+hi sid+d+hi dA ya swA hA/ sarba dA na dA ni n+ya pra dA ya swA hA/ badzra se nA ya swA hA/ a pra me ya ku nA ya swA hA/

sarba ba ti satwa pU dzi tA ya swA hA/ pra ti graMh+Na mAM rak+Sha mAM sarba kA ma da/ sarba kA ma ma me pU rA ya swA hA/ /'di yi cho ga bshad par bya/ /ngas bshad de ni mnyan par gyis/ /cho ga bzhin du rdo rje sde/ /ri mo'i gzugs ni brgya

byas nas/ /sdug pa'i mchod pas mchod bya zhing / /bsgrims te rtag tu bzlas brjod bya/ /sgu gdung ldan pa'i mchod rten nam/ /gang na sku gdung yod pa der/ /ci nus kyis ni rab bsgrims te/ /sngar ni bsnyen pa 'di dag bya/ /

de nas zla phyed yang na gcig /yang na zhag ni bdun yang rung / /dus gsum khrus byas dkar gsum bza'/ /mnyam bzhag rtag tu bzlas brjod bya/ /gso sbyong yan lag brgyad ldan pas/ /nas kyi kha zas dus gsum bza'/ /

shin du mnyam bzhag dus gsum du/ /brgya rtsa brgyad ni bzlas brjod bya/ /der ni mar gyi mar me gnyis/ /ma shi bar ni bzhag par bya/ /phyi nang bzhag pa'i smyung ba bya/ /zla ba nya la rab bsgrims te/ /bza' dang btung ba mang po yis/ /

lha bshos mnyam par bzhag pas dbul/ /cho ga dam pas bsrung bya zhing / /cho ga brtan pa nges byas nas/ /rdo rje'i sde ni stobs po che/ /lan grangs brgya stong bzlas brjod bya/ /de nas stobs chen rdo rje sde/ /de la yang ni 'grub

'gyur te/ /yid la ci dang ci 'dod pa'i/ /don rnams thams cad byed par 'gyur/ /nad kun yang ni sel byed cing / /'dod pa thams cad sbyin par byed/ /yungs kar nas dang lan tshwa dang / /shu ti dang ni nye'u shing dang / /pri yang ku dang shu

dag rnams/ /mnyam par bzhag pas zhag bdun du/ /seng ldeng 'dag ma dud med la/ /de yi ming smos sbyin sreg bya/ /zhag bdun bar du lan cig ni/ /dus gsum du ni brgya rtsa brgyad/ /sbyin sreg rab tu legs byas na/ /

skal chung gis kyang 'grub par 'gyur/ /tshul 'dis sbyin sreg byas na ni/ /sems can kun kyang 'khrugs par 'gyur/ /don gang yid la bzhag nas ni/ /stobs chen 'di ni bsgrub byas na/ /de yi las de byed 'gyur te/ /

'di la dpyad par bya ba med/ /cho ga gzhan yang rtag tu yid la lan gsum bzlas brjod byas te/ bsrung ba yang lan gsum bzlas brjod byas nas/ gang 'dod pa de slangs na thob par 'gyur ro/ /'dod pa thams cad brjod p+sa

'grub par 'gyur te/ 'di ni de'i rtsa ba'i bsgrub pa yin no/ /zhag gsum smyung bar byas te/ yar gyi ngo tshes bcu gsum la/ mchod rten gyi drung du ba ser mo'i lci ba las gnod sbyin gyi gzugs byas la/ sna ma'i me tog

gi phreng ba phyogs bzhir spyan drangs nas/ gnod sbyin gyi gtor ma dang / tsan dan dkar po dang / ka ra bI ra dmar po dang / rnam pa sna tshogs gzhan dag gis kyang sku gzugs mchod par byas la/ gu gul dang / a ka ru dang / du sh+ka'i

bdug pa bsregs shing / mar me dang / dri dang / me tog gi phreng bas mchod pa rgyas par byas nas/ dus gsum du lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod byas la/ yar gyi ngo tshes gcig la brtsams te/ tshes brgyad dang / bcu bzhi

'am/ nya'i bar du dus gsum du grangs med par bzlas brjod byas na don grub par byed do/ /rdo rje sde'i snying po rdzogs s+ho// // na mo bud+d+he b+h+yaH ma hA pu tsu sha ka b+he b+h+yaH na maHsarba lo ka ba b+ha bi sh+Na be/ I shwa rA a masta yak+Sha se na

pa ta ye pra bar dA ya/ ma hA satwA ya a na ni ni dA nA ya ma hA dak+Shi NI yA ya sarba/ bo d+hi satwA nAM/ pra ba ra NAM pra ba ra/ yi mi tre bar+d+hA ya ba ri sh+thA ya/ sarba satwA na ma spri ta/ pU dzI tA ya ma hA yak+Sha se nA pa ta ye/ badzra se nA ya ba ru/ be ru/ bu ru

bu ru/ mu ru mu ru/ tsu ru tsu ru/ du ru du ru/ hu ru hu ru ya hu ru hu ru/ badzra se nA ya swA hA/ ma hA se nA ya swA hA/ sarba kA ma dA ya swA hA/ sarba su kha tA ya swA hA/ sarba arta sa d+ha nA ya swA hA/ sarba karma kA ma ba ra/ ba ra dA ya swA hA/

na mo badzra se nA yastu se nA ya/ ma hA se nA ya/ sarba kA ma dA ya sarba su kha dA ya/ sarba ar+tha sA d+ha nA ya swA hA/ sab+ho shat+ti dri na b+ha ya ti ye swA hA/ bri go sha shuM ne gar de/ ba d+ha ya swA hA/ rAdz+nyA mA kaR+Sha na ma e kaR+sha NA ya swA hA/ pra ti

gr-ih+Na nA ma ma rak+Sha/ na ma sarba karma da ba ra da/ sarba ka ma ma me pu rA ya/ da ha da ha/ pa tsa pa tsa i daM me kA r+yaM sA d+ha ya swA hA/ sa phyogs gtsang ma 'am/ bdag gi khyim du ras ma nyams pa la tshon rtsi sbyin med pas rdo rje sde bri bar bya

ste/ gzhon nu'i gzugs 'chang ba gser gyi mdog can rgyan phreng dang / do shal dang / dpung rgyan dang / cod pan dang / rgyan sna tshogs kyis brgyan pa pad ma rtsa ba dmar po'i steng na 'dug ste lag pa g.yon pa na pad ma bsgreng ste

'dzin/ lag pa g.yas pa dbugs 'byin pa'i tshul du 'dug pa bri/ /de'i steng du 'du byed thams cad ni mi rtag pa'o/ /'du byed thams cad ni sdug bsngal ba'o/ /chos thams cad ni bdag med pa'o/ /mya ngan las 'das pa ni

zhi ba'o zhes rtogs pa brjod pa rnams bri bar bya'o/ /de nas yar gyi ngo tshes gcig la brtsam zhing bsgrub par bya ste/ des de'i drung du dri thams cad kyis dkyil 'khor byugs la me tog dri zhim po dang / bdug pas mchod nas bstod pa

dbul bar bya'o/ /mar gyi mar me gnyis kyang dbul bar bya ste/ gcig ni sangs rgyas la/ gcig ni gzhon nu la dbul lo/ /dus gsum du sbyin sreg sum bcu rtsa gnyis gnyis bya zhing / 'o ma dang / bu ram sbyar ba dang / zho dang bu raM

sbyar ba dbul bar bya'o/ /til zan dang / 'byung po'i zas kyi gtor ma yang sbyin no/ /zas su 'o ma 'am phye'i 'de gu 'am/ 'o ma rjen pa'i 'de gu za zhing / nas dang / yungs kar dang / shu ti dang / nye'u shing dang / shu dag dang / pri yang ku
